name: Habitación doble + baño y terraza
description:
The space
Habitación confortable en loft de finca en el centro de Vidreres, a 10 min coche de la playa y del aeropuerto de Girona. Acceso privado a las estancias, y posibilidad de parking. Wifi Gratis en segunda planta.

Confortable room, bathroom and terrace in loft located in the center of the town of Vidreres, wich is 10minutes drive to the beach and Girona airport. Private access to lodging and possibility of parking. Free Wifi.

Chambre confortable, toilette et terrace dans un loft qui se trouve au centre de Vidreres.
A 10 minute de la plage et de l'aeroport de Girona. Access privé et possibilité du parking. Wifi gratuit.

Stanza confotable con bagno i terrazza en loft in centro de Vidreres, a 10 minuti de la spiaggia i aeroporto de Girona. Accesso privato i possibilita de parking. Wifi gratuito.

Guest access
Baño con ducha en la 2a planta y acceso a cocina.
neighborhood_overview:
Bonitas playas a 15 minutos en coche. Piscina municipal a 10 minutos andando y restaurantes con menús económicos.
Autobús con línea directa a Lloret de Mar y a Girona.
host_about: Adoro viajar, ver mundo y aprender de ello.

name: 100m FROM THE BEACH, with TERRACE
description:
Big apartment with terrace (7 people), next to the sea and beach (2nd line, in López y Puigcerver Street at Avió Street). Area with restaurants and shops, in the Palamós center, a nice town in the middle of Costa Brava. Bus station is 5 minutes walking from the apartment.

The space
ONE MINUTE walking from the beach! (in Lopez i Puigcerver street)

It is on the first floor. There are four neighbors, two in each floor. Is a quite building!

It has three double bedrooms: one with 2 individual beds; another bedroom with a bunk (3 beds) and other double bedroom with a queen bed and bathroom ensuite.
In total, it has two bathrooms.
It’s for 7 people.
The apartment has got a big terrace, where you can eat or rest all the day under the sun. Or under the big sunshade... It's up to you!
The kitchen is full equipped (washing machine, fridge, microwave, oven).

Our apartment is in Palamós, in the middle of Costa Brava, 200

name: house in a quiet village
description:
Enjoy this spacious house in a quiet village only 10 minutes drive from Figueres and 20 minutes drive from the Costa Brava beaches

The space
The house is on a first floor. It comprises a big kitchen with dinning space, a dinning room, a living room, 4 bedrooms (one with a double bed), two bathrooms, and a little terrace. The kitchen overlooks the main square of the village with its church. There is normally plenty of parking spaces in the streets nearby the house. There is a bar and a shop next door where you can buy a bit of everything, from bread to a newspaper.

This house is situated in the very centre of a quiet village near Figueres, the Costa Brava beaches and the Pyrenees. Also close to Figueres, Girona and Barcelona, where you can enjoy day trips.
Ideal for families, artists, wirters... Quiet and inspirational.

Ordis is indeed ideal as a base for city visits, beaches and other attractions!
Places of interest
1. Figuer

name: 18th C Stone House near Costa Brava
description:
Casa Fluvia is a charming stone village house in a Catalan village on the Costa Brava just 5 km from the sea. A perfect base close to the beach to enjoy culture, cuisine, history, nature, and sports . Spacious house suitable for up to 8 people.

If your stay is less than 1 week, please request a price. It is difficult to cover all eventualities and lengths of stay with the automatic system. In July and August bookings run from Saturday to Saturday-

Tourist Registration Ref: HUTG 000207

The space
CASA FLUVIÀ IS A 18TH CENTURY STONE VILLAGE HOUSE WITH 3 DOUBLE BEDROOMS AND 1 TWIN BEDROOM.

- rooftop terrace and solarium
- first floor living area 30s Catalan style
- ground floor living area typical of 18th century stone farmhouse

The house is within 5 km of some of the best Costa Brava beaches, set in a quiet Mediterranean village in the Empordà with views of the Pyrenees, surrounding fields and neighbours wor
neighborhood_overview:
Torroella de Fluviá is a small peaceful rural village located a short drive from the beach (about 4 km). The immensely long beach of Sant Pere is famous for its beauty and (in designated areas) as a wind surfing, surfing, and kite surfing venue.

Sant Marti de Empuries offers a series of more protected coves adjacent to the Roman ruins of Empuries and the picturesque hamlet of Sant Marti.

Our house is a minute's walk from a great local shop. Fresh bread and newspapers in the morning, good local produce (including organic products) and most essential items. A village bar/restaurant in the town square offers great lunch options and small plates at all times. Or you can sit in the sun while the kids play safely.

The neighbouring village of Sant Pere Pescador offers a good range of shops including a largish supermarket. There are also restaurants for every pocket and taste in Sant Pere. See our guide book for some favourites.

Roads through the f
host_about: We have both been living in Barcelona for over 30 years and we met here in our adopted home. Girona and the Empordà are part of the attraction for us and we were very happy to be able to buy our beautiful village house in 2003. We are keen cyclists and get in some Touring every year in Ireland, France, and Spain. Our other passions are wine and food and having a place near the French border has allowed us to get to know the wonders of the wines of the south of France (Languedoc Rousillon). We like to travel simply so Airbnb is a perfect solution and we have been hosting on Airbnb and elsewhere for over 10 years with great results, meeting interesting people for all over the world.

name: ALMADRAVASOL·COM - Terraced house, A/C & wifi
description:
ALMADRAVASOL·COM
Outstanding sea view terraced house with air conditionning and wifi

The space
ALMADRAVASOL·COM
- First floor: Living room, kitchen, 5m2 rear garden, lavatory with shower (access from rear garden), and 15m2 front terrace with a marvelous views to a sandy beach.
- Second floor: 1 bedroom with a bunch bed + sofa bed & 5m2 sea view terrace, 1 room with one big bed & 4m2 terrace looking to the rear garden, 1 complete bathroom.
- Air conditioning in all rooms
- Free wifi

Other things to note
SURROUNDINGS:
Roses town (5km from the house):
- Animated touristic town with a attractive pedestrian center
- plenty of restaurants and small fancy shops.
- Touristic boat trips and renting.
- Nautic Sports, specially for windsurfing and sailing.

Cadaques (20 km from the house):
- Famous picturesque fishing village.
- Painter Dali's hometown (Portlligat)
- Cultura
neighborhood_overview:
RESIDENTIAL AREA:
- The house is located in a select residential area around a sandy beach
- 5 km away from the town of Roses
- South-east orientation: sunny terrace during all the day!
- Located at the border of the Natural Park of Cap de Creus.
- There is no car road in front of this beach, so it is specially quiet. The beach parking lot is 100m from the shore. You can also reach the beach by walking from the house (10 min. going down, and 20 min. when returning back).
- Safe area and quiet roads where children can play safely.
- Charming neighbors, most of them coming from France.

Luxury "Villa ZEN", big pool and SPA, 800m beach (8min walk) in Cala Canyelles ...nice beach with sports harbour (2km from Lloret de Mar, and 6km from Tossa de Mar) 67km to Barcelona.
This villa is divided in 4 independent spaces. Both on main floor are joined in a very big space but can be separated by a double door.
The other 2 are completely independent.
1000m2 plot with gardens, big swimming-pool 13x6,5m, gimnastic, sauna and jacuzzi.
IMPORTANT AGREE WITH THE RULES OF THE HOUSE

house. It is situated in, "Cala Canyelles" a private urbanization between Lloret de Mar and Tossa de Mar. The house is 700m to the Canyelles beach, 2km to Lloret de Mar and 6km from Tossa de Mar. There are 4 apartments (completely independent) sharing the swimming pool, and spa. (also the washing machine and dry-machine).
Every Apartment has a double master bedroom and a saloon where there is a double single beds that are the sofa-beds. The bed shee
neighborhood_overview:
Cala Canyelles is the only beach where there is a sports harbour on this zone. You can practice many aquatic sports, And there is also the international tennis club where you can play tennis, padel-tennis, dive, rent a boat, kayak, etc
On Lloret de Mar town you can go to the local pool (olympic size 50x25m) for only 7€ day.
host_about:
Me gusta aprender y ser mejor cada día.
 Y doy gracias a la vida por mi familia, mis amigos y por haber nacido y vivir en el paraiso....por supuesto por gozar de buena salud.

name: Begur, house w/garden & pool, view to sea & castle
description:
200sqm house with garage, private garden and shared pool.
5 mn walking from Begur centre and some 3 kms from the various beaches and calas. Gorgeous views to the Medes islands and Castle from everywhere in the house. At the entrance level, a very nice suite with its private bathroom, and 2 large doublerooms with 2nd bathroom with same views. At the garden level, large livingroom with bar and its 28sqm porch. Opened kitchen with cellar. Guests toilets.

The space
Our house is perfect for relaxing and enjoying Begur Cape, its landscapes and varied activities (beaches, walks, cultural patrimony, nautic sports, golf...). Views over the sea, the Medes islands, as well as over the Begur village and its Castle are beautiful , and invite to relaxation while keeping you connected to these exceptionnal surroundings.

Guest access
We rent the entire house, except a closed zone at the ground floor not included in the above description.
The swi
neighborhood_overview:
Close to Begur you'll be free to choose between the long Pals sand beach and the many beaches and calas of the Begur Cape (Sa Riera, SaTuna, Fornells, Aiguablava, ...) which are amongst the most beautiful of the Costa Brava. We recommend as well to explore the pathways that link them.
Diving (various marine reserves), nautic sports, tennis and various golf courses (one PGA) are available close by.
Gastronomy quality of the area is well known, and you'll find a large variety of restaurants in Begur and its surroundings.
host_about: Somos una pareja francesa de 55 años afincada en España. Nos gusta la naturaleza, los artes y la buena comida. Practicamos regularmente senderismo por el cabo de Begur. ¡Bienvenidos a nuestra casa que hemos decidido abrir este año!

name: Luxurious Villa in La Costa Brava
description:
The space
Located in the heart of S'Agaró and annexed to one of the most exclusive area in La Costa Brava: La Gavina. It combines the tranquility of a residential area with the proximity to a very fashionable center of leisure in the Coast of Gerona (Playa de Aro).

With spacious rooms and a warm inviting decor, the Mas Sais Villa stands out for its 3 Suites with individual bathroom totally new for the best comfort of its guests. It has a large kitchen fully equipped Mediterranean style that binds to a nice, bright dining room and meeting place to share. It also has a spacious lounge with two areas and a large fireplace ready to use.

The private garden consists of a beautiful travertine pool with night lighting where you could cool off. Also a hammock hanging between two trees shade on a blanket of lawn for romantics. Certainly its unique marble porch with comfortable wicker sofas will make guests enjoy the wonders of the Costa Brava.

name: La torre del Capricorno: 150m2, Sea-& Mountainview
description:
Auf der Spitze des Berges in Massos de Pals lädt "La torre del Capricorno" mit einem (fast) rundum Blick von den Pyreneen über das Tal bis hin zum Meer schlichtweg zum Träumen und entspannen ein. Die einzigartige Lage wird Autoren inspirieren, Paaren Zweisamkeit bieten und Familien entspannen.

License number
HUTG-025420
neighborhood_overview: Mit dem Auto gelangt man innerhalb von 5 Minuten zum Supermarkt Jodofi (mit separater Frischfisch Theke) und in 10 Minuten zum Playa de Pals. Die Altstadt Pals bietet als einer der ältesten mitteralterlichen Orte eine Vielzahl von Boutiquen und Restaurants an. Den wohl besten Cortado und die besten Crépes gibt es im "Dino" gleich gegenüber vom Rathaus im Altstadtkern.
host_about:
Seit mehr als zwei Jahrzehnten bin ich schon als Kind in Pals und der Costa Brava unterwegs gewesen. Nun haben wir als Familie dort unser Domizil und freuen uns über jeden Gast, der diesen zauberhaften Ort mit seinen wudnerbaren Menschen genau so ins Herz schliesst wie wir das bereits getan haben.

Wir sind im schönen Seligenstadt (Hessen) ansässig und vermieten auch dort ein Ferienhaus, direkt gegenüber der Basilika.

host_about:
TULUM, MEXICO: PEARL WHITE BEACHES, CENOTES AND MAYA RUINS 

After my experiences with the rental of holiday homes in Bali, we have now started a new rental project in beautiful Tulum. My family is living in Cancun and obviously we know the region very well. Together we will do everything to make your stay as pleasant as possible.

If you are looking for a destination with pearly white beaches, azure blue sea, incredibly beautiful nature and culture and lots of fun? Tulum has it all. This ancient Maya city is just a bit further south than the famous Playa del Carmen in the province of Quitana Roo (next to Yucatan) in Mexico. 
A destination that you absolutely should not miss when you are traveling in the Riviera Maya

Tulum's most well-known attractions are its ruins, cenotes & water sports, (Snorkelling and Diving). We warmly welcome you to enjoy and discover this beautiful region and immerse yourself in the relaxed atmosphere of Tulum ....

name: Costa Brava, 50 m from beach 1
description:
Apartment in a quiet street in the center of Sant Antoni de Calonge, 50 meters from beach
3 bedrooms (2 double, 1 with bunk bed)
2 bathrooms with shower
Living room with balcony
Satellite TV, Internet WiFi
2 balconies
Private parking for 1 car

The space
Sant Antoni combines a rich medieval history with modern day facilities, offering an ideal place to relax, either on the beach or in the mountains. It lies 2 km away from Palamós, along the seashore path, offering the visitor exceptional views of our coasts.

The beautiful winding path along the "Camino de Ronda", will also take you to Playa de Aro. During the walk, you will be able to sit down and rest on any of the terraces and enjoy the sunshine, even during the winter months.

The apartment is:

In a residential building in a quiet street in the center of Sant Antoni de Calonge, one row of houses behind the seafront. 50 meters from the beach
neighborhood_overview:
Shops, supermarkets, restaurants, sea sports rentals, all within 10 minutes walk from the apartment.

Sant Antoni combines a rich medieval history with modern day facilities, offering an ideal place to relax, either on the beach or in the mountains. It lies 2 km away from Palamós, along the seashore path, offering the visitor exceptional views of our coasts.

The beautiful winding path along the "Camino de Ronda", will also take you to Playa de Aro. During the walk, you will be able to sit down and rest on any of the terraces and enjoy the sunshine, even during the winter months.
host_about:
Hello,

We are a family who own a number of apartments and houses
-  Costa Brava, Spain (town of Sant Antoni de Calonge and town of Palamos)

We speak fluent English, French, Danish, Spanish, Catalan, German and Mandarin Chinese.

My father is a diplomat, so we have lived and traveled extensively around the world. We enjoy meeting travelers and try our best to make your stay as enjoyable as possible.

We have contracted cleaning and maintenance staff, available to solve any issue that may come up during your stay, as soon as possible.

Generally Ana (in Spain) will be the ones to meet you at the property and provide tips about the area (she can advise on activities, restaurants, shops...). 

We enjoy good food and wine, sailing (and may be able to take you out on a boat trip locally depending on the dates of your visit), scuba diving, skiing, go-karting, adventure sports in general, entrepreneurial ventures, football, art and architecture, handicrafts etc.

The space
Modern, cozy and design three-storey house in a typical Catalan town, perfect for families or for a group of friends. The house is about 200 square metres. It is situated in a green and very calm street at a 3min walk from the center of town. You can drive to Girona in a 15min, to the best beaches of Costa Brava in 25min, to France and the Pyrenées in 45min. Ryan Air's Girona airport is only at a 10min drive.

The house has a big garage and parking space, a front garden, a back garden where you can eat and have barbecues. On the ground floor you also find one of the bedrooms, the huge open-space living room (with plasma TV) and dining room, the design fully-equipped kitchen, a bathroom, and a fantastic veranda. On the first floor: two bedrooms, one bathroom, plus 100 sq meters terrace. Top floor: large open space with pull-out sofa.

Es una casa adosada de ladrillo rojo con dos jardines, uno en la parte delantera y otro en la trasera. Esta amueblada de forma cómoda y práctica de modo que conserva los espacios diáfanos y luminosos.
Ideal para grupos de hasta 8 personas.
2 baños con bañera,en la parte superior, donde están las habitaciones y un aseo en la planta baja.
Hay aire acondicionado en todas las habitaciones.

The space
Casa adosada de 2 pisos, situada en zona residencial muy tranquila, a 300 metros del lago de Banyoles.
Tiene 4 dormitorios, 2 baños, 1 aseo, salón comedor, cocina y recibidor. Está completamente equipada. Es muy luminosa y soleada.Tiene un pequeño jardín.
Si lo desean les proporcionamos servicio de limpieza.

ideal for family, in the village there are shops, restaurants ... walking areas ... megalithic routes, from the house offer various activities, quad tours, paintball, travel with globe ...

En el primer piso hay dos habitaciones, una con cama de matrimonio y la otra con dos camas individuales. También hay una sala de paso equipada con un sofá cama de dos plazas y un pequeño lavabo sin ducha. La cocina también está en la primera planta y está completamente equipada, disponiendo además de chimenea.

name: Medieval castle S.X - the tower apartment
description:
In the center of the Ripollès between rivers, valleys and mountains stands magnificently ancient castle Llaés (sX). A unique place of exceptional beauty, where there is absolute tranquility amidst lush nature.
The apartment is distributed from a distributor hall with an old well, which gives way to the whole, with 5 bedrooms, 3 bathrooms, dining room, living room and a kitchen equipped with a terrace with wonderful views of the immensity of nature.

The space
With over 1000 years of history, Llaés castle has been renovated to enjoy the accommodations in family and / or friends.
We do not offer anything extraordinary, since everything here is quite natural, we will invite you to the castle and its history, to know the corners of the surroundings, waterfalls, ancient house in caves, the uniqueness of the "Bufadors" forest...

Welcome!

Guest access
In ancient Tower of Homage we have enabled an apartment for 10 people, with 4
neighborhood_overview: In the town of Llaés we are 12 inhabitants, and what we like the most about our neighborhood, the tranquility and harmony that is breathed, the green of the mountains with the contrast of the electric blue of the sky. We love quiet afternoons where just looking up you see eagles, owls at dusk, butterflies, hares, moles, foxes, and countless more neighbors running around the neighborhood!
host_about:
Hello!
 We love the rural environment and the variety of activities offered: hiking, mountain biking, climbing, and a lot more.
We are fortunate to be able to receive people from all over the world in this small and incredible X century castle.
Always there, 24 hours 7 days a week, we ensure that our guests feel like royalty!
 We hope you have the best experience during your stay :) Marc & Ginny

Hola!
  Somos una pareja joven, amamos el entorno rural y la variedad de actividades que ofrece: senderismo, ciclismo de montaña, escalada y mucho más.
  ¡Somos afortunados de poder recibir personas de todo el mundo en este pequeño e increíble castillo del siglo X!
  Siempre allí, las 24 horas, los 7 días de la semana, nos aseguramos de que nuestros huéspedes se sientan como la realeza.
  ¡Esperamos que tengas la mejor experiencia durante tu estancia! :) Marc y Ginny

name: Country House⭐Can Simonet⭐Camprodon
description:
Country House in Rocabruna, Camprodon, Catalan Pyrenees. Quiet and lots of light. Incredible views of the Alta Garrotxa. Nature, landscapes and fresh air. Country house with absolute quietness, outdoor spaces, ideal for different types of activities: resting, sun, games, barbecues... And much more! We offer many indoor spaces. Our purpose is to look for comfort and quality respecting the environment and the characteristics of the old "Masia Catalana"

The space
The house has for your exclusive use, a living-dining room with fireplace, a kitchen and a toilet with shower on the ground floor. The kitchen is totally equipped (Cooking and eating utensils.
Appliances: Fridge-freezer, oven, microwave, toaster, blender, juicer, Italian coffee maker,washing machine). These spaces are complemented by 3 bedrooms (one room with a double bed, another with three single beds and a third with two single beds and a double sofa bed) and a bathroom on the ground floor.
W
neighborhood_overview: Rocabruna is a small entity in the municipality of Camprodon, located in the Alta Garrotxa, a space of Natural interest. The village of Rocabruna has two high quality restaurants, the Romanesque church of Sant Feliu de Rocabruna from the 12TH century and the ruins of Rocabruna Castle. It is also an ideal place for mountain routes, horseback riding, BTT, 4x4, trekking, trail-running or enjoy pleasant rural views and fantastic nature.
host_about: Soc l'espòs de la Concepció, propietaria dels allotjaments. Filla del veïnat de Rocabruna on els seus pares van viure la major part de les seves vides i dels qui va heretar el patrimoni familiar que avui és Rourevell. Actualment es dedica a l'ensenyament infantil a Ripoll on resideix i treballa.

name: Masía en el parque natural de la Garrotxa
description:
NUESTRA ACOGEDORA CASA ESTA DENTRO DEL PARQUE NATURAL DE LA ZONA VOLCANICA DE LA GARROTXA Y A CINCO MINUTOS DE OLOT. TIENE TRES HABITACIONES CON BAÑO EN SU INTERIOR, COCINA, UN AMPLIO SALON CON CHIMENEA Y BARBACOA EN EL JARDIN

The space
Caserío del siglo XIV reformado y totalmente equipado, situado en pleno Parque Natural de la zona Volcánica de la Garrotxa. Es uno de los lugares más bonitos del Parque, combina bosques, pastos y algunos caseríos aislados con chozas y muros de piedra seca de roca volcánica. En este paraje de múltiples leyendas es donde se originaron los primeros volcanes, ahora solo testimoniados por diferentes coladas de lava, ya enfriadas y superpuestas una encima de la otra, que configuran un relieve suave.
A cinco minutos del famoso Hayedo d’en Jordà, Volcán Santa Margarita, Volcán Croscat y la Ciudad de Olot.
Cuenta con un comedor sala de estar con chimenea, un gran distribuidor, una cocina totalmente equipada, tres habitaciones,

Decorated with taste, you will enjoy the outstanding view on the Cadaques Harbour !

The space
Duplex of 100m2 located between the center of Cadaques and the famous Rocamar hotel.
The apartment is located at the top of a small building (2 top floors) with a direct entrance from a street behind the building creating the impression to enter a small house.

3 bedrooms : 1 with a double bed, 2 with twin beds.

2 bathrooms : 1 with a bath and 1 with a shower (both refurbished in 2013).

1 living room with a typical chimney (designed by a famous catalan designer) and 1 dining room.

Well equiped kitchen.

2 great terraces (1 at each floor) : 1 at the bottom floor with a teak table and chairs (25 m2) and 1 at the upper floor with an outside leaving room (15m2). Both terraces have a fantastic sea view at 180 degrees.

name: Spectacular house at Costa Brava
description:
The space
Mas Alegot is originally a barn built in 1903, which was converted with modern architectural criteria into a residential home, respecting the historical context of the original carácter of construction. The interior spaces are characterized by contemporary comfort, tranquility and spaciousness, they are decorated very tasteful and carefully.
The house has a beautiful view to its sprawling garden and the landscape behind: the maize, rice and sunflower fields, the poplar forests and the mountains of Montgri with its imposing castle. The 1000 m2 large garden offers enough space for relaxing moments with a nice swimming pool, 2 leaves covered patios, barbecue, further lawn, a small organic garden, herbs and trees.
Alegot Mas is located at the end of a very small picturesque and quiet village, Fontclara, in the heart of the Empordà, famous for its medieval stone villages like Peratallada, Pals, Palau Sator or Ullastret.

name: Costa Brava, 50 m beach - B1
description:
Apartment in a quiet street in the center of Sant Antoni de Calonge, 50 meters from beach

100 m2 arranged to accommodate up to 8 people (5 beds and a double sofa bed)

Suitable for persons on wheelchair: on street level, with wide corridors and doorways

3 bedrooms (2 double, 1 with bunk bed)
2 bathrooms with shower
Living room with 1 double sofa bed
Satellite TV, Internet WiFi
Private parking for 1 car

The space
Sant Antoni combines a rich medieval history with modern day facilities, offering an ideal place to relax, either on the beach or in the mountains. It lies 2 km away from Palamós, along the seashore path, offering the visitor exceptional views of our coasts.

The beautiful winding path along the "Camino de Ronda", will also take you to Playa de Aro. During the walk, you will be able to sit down and rest on any of the terraces and enjoy the sunshine, even during the winter months.

In
neighborhood_overview:
Shops, supermarkets, restaurants, sea sports rentals, all within 10 minutes walk from the apartment.

Sant Antoni combines a rich medieval history with modern day facilities, offering an ideal place to relax, either on the beach or in the mountains. It lies 2 km away from Palamós, along the seashore path, offering the visitor exceptional views of our coasts.

The beautiful winding path along the "Camino de Ronda", will also take you to Playa de Aro. During the walk, you will be able to sit down and rest on any of the terraces and enjoy the sunshine, even during the winter months.
host_about:
Hello,

We are a family who own a number of apartments and houses
-  Costa Brava, Spain (town of Sant Antoni de Calonge and town of Palamos)

We speak fluent English, French, Danish, Spanish, Catalan, German and Mandarin Chinese.

My father is a diplomat, so we have lived and traveled extensively around the world. We enjoy meeting travelers and try our best to make your stay as enjoyable as possible.

We have contracted cleaning and maintenance staff, available to solve any issue that may come up during your stay, as soon as possible.

Generally Ana (in Spain) will be the ones to meet you at the property and provide tips about the area (she can advise on activities, restaurants, shops...). 

We enjoy good food and wine, sailing (and may be able to take you out on a boat trip locally depending on the dates of your visit), scuba diving, skiing, go-karting, adventure sports in general, entrepreneurial ventures, football, art and architecture, handicrafts etc.

name: Chalet with garden in Costa Brava
description:
The space
Located in a very quiet area, only 5 minutes away from the Golf Club Costa Brava and its practice area. Just 30 Km drive from Girona Airport and just over an hour to Barcelona.

It is a 120 square meters house all in one level surrounded with a garden, on a plot of 430 square meters.
It accommodates up to 8 people. A double bedroom, a twin bedroom (with an optional third pull-out bed) and a triple bedroom with three single beds. Two bathrooms, and full-equipped open kitchen and living room of 30 square meters with a fireplace. There is a great cosy porch with table and chairs to enjoy breakfast lunch or have dinner and a magnificent garden divided in two areas with sunbeds and automatic irrigation sprinkler. Parking is also available. Baby cot is also available upon request.
We do provide bed linen and towels.

The house is renovated and furnished. There is heating and is fully equipped with modern utensils such as dishwasher,

description:

Excellent sea views from the dining room and terrace, where you can enjoy a good meal, glass of wine, cafes, reading a book ..

The space
Nice house in Tossa de Mar, very spacious, very light, and the most attractive ... the sea view, and its beautiful terrace.

Excellent sea views from the dining room and terrace, where you can enjoy a good meal, glass of wine, cafes, reading a book ...

This house, for space and comfort, it is recommended to enjoy a vacation with children, families and groups of friends.

Its excellent location, in a quiet area, at the same time close to the beaches, restaurants, shops, etc ..., an excellent panoramic view, and comfort by the amplitude of the 2 living room and magnificent terrace .... will make this property a place to recommend to friends and family.

Enjoy the
neighborhood_overview:
The house is located a 10 minutes from de beach, but at the same time quiet and close to everything.
Less than 5 minutes walking, you will reach the commercial street with another big supermarket, excellents shops where you can find fresh fish, perfumes, clothes, gifts and much more.
10 minutes away there is the eldest part of town, the walled city of “Vila Vella”. A really beautiful place.


Tossa is a beautiful and quiet town, with a lot of charm. Ideal to travel with your couple, family or with the kids.
It is one of the most beautiful town in all Costa Brava, where you can steel feel the little old town atmosphere and where is not allowed to build tall buildings.
Besides enjoying the beaches, there are a lot other things to do. For example: walk around the old and narrow streets from the walled town "Vila Vella", go the the lighthouse and relax at the "Bar del Far", while you enjoy the incredible views of the rugged coastline and the cliffs. Walk
host_about:
We are Ana and Kristjàn and we’ve been offering accommodation in Tossa de Mar for over thirty years. Seven years ago, we were very happy to found Let’s Holidays.

The passion with which we’ve been working these past years has made us grow, and we now have a vast team of professionals working with us. 
With them, we will make sure to find the best option for you and to get you everything you will need during your stay :)

If there is something that we have learnt this past years is that we like to be treated the same way that we treat you. 
That’s where our philosophy comes from. We like to chat and we will try to get you anything that you need and find solutions to anything that you propose.

At the end, holidays should be exactly the way we want them, right?

We present some of our services :)

The Home Selector is the person who will help you choose the option most appropriate to your tastes. You will save time in searching and finding the best choice.

The Host is the person who will take care of you during the whole stay and try to find anything that you need with the help of the other hosts.

Let’s Holidays Home will be your second holiday home. A place where you will be able to meet with our Hosts, chat, have a glass of wine and listen to some live music.

We’ll love to meet you!

See you soon ;) 

Here you have all our options

name: CAMA EN UNA CASA DE LA COSTA BRAVA
description:
The space
If you want the Costa Brava, we offer two rooms in our house.
We are in a village in the middle of costa.En one of the most beautiful Catalan coast, with a privileged environment for mountain bike excursions, trekking, kayaking, diving, etc. ..
Two cozy private bedrooms in our house.
The rooms are equipped with heating and fans.
The bed linen is provided and towels.
The bathroom is for guests, with two services and a shower.
The price is 50 € for each room, depending on the season.
Breakfast is optional 10 € per room.
The house is in the center of town one of the most picturesque of Catalonia (Begur).
The house is in the oldest part of town but also in a quiet area just 50 meters from the square and the entertainment area as well as the bus stop that takes you to the best beaches of the Costa Brava.
And with direct bus to the city of Barcelona, Girona and the city railway station.

neighborhood_overview:
Ubicado en una zona muy tranquila, ideal para descansar. A 700m de la playa. Supermercado (Jodofi) y restaurantes (Sa Punta, Sivana, Sol i Mar, MUC, etc) a escasos metros de casa.
En la parte trasera de la casa hay un bosque fantástico para hacer senderismo.
A 1km de la casa se encuentra el Parque Natural de Bases de'n Coll donde se puede realizar paseos preciosos totalmente llanos.
Además se pueden realizar excursiones de nivel en la montaña de Torroella de Montgrí.
Cerca de Begur y de Pals pueblo.

name: 'Masia Catalana' s.XVIII    Jardins
description:
The space
Impresionante y exclusiva 'Masia Catalana' s.XVIII, totalmente reformada. Situada en un autentico hogar de ensueño, magnífica situación. Con 45.000 metros cuadrados de jardines botánicos, creados por la paisajista alemana Helha Kurlle. Ésta propiedad dispone de seis hectareas de viñedos. Totalmente vallada que garantiza privacidad y tranquilidad. Rodeada de naturaleza. Piscina exterior de 10 x 6 metros con un magnífico porche y una barbacoa. Amplios salones y magníficas habitaciones dobles con lavabo propio. Está equipada con varios ventiladores y calefacción central. Situada en un entorno privilegiado, a 15 minutos de las mejores playas de la Costa Brava (Tamariu, Pals, S'agaró, Empuries..). Ideal para excursiones a pié, bicicleta, caballo. Estancia mínima 1 semana de sábado a sábado desde 13 Junio hasta Agosto

We like to take care of it and maintain it as it deserves, although, being so close to the sea, it is sometimes a difficult and expensive task.
Decorated according to our style, we want it to have a personal, diaphanous, clean, homey and practical aspect.

The space
Beautiful waterfront home overlooking the bay and the beach.

With 3 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms and a toilet. All exterior
Living room and lounge.
A large terrace with a small garden is the preferred place to enjoy great moments of rest, for lunch and dinner on the outside, to be with family or friends and to 'waste time' watching the comings and goings of the boats and of bathers.

The house is located in the bay of Sa Tuna, facing the sea. Going down the stairs, in 2 minutes you will reach the beach.

name: f21.DUPLEX I - Old Town of Girona
description:
We offer you a very special place, were you will find interesting works of arquitecture and interiorism, vintage and design furniture, originals and classic re-editions, and diferent kinds of art works and objects that we have selected for their historic or artistic value. The building is located in Força street, in the middle of the old jewish quarter of Girona and it was totally renewed in 2006. An eclectic mix that you will enjoy during your stay.

The space
The Força street is the most special street of Girona’s old quarter. It was the neuralgic center of the old Jewish Quarter and during the Roman period this street was part of the Via Augusta. Nowadays it is a beautiful pedestrian street located and it connects the Cathedral square with the center of the city. From this street we can visit the monumental Girona, the most important museums, eat in the best restaurants and have a drink while we enjoy a live jazz concert.

Shared bathroom, sheets and towels.
Free wifi in all rooms , your hosts are very friendly.
Price for double room 40 € for night.
Things that you can do during your stay :
Mountain bike routes , Climbing , Paintball , Horse riding , Diving, Skydiving , Hot Air Balloon Rides , Surf , Golf, Karting, walks on the costal paths through all the coves and beaches of our coast , visit Dali’s museum in Figueres.

name: Costa Brava, 50 m from beach 3
description:
Apartment in a quiet street in the center of Sant Antoni de Calonge, 50 meters from beach
3 bedrooms (2 double, 1 with bunk bed)
2 bathrooms with shower
Living room with balcony
Satellite TV, Internet WiFi
2 balconies
Private parking for 1 car

The space
Sant Antoni combines a rich medieval history with modern day facilities, offering an ideal place to relax, either on the beach or in the mountains. It lies 2 km away from Palamós, along the seashore path, offering the visitor exceptional views of our coasts.

The beautiful winding path along the "Camino de Ronda", will also take you to Playa de Aro. During the walk, you will be able to sit down and rest on any of the terraces and enjoy the sunshine, even during the winter months.

The apartment is:

In a residential building in a quiet street in the center of Sant Antoni de Calonge, one row of houses behind the seafront. 50 meters from the beach
neighborhood_overview:
Shops, supermarkets, restaurants, sea sports rentals, all within 10 minutes walk from the apartment.

Sant Antoni combines a rich medieval history with modern day facilities, offering an ideal place to relax, either on the beach or in the mountains. It lies 2 km away from Palamós, along the seashore path, offering the visitor exceptional views of our coasts.

The beautiful winding path along the "Camino de Ronda", will also take you to Playa de Aro. During the walk, you will be able to sit down and rest on any of the terraces and enjoy the sunshine, even during the winter months.
host_about:
Hello,

We are a family who own a number of apartments and houses
-  Costa Brava, Spain (town of Sant Antoni de Calonge and town of Palamos)

We speak fluent English, French, Danish, Spanish, Catalan, German and Mandarin Chinese.

My father is a diplomat, so we have lived and traveled extensively around the world. We enjoy meeting travelers and try our best to make your stay as enjoyable as possible.

We have contracted cleaning and maintenance staff, available to solve any issue that may come up during your stay, as soon as possible.

Generally Ana (in Spain) will be the ones to meet you at the property and provide tips about the area (she can advise on activities, restaurants, shops...). 

We enjoy good food and wine, sailing (and may be able to take you out on a boat trip locally depending on the dates of your visit), scuba diving, skiing, go-karting, adventure sports in general, entrepreneurial ventures, football, art and architecture, handicrafts etc.

name: Charming & cosy House in Costa Brava
description:
Lovely rustic house in the center of Begur at 3 minutes walk of the church square with high quality finishes. The pool is ideal for cooling off.
The house is very quiet as it is not a through street.
One Parking spot at the front door of the house.
Entire three floor house, with three bedrooms: two small with shared bathroom, and a main Suite with super bath!

The space
Lovely charming house. Rebuild in 1985, in an old style, it looks like a much more rustic and antique house, using old materials and construction techniques, having the best finishing and high quality materials. The house has been restored two years ago.
It has three bed rooms. Two of them were thought for the children, which share a common bathroom.
The third and principal room, is a fantastic suite, with a huge dressing room and bathroom (around more than 40 squared meters). Shower and bath are surrounded by plants and a glass door to the terrace-garden where lots of lig
neighborhood_overview: The best of my house, is that it is at a walking distance of the center of the Village, being able to enjoy of Cafeterias, Restaurants and other services without having to take the car. And to go to the beautiful beaches and creeks of Begur and surroundings, you will be on a 4 to 90 Km drive to most of them.
host_about:
Tengo 50 años y administro mis propiedades como actividad principal. 
Mi último proyecto ha sido hacerme con la propiedad de una Masia en la frontera del Gironés con la Garrotxa, a 30 minutos de la entrada de Girona. 
Me ocupo del mantenimiento de la Masía, su jardín y bosque, me procuran trabajo de ajardinar, limpieza del bosque, cuidado del pequeño huerto (por ahora) además de ocuparme de las obras de restauración de la Masía. 
Aprecio de mis clientes que sepan valorar el comfort y la calidad de los espacios que me he dedicado a restaurar. Me tomo muy en serio el aspecto de dejar las viviendas en perfectas condiciones, con todos sus detalles, además de darles un estilo clássico y natural gacias a la ayuda de mi mujer Bea que tiene un buen gusto para los detalles.
Me gusta el orden y la limpieza, y espero de la gente que así lo sean. 
Somos una pareja que apreciamos tener gente de todas las edades. Apreciamos la gente que busca un sitio auténtico donde pasar unos días tanto buscando la tranquilidad como para festejar con amigos.

description:
Es una casa de 3 plantas. En la primera planta está el recibidor, la cocina Bulthaup y una habitación con baño. Subiendo las escaleras hasta la segunda planta, encontramos una habitación abuhardillada con dos camas individuales, un baño completo de mármol y un comedor y sala d'estar con chimenea y tv de 50 pulgadas. En la última planta encontramos la habitación principal con cama doble con las vistas a la ciudad de Girona. Wifi gratis.

The space
El apartamento se encuentra en pleno barrio Medieval.

A 20 minutos a pie de la estación de tren y autobuses.

neighborhood_overview:
The apartment is located in a centric zona, but at the same time quiet and close to everything.
Distance to the beach is just 1 minute walking, just as a big supermarket and restaurants.
Less than 3 minutes walking, you will reach the commercial street with another big supermarket, excellents shops where you can find fresh fish, perfumes, clothes, gifts and much more.
Five minutes away there is the eldest part of town, the walled city of “Vila Vella”. A really beautiful place.


Tossa is a beautiful and quiet town, with a lot of charm. Ideal to travel with your couple, family or with the kids.
It is one of the most beautiful town in all Costa Brava, where you can steel feel the little old town atmosphere and where is not allowed to build tall buildings.
Besides enjoying the beaches, there are a lot other things to do. For example: walk around the old and narrow streets from the walled town "Vila Vella", go the the lighthouse and relax at the "Ba
host_about:
We are Ana and Kristjàn and we’ve been offering accommodation in Tossa de Mar for over thirty years. Seven years ago, we were very happy to found Let’s Holidays.

The passion with which we’ve been working these past years has made us grow, and we now have a vast team of professionals working with us. 
With them, we will make sure to find the best option for you and to get you everything you will need during your stay :)

If there is something that we have learnt this past years is that we like to be treated the same way that we treat you. 
That’s where our philosophy comes from. We like to chat and we will try to get you anything that you need and find solutions to anything that you propose.

At the end, holidays should be exactly the way we want them, right?

We present some of our services :)

The Home Selector is the person who will help you choose the option most appropriate to your tastes. You will save time in searching and finding the best choice.

The Host is the person who will take care of you during the whole stay and try to find anything that you need with the help of the other hosts.

Let’s Holidays Home will be your second holiday home. A place where you will be able to meet with our Hosts, chat, have a glass of wine and listen to some live music.

We’ll love to meet you!

See you soon ;) 

Here you have all our options

name: Together w family·friends in cozy apartment-lofts!
description:
Organize a holiday reunion together with family members or friends. We have 3 apartments for an independent stay use with central-heating for 3 fam. or 13 'pers. You can apart hire an extra separate large room having a wood stove celebrating a party.

The space
Can Banal is a former Catalan farmhouse called "masía" from the XVI century. Since 1987 it has been our home and camping business. Since 2012 we have been able to open up 3 holiday apartments on the upper floor that can be rented all 3 together for a group, specially 3 or 4 families "together but not mixed". The apartments can accommodate 3 '- 5' - 6 '= 14 persons in total. Besides there is a large room, beware rather rustic style, for a party event. We rent it out apart including a simple kitchen, wood stove with firewood and music-equipment. Consult us the price.

The apartments are independent multi space rooms containing bedroom, kitchen with dining area and bathroom. All have central heating
neighborhood_overview:
Can Banal is situated in the beginning of the Catalan Pyrenees, in a region called “Alta Garrotxa”. Located midway between the sea-shore (45 min) and the high mountains of the Pyrenees (1h) makes it possible for many types of day-trips.
Close to many interesting places of cultural, natural or gourmet aspects like Castelfullit de la Roca, Besalu, the Garrotxa Volcanic Park or Olot.
Within a 6 km drive, Sadernes is reached from where the wonderful trekking path towards Sant Aniol d'Aguja starts.

The landscape around Can Banal is peaceful and rural, with rivers and forests that changes colors depending on the season. In autumn there are varieties of mushrooms and in spring many types of orchids and butterflies to enjoy.

If you just decides to stay around in Can Banal you'll find enough to do for few days. Walk our own signed trails along water creeks, fields, forests, hermitage, farms and villages round us. We have mountain bike’s to rent and in a 25' walk
host_about:
Hola, we are Stendert & Maria

We live in Mas Can Banal for many years. Stendert, born '51, originally is from Breda-Holland, and Maria, born '66, is from Stockholm-Sweden, where her parents once had arrived from Spain. We enjoy very much living here in the countryside surrounded by hills, forests, and rivers. Halfway to the sea and to the high mountains.

We are accompanied by our daughter Saskia born '02 and Stendert's son - Luuk, born  '93, who works in our village and in their spare time help us.

Our professions are of the most diverse; Maria studied interior design and artistic glass techniques and Stendert studied to become a tropical agronomist and later carpentry. Probably this multifaceted mixture connects us with many diverse interests and activities, especially the maintenance of CB with its forest, animals, and agro-tourism.

We hope to be able to combine these aspects of us and make your stay as pleasant and memorable as possible. Together, we speak 7 European languages and understand a few more. We like very much to tell you about our favorite places, help you out for more personal advice and add if there is a special event going on.

  Welcome·Bienvenidos·Welkom·Benvinguts·Välmommen·Bienvenue·Willkommen

Hola somos Maria and Stendert

Vivimos en Mas Can Banal desde hace muchos años. Stendert, nacido '51, originario de Breda , Holanda y María, nacida '66, de Estocolmo- Suecia , donde sus padres una vez llegaron desde España . Nos gusta mucho vivir aquí en el campo, rodeado de colinas, bosques y ríos. A mitad de camino hacia el mar y la mitad del camino a las altas montañas.

Nos acompaña nuestra hija Saskia, nacida '02 y Luuk, hijo de Stendert,  nacido en el '93, que trabaja en nuestro pueblo. Ambos en sus ratos libres nos ayudan en diferentes tareas.

Nuestras profesiones son de la más diversa; María estudió diseño de interiores y técnicas de vidrio artístico y Stendert estudió para ser ingeniero agrónomo tropical y mas tarde carpintería. Probablemente esta mezcla multifacética , nos conecta con muchos diversos intereses y actividades, en especial el mantenimiento de CB con su bosque, los animales y el agroturismo.

Esperamos ser capaces de combinar estos aspectos de nosotros y como hacer que su estancia sea lo más agradable y memorable como sea posible. En conjunto, se habla 7 idiomas europeos y entender algunos pocos más. Nos gusta mucho que decir acerca de nuestros lugares favoritos, ayudará a cabo el asesoramiento más personal y añadir si hay un evento especial ocurre.

neighborhood_overview:
ABOUT OUR VILLAGE : LLAMPAIES

The small community of Llampaies is situated towards the east of the region, not far from Camallera (2 km), where all kinds of amenities are available. The surrounding countryside boasts gentle rolling hills, farmland and coniferous woodlands.

The tiny center of Llampaies is formed of typical local houses. The quarter around the church is the oldest part of the village. Around 100 meters to the north, is the smaller Vecindario del Puig, a group of houses, built in the 17th and 18th centuries. 200 meters from Vecindario del Puig is the Vecindario de los Masos. Some of the houses here date from the end of the 18th century, although the majority were built in the 19th century. There are around 100 people living in the center.
host_name: Turisme Rural Can Gat Vell SCP
host_about: Haber realizado mi sueño de hace más de 20 años me hace muy feliz. Desde Mayo del 2013 vivimos mi marido y mis dos hijos Roger y Oriol en una masía rural Can Gat Vell, en un núcleo de 100 habitantes y a 2 km de Camallera. Me encanta estar en contacto con las personas, ayudarles en lo máximo que pueda y prestarles todos los servicios para que estén satisfechos. Después de 23 años de vivir en la ciudad de Barcelona, vivir aquí en una casa rodeada de casas medievales y campos es un cambio radical necesario para volver a disfrutar de la vida y la verdad muy bonito.

neighborhood_overview:
The apartment is located in a residential zone, privileged for being quiet, its incredible views but at the same time near everything.
Distance from the beach is just 8 minutes walking. Restaurants are 4 minutes walking, there is a little supermarket 6 minutes away and a big one, 10 minutes away.
Just 8 minutes away, you can find the old walled city “Vila Vella”. A really beautiful place.
The sensation of being apart from the noises and living that peace in plain summer, listen to the birds sing, and decide when to leave this peace and go to the center, without car, its one of the best qualities of this zone.

Tossa is a beautiful and quiet town, with a lot of charm. Ideal to travel with your couple, family or with the kids.
It is one of the most beautiful town in all Costa Brava, where you can steel feel the little old town atmosphere and where is not allowed to build tall buildings.
Besides enjoying the beaches, there are a lot other things to do.
host_about:
We are Ana and Kristjàn and we’ve been offering accommodation in Tossa de Mar for over thirty years. Seven years ago, we were very happy to found Let’s Holidays.

The passion with which we’ve been working these past years has made us grow, and we now have a vast team of professionals working with us. 
With them, we will make sure to find the best option for you and to get you everything you will need during your stay :)

If there is something that we have learnt this past years is that we like to be treated the same way that we treat you. 
That’s where our philosophy comes from. We like to chat and we will try to get you anything that you need and find solutions to anything that you propose.

At the end, holidays should be exactly the way we want them, right?

We present some of our services :)

The Home Selector is the person who will help you choose the option most appropriate to your tastes. You will save time in searching and finding the best choice.

The Host is the person who will take care of you during the whole stay and try to find anything that you need with the help of the other hosts.

Let’s Holidays Home will be your second holiday home. A place where you will be able to meet with our Hosts, chat, have a glass of wine and listen to some live music.

We’ll love to meet you!

See you soon ;)

The space
Sant Hilari Sacalm es un pueblo de media montaña reconocido por sus aguas medicinales, y su tranquilidad. Rodeado de montañas y bosques nos ofrece gran cantidad de excursiones para los amantes de la naturaleza. La casa está construida en la cima de una colina, y tiene todo el pueblo a sus pies, siendo un verdadero paseo llegar al centro. Una vivienda cómoda y confortable que cuenta con unas estancias muy espaciosas ideal para encuentros familiares o salidas con el grupo de amigos en busca de intimidad. El jardín que rodea la casa garantiza esta intimidad, al mismo tiempo que les acerca al pueblo.

neighborhood_overview: El barrio donde se encuentra la casa es una urbanización privada, de carácter familiar, donde residen cuatro famílias más, agradables, dicretas y que aceptan plenamente recibir huéspedes en la propiedad.

The space
La Casanova fue construida a principios del siglo XX, en el año 1921. Recientemente, ha sido restaurada en piedra y madera, siguiendo el modelo original y la tradición arquitectónica local; y respetando así mismo, los colores preexistentes a su restauración.

La casa, el jardín respiran un clima de sosiego y tranquilidad; siendo –con la armonía de sus espacios interiores y exteriores- un lugar ideal para la calma y el descanso.

name: El Badiu d'Alemanys 5
description:
Exclusive rental property in the historical core of Girona

The space
Located in the heart of Girona's medieval quarter, inside the original city walls and overlooking Sant Domènec square, is the property Alemanys 5, whose original building dates from the sixteenth century.

Its recent restoration integrates old and new, with sober, clean lines that celebrate essential elements such as space, sunlight, shade, fire, stone, nature, water and silence.

The house is available to be rented as a whole unit, but it also can be divided into two independent apartments: "El Badiu" and "El Jardi".

"El Badiu" (The Veranda) is a 180 m2 duplex apartment equipped with a master suite and two junior suites, a fully equipped gourmet kitchen-dining space, spacious living room with fireplace and a spectacular sunny veranda terrace facing south, with exclusive views over the old quarter of Girona. Its capacity is up to 6 people.

name: Old house in the heart of Cadaques
description:
The space
This house is located in the heart of Cadaques, just a few steps from the church and walking distance to the beach, supermarkets, bars, shops and entertainments. You have everything you need around the corner, where the atmosphere is alive, authentic and full of local colour.

The entrance of the house opens to a dinning room that adjoins to a kitchen fully equipped with everything you need for cooking. Then a staircase connects you to the first floor with 2 different bedrooms and a bathroom. They both have windows, one facing the old village, the other one facing the sea. On the second floor there’s a big living room with a fireplace and a wonderful view to the sea. Going up the staircase, you’ll get to the last floor with the main bedroom and its private bathroom and a terrace overlooking the old village and the sea.

The house has washing machine, dishwasher, freezer and everything you need to enjoy your holidays. It also has a fireplac

Hola, Soy Victoria (y familia) y acogemos a huéspedes desde 2010 aqui en Cadaques. Hello, I'm Victoria (and little family) and we've been receiving guests since 2010 here in Cadaques. We live here the whole year round and we know almost every secret from this little corner of the world, and we love to share them with our guests, making these stays not like a simple stay but like whole experience; we love to recommend nice restaurants, routes to walk around, little corners to discover, etc... please be welcome home!

The Conservatroy is the only room with its own entrance, and has an en suite bathroom.

Can Portell” has both the sea and mountains on its doorstep, is not far from the vibrant town of Girona, and only half an hour’s drive from the airport. Not only is it easy to get to, but Can Portell caters to everyone’s needs.

Ideal in times of Covid 19 pandemic !
Spanning three levels, with windows in every room, most with perfect views of the Mediterranean sea. Each morning you can watch the sun rise from any window and enjoy your breakfast on the main terrace.
The house has direct access to the sea, with private stairs and an almost private "beach", perfect for a morning swim or water skiing.
Walking distance to the village, relax to the sound of the sea.

The space
15 people can sleep comfortably and the house is great for entertaining. This home is spacious and has many comfortable indoor and outdoor living areas. Your direct access to the sea is unique and you can sunbathe on the lower level private terrace.

name: Charming house in Costa Brava, with swimming pool
description:
House in a medieval town of Empordá, Costa Brava. Close to the beaches and the best places on the Costa Brava.

The space
Charming house in a Medival Town in the Costa Brava.
Llofriu is a fantastic location in the centre of the Gold Triangle, near to beaches of Begur, Llafranc, Calella and Tamariu and only a few minutes from fabulous Golf fields.
The first reference of the town is from the X century with only 100 people living in it.
Twenty-five minutes from Girona, one hour and a half from Barcelona and 40 minutes from the French border.
The house has 200 square meters, four rooms, three bathrooms, a modern, fully equipped kitchen, a lovely garden and a swimming pool.
Exterior BBQ, bicycles.
You will stay in a beautiful place, quiet, but near to everything.

Other things to note
We don't rent the house in the high season for less than one week (June_ September).

name: Beautiful Apartment La Fosca
description:
Comfortable duplex apartment only 500 m from La Fosca beach. 3 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, perfecly equipped kitchen, living and dining room, confortable terrace with garden furniture and view. Perfect for families and couples all year round

The space
This comfortable apartment is just 500 m from one of the most beautiful beaches on the Costa Brava -¨la Fosca¨. It is a very spacious, comfortable and and tastefully decorated apartment, on the first floor of a large villa which has been converted into 5 units.
The apartment is 130 m2 and takes up two floors. The large living room is furnished with cosy sofas, nestled into a niche near the open fireplace, flatscreen TV and a stereo with speakers in every room. The living room is connected to a dining room with access to the roofed terrace. A wooden staircase leads up to a mezzanine that is also furnished with sofas. This floor also has a laundry room with a washing machine. The adjacent kitchen is very well equip
neighborhood_overview: This lovely apartment is in a quiet residential area, only 500 m from the beach, 400 m from the nearest restaurant and 800 m from the nearest shop. The nearest large beach town Palamós, where there are lots of supermarkets, bars, restaurants, shops and other leisure facilities is just 4 km away. This region is famous for its wonderful beaches in craggy bays with crystal clear blue seas. There are lots of places nearby where you can enjoy water sports and other activities like cycling, hiking, golf, tennis and horse riding.
host_about: I have been working with tourist apartments in the center of Barcelona and villas in Catalonia uring the last 10 years and would be happy to help you find the best choice for your perfect stay in Catalonia.

name: Hermosa casa por el precio de un apartamiento
description:
!! LA PISCINA Y EL PARQUE SON SOLO PARA INQUILINOS !En la otra mitad de la casa, los dueños viven con su hija y nunca usan la piscina ni jardin.!!!
La mitad de la casa con tres dormitorios, salón, cocina, terrazas, piscina, barbacoa y todo el equipamiento necesario se alquila en una casa de la Costa Brava, a 30 km de la frontera con Francia. En todas partes hay aire acondicionado.
Estacionamiento gratuito para dos COCHES.

Guest access
Además de los dormitorios, la sala de estar y las terrazas, los huéspedes tienen acceso a todo el equipo de la cocina, el lavadero, los 6 acres de jardín, incluida la oportunidad de usar una barbacoa, el uso de la piscina.
El jardín y la piscina son utilizados únicamente por inquilinos.
La segunda parte de la casa está completamente aislada, en la segunda parte hay propietarios que nunca entran al jardín y no usan la piscina !!!!!!

Other things to note
podemos alquilar bicicletas, raqueta

description:
- Extremely comfortable house, all fenced-in huge garden, 1 min. walk (50 metres) to the beach.
- 250m2 house, 600m2 garden.
- Accomodates 8 in 4 double bedrooms.
- Surrounding towns: Platja d'Aro, S.Feliu de Guixols, Tossa, Pals, or Cadaqués.
- Great restaurants: Can Roca (world's best 2013) or Massana (1 Michelin star), Girona.

The space
1 min. walk from beach, 600m2 garden with fabulous pine-trees. Spacious, well-designed, comfortable, tastely furnished ground-floor family house.

Accomodates up to 8 people.

We do not let the house for under a fortnight in high season.

Guest access
WI-FI, central-heating, fireplace, air-conditioning in living-room with TV set, 4 spacious double bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, 1 ample kitchen, pantry, washing and drying area, entrance hall, garage, several outside sitting-areas.

The fabulous beach, the impressive walks along the cliffs, the restaurants, the shopping areas in Platja d'Aro (10 mins. away by car) and the fresh fish and vegetable market in S.Feliu de Guixols.
Barcelona is 1 hour away and Girona, a shopping and historical center worth visiting, is 30 min. away.
host_about:
We are Coco and Montse, co-owners of the property, both living in Girona. Our guests are really happy! We'd love you to give us a chance to stay at our house in St. Pol/s'Agaró, only 50 metres away from the sea!
We can speak English, French, Italian, Catalan and Spanish.
Our aim is for guests to feel at home. For example, beds are ready-made for them on arrival and toiletries and welcome food are provided.
Our summer residence is officially registered and approved for renting.

BEST HOLIDAY ON THE COSTA BRAVA THAT YOU CAN THINK OF!

The space
Family apartment in S'AGARO, in one of the nicest beaches on the Costa Brava.
Top floor corner flat. Overlooking the beach, in a private gated condominium with large pool, beautiful gardens. 2 min walk to the beach.
1 master bedroom with en-suite bathroom. 2 further bedrooms. 1 further bathroom with bath tub.
Large terrace with solarium area and a further large terrace upstairs.
All modern facilities, flat screen 46" TV, wifi, etc

Cleaning lady 3 times a week at 2 hours per day.
Sport facilities nearby such as sailing, kayaking, water-skiing, tennis, golf, etc. Cycling lanes and marked beautiful walks by the sea.
Lovely restaurants nearby, within walking distance.

Easy access from Barcelona and Girona airports.

name: Unique cosy holiday paradise, in nature!
description:
A very pretty and cosy holiday home with a lot of character, beautiful views and loads of peace and quiet and the prettiest sunsets!
The perfect place to fully disconnect and enjoy nature, yet only 10 minutes from the village and at a 20 minutes distance from the beach...! At a short distance from Impressive Girona and bustling Barcelona, a perfect base to explore the incredibly beautiful Costa Brava área! And....we have the best suggestions to fully enjoy your stay! Caulès is a smoke free area!

The space
Visiting the Costa Brava? Or planning to visit Barcelona of historic Girona? Come and stay in our very beautiful and romantic "Petit Caules" the converted stables of our 15th century (once) farmhouse in the Massis de Cadiretes natural park.
The view on the hills is incredible. You can relax in the swimmingpool, which is set in the garden behind the house, surrounded by trees so very secluded!

Petit Caulès has a large, "panorama view" livin
neighborhood_overview:
Georgeous beaches and bays 25 minutes, an incredible view on Montseny mountain,
Impressive Girona 30 minutes, romantic medieval villages all around! Spectacular Barcelona 50 minutes (also by train!) Plenty to discover along the worldfamous breathtaking Costa Brava coastline and inland. I will be happy to suggest daytrips as I am a tourist Guide as well.

The village of Vidreres 10 minutes, Tossa de Mar 20 minutes as well as Lloret de Mar 20 minutes. France only 1 hour.
host_about: I am part Dutch, part Indonesian, my husband Xavi is Catalan! I work free-lance as a guide, Xavi is orginially a muscician and a succesfull in bio/ecological construction. We have two Lady dogs, LaLa and Rosa......!

name: Catalan Farmhouse Apartment with Mountain Views
description:
Can Cruanyes (complex of 4 private apartments with shared gardens) is a unique holiday escape, immersed in the rich culture and stunning scenery of the Spanish Pyrenees, and perfectly situated between the mountains and the exquisite beaches of the Costa Brava.

This Catalan farmhouse will be your private slice of rural bliss. We give you everything you'll need to feel at home, while still enjoying the comforts and ease of hotel-style convenience.

The space
From the ruins of the 400 year old farmhouse, three beautifully restored apartments have emerged, each retaining its own individual historic charm, while embracing some of the modern touches of interior design.

Secluded in twenty acres of peaceful woodland and paddocks, this Catalan farmhouse is a perfect destination for families and friends. The large swimming pool, play area and games garden all have views up to the imposing peaks of the mountains or down to the valley beyond.
neighborhood_overview: Can Cruanyes resides within the foothills of the Pyrenees where you can enjoy beautiful rural and mountain surroundings while remaining well connected to local amenities and the beaches of the Costa Brava. We are well connected also the local villages and towns including Tortella where you can buy all the basics including artesan bread and fresh fruit and vegetables. Besalu with many restaurants is only 10 minutes by car.
host_about: I'm Donny from Ireland and I enjoy meeting people from all over the world. I don't travel as much as before I had kids but meeting my guests helps me feel like I'm still travelling and learning about new cultures. I love helping people discover the area, and letting them in on the little local gems that I've discovered over the years.

The space
This artistic apartment has 3 bedrooms & 2 bathrooms (1with bath, 1with shower) & a modern fully equipped kitchen. The living room opens onto a sunny terrace, brilliant for a good book & glass of wine. The flat is well situated; just 1 min from a local supermarkets and petrol station.
Why not trying the world No.2 restaurant Cellar de Can Roca Girona's own Michelin star restaurant run by 3 brothers or have a €9 lunch menu at lots of family run venues. There are never a shortage of activities, visit Barcelona or nearby Dali Museums, discover the nearby coast, walk medieval mountain towns or just relax in Girona.

name: Tamariu: the most exclusive and quiet beach
description:
Only 150 m. to the beach.
The house retains its old charm if well is fully equipped with a modern kitchen and two bathrooms.
Private access.
Terrace and patio to eat and relax.
Perfect interior temperature in Summer (air conditioning not needed)

The space
We are in the heart of Costa Brava. Tamariu is the most exclusive and quiet beach in the coast.

Tamariu is situated in a small secluded bay between the towns of Begur and Palafrugell. Small coves set amongst rugged tree-lined cliffs, crystal clear water and beautiful beaches have made the area famous the world over for its beauty. Originally a small fishing village, Tamariu has not been over developed and has retained its identity and charm.

There are some new villas and apartments on the edge of the village and like everywhere the village center and beach gets busy in August, but you will find no high rise hotels or English pubs.

Our three bedroom,
neighborhood_overview: sin registro
host_about:
Lupe es supervisora en un gran hospital y Ramon es gestor en un tribunal de justicia.
Nuestra pasión es viajar y gozar de nuestro refugio en la playa de Tamariu. 
Nuestro mayor deseo es que nuestros huéspedes se sientan tan felices en casa como nosotros. Haremos todo lo posible para que disfrutéis vuestra estancia en la Costa Brava.

name: Beautiful house with spectacular views
description:
Beautiful house with spectacular views of the bay of El Port de la Selva, on the Costa Brava, and steps away from the Natural Reserve of Cap de Creus.
Sleeps 7 people and is 5 minutes by car from the village and beaches, also reachable by foot.

(HUTG-017508)

The space
Located in the charming fishing village of El Port de la Selva, on the Costa Brava, "Giraluna" is a beautiful rustic-style villa with lots of character. It is situated among pine trees on the top of a hillside and enjoys spectacular views over the village, the bay and the mountains. The location is very tranquil, just 30 meters from the entrance to the protected reserve of the Natural Park of Cap de Creus, though very close to the centre of the village and the beaches, easily accessible by car and on foot.

"Giraluna" has a capacity for seven people distributed between 3 double bedrooms with their respective bathrooms, two with panoramic views. The kitchen is well equipped

name: Can Cirera, rural house in Girona
description:
It is a rural house, ideal for families or groups of up to 8 people. Located on the Costa Brava, near Girona, Banyoles, Olot i Figueres. For excursions, nature, culture, ... The legal numer of regist. Generalitat de Catalunya is PG-000234

The space
Can Cirera is a farmhouse independent. The whole house is to rent. It has 4 bedrooms (2 double and 2 single beds) with 2 bathrooms.
Kitchen with fireplace, oven, refrigerator, microwave, hot water, washing machine, hairdryer, ...

Great room for leisure, with small team of music, tv, games, ...
One room has been adapted in the block, keeping the dining room, and three layers (a kind of hole wall, where the hens laid eggs).
20 minutes: MUSEUM DALÍ, in Figueres
20 minutes: GIRONA, capital city, different museums like the Museum of Cinema, and old quarter, cathedral
20 minutes: OLOT, volcanic city
5 minutes: BANYOLES, lake city

VIRITUAL VISIT OF THE HOUSE
neighborhood_overview: sin registro
host_about: La meva família i jo tenim la casa des del 1.997, va ser tan bonic viure-hi, que vam decidir convertir-la amb casa rural, amb l'objectiu de tenir la possibilitat que famílies o grups d'amics, fessin estades d'uns dies per viure la bona energia que té. Va ser construïda al 1.778, és de pedra, l'hem restaurat, adaptant-la a que hi ha totes les comoditats per disfrutar-la. Les cases abans no les feien com ara, tardaven el que fes falta, les construïen amb paciència, les feien al lloc més adequat, tenint en compte el lloc, el sol, la solidesa, la seva energia, ... Té alguna cosa màgica, no és espectacular, però si és bonica, acollidora i a mesura d'estar-hi fa que t'agradi cada vegada més.

name: Mas Pinoses
description:
The space
Mas Pinoses es una masía típica catalana donde podrá disfrutar de la tranquilidad en medio de la naturaleza, en un entorno privilegiado, de fácil acceso y muy bien comunicada.

Dispone de un alojamiento rural independiente en el antiguo pajar, totalmente restaurado, con capacidad para 6 personas, y equipado con todo lo necesario para ofrecer el máximo confort y bienestar:

name: Schöne Villa Meerblick private Pool Costa Brava
description:
Large villa with pool and sea view, in Playa de Aro, Costa Brava. Only 1 Km way from the lovely sand beaches and 1,5 Km from the center.
The house has 4 bedrooms and 3 bathroom, 2 bathrooms are en suite. Open nice white kitchen, lovely lounge and dining room and a large terrace with sea view.

The space
Our villa is only 1 Km from the sea and at about 1,5 km to Platja D'Aro center. It has a lovely panoramic view across the sea and the Palamos harbour. From the terrace you can sea the boats and sometimes cruise ships passing by. There is enough space for 8 persons. There are 2 bedrooms en suite, the suite upstairs has its own terrace. In total there are 4 bedrooms three bathrooms. The pool area has also a barbecue for lovely romantic nights and dining outside.
The villa is detached and has a lovely garden.
It is ideal for two families or a group of friends up to 8 persons.

name: Apartment with garden near lake
description:
The space
A 100m2 apartment with a 70m2 garden, in front of the lake and the park “la Draga”. The area has all the necessary services (shops, library, bars and restaurants, kindergartens ...) and is 5' from the historic center of Banyoles, 8' walk from the public swimming area of the lake and 5’ from the Sports Club and pools, 40' from the Costa Brava. The apartment has 4 bedrooms (1 suite, 1 twin and two singles), two bathrooms, a large lounge and kitchen, a garden and two terraces. The garden, allows a comfortable stay on wood or earth, with awnings and total privacy. From Girona, there is a direct bus service to Banyoles, that stops 2' from the apartment . It also has all the necessary appliances (oven, stove, refrigerator, microwave, blender, mixer, washing machine and dryer, ....) . Additionally to the garden, there is another terrace with views to the park, and an interior one used as laundry. There is plenty of available parking area around.

Banyole

neighborhood_overview: sin registro
host_about: Soy una perdona afable, amigo de mis amigos. Lo que mas me gusta es viajar y conecer diferentes culturas y paises. He viitado la mayoria de paises de Europa y mis preferidos son los nordicos. Soy bastante cinefilo, me gustan la mayoria de peliculas en especial las de acción. En la musica tambien me gusta un poco de todo però tengo debilidad por la musica tecno de los 80. Mi comida preferida es toda la italiana, desde pizza a todo tipo de pasta. No soy muy amante de la lectura, ya que prefiero navegar por internet cuando tengo tiempo. En la television mis programas predilectos són la series, primcipalmente: csi, espartacus, the walking dead, etc. Me considero buen invitado así como anfitrion. Las personas que se alojen en mi casa tendran siempre una trato exquisito, como si estuvieran en su casa.

name: Casa rural Siglo XVIII en Pals - Costa Brava
description:
Preciosa casa del siglo XVII en Pals, ubicada dentro del recinto gótico.
Rehabilitada de lujo y decorada con muebles comprados en anticuarios y rebuscando por mercadillos.El resultado es una decoración muy cálida y acogedora.
La casa tiene 150 m2.
3 habitaciones dobles.
2 baños.
Cocina-office con chimenea.
Salon. Dispone de 2 sofás-camas individuales.
Terraza fantástica con unas vistas impresionantes. Dispone de mesas para poder tomar un aperitivo o comida y una zona de chill-out para relajarse.

The space
Magnifica casa del siglo XVII rehabilitada con encanto, dentro del casco antiguo de Pals.
Zona muy céntrica y muy tranquila.
Ideal para parejas o familias con
hijos.
La casa dispone de una distribución muy amplia y tiene todos los medios para poder disfrutar y sentirse como en casa, dentro de un ambiente acogedor y confortable.
Dentro del pueblo y a un paso de la casa caminando, hay de todo, supermerca
neighborhood_overview:
Es una autentica casa de pueblo ubicada en el casco antiguo de Pals, uno de los pueblos medievales con mayor encanto del Ampurdan. Tiene un premio de Bellas Artes.
Excelente comunicación con Barcelona, Gerona y Francia.
La casa esta ubicada en el llamado triangulo de oro, muy cerca de la playa de Pals a 4Km. así como de otras playas de aguas de color turquesa muy bonitas.
Hay innumerables y auténticos pueblos medievales para visitar, así como el Museo Dali ubicado en el pueblo de Figueras y el castillo de Pubol donde se encuentra enterrada Gala la mujer de Dali.
Pals esta a una distancia de 35 Km. de Gerona, una ciudad interesante para conocer ... barrio judío, catedral, etc...
host_about:
Soy Interiorista, Ceramista y Agente Inmobiliario. Me dedico a la rehabilitación de casas , locales, hoteles, etc... Arquitectura en general así como al tema inmobiliario; compra-venta y alquiler de inmuebles.
Alegre y con muchas ganas de vivir y de disfrutar con mis amigos organizando eventos diferentes: comidas con vinito, ver películas, exposiciones de Arte, salidas en bicicleta...

name: Rustical apt. 5 people, pool, beach 17km
description:
A space of 60 m2, in the first floor of the farmhouse. Kitchen and dining room, with a fireplace and TV. Microwave. One bedroom with a double bed and a single bed. Bath/bidet/WC. L’Eixida: a bedroom with double bed, bathroom/WC. Balcony 8m2. WI-FI.

The space
Can Gat Vell are two farmhouses completely restored and adapted in 6 apartments. Capacity from 2 until 35 people. Gat Vell is the best place to organize meetings with family, friends and also for business.
The property is the departure to excursions, culture walkings and for gastronomy roads in the whole region.
Can Gat Vell is very well communicated, at only 2 km from motorway AP7. Best beaches of the Costa Brava at 17 km. At less than 30 km, we have Girona, Figueres. The volcans region of La Garrotxa is at only 46 km. Border with France at 35 mn.
Properties have areas to be shared in order to enjoy the family and the peacefulness. Swimming pool, garden, barbecue, covered terrace. Inside space
neighborhood_overview:
ABOUT OUR VILLAGE : LLAMPAIES

The small community of Llampaies is situated towards the east of the region, not far from Camallera (2 km), where all kinds of amenities are available. The surrounding countryside boasts gentle rolling hills, farmland and coniferous woodlands.

The tiny center of Llampaies is formed of typical local houses. The quarter around the church is the oldest part of the village. Around 100 meters to the north, is the smaller Vecindario del Puig, a group of houses, built in the 17th and 18th centuries. 200 meters from Vecindario del Puig is the Vecindario de los Masos. Some of the houses here date from the end of the 18th century, although the majority were built in the 19th century. There are around 100 people living in the center.
host_name: Turisme Rural Can Gat Vell SCP
host_about: Haber realizado mi sueño de hace más de 20 años me hace muy feliz. Desde Mayo del 2013 vivimos mi marido y mis dos hijos Roger y Oriol en una masía rural Can Gat Vell, en un núcleo de 100 habitantes y a 2 km de Camallera. Me encanta estar en contacto con las personas, ayudarles en lo máximo que pueda y prestarles todos los servicios para que estén satisfechos. Después de 23 años de vivir en la ciudad de Barcelona, vivir aquí en una casa rodeada de casas medievales y campos es un cambio radical necesario para volver a disfrutar de la vida y la verdad muy bonito.
neighbourhood: Saus, Camallera i Llampaies, Catalonia, Spain
