name: COSTA BRAVA, PEACE & 5MIN WALK TO THE BEACH
description:
It is a pleasure to share our Beach House surrounded by Nature 5 min. walk from the beach called Cala Canyelles, on the Costa Brava in a peaceful and unique place.
We offer private room with double bed with private bathroom.
House Exclusively to rest, go to the beach, hammocks to take a siesta, WIFI, Parking. our house has 4 rooms.
These spaces coexist and are shared: terraces, dining rooms, kitchen, gardens.
What to do on the Costa Brava: Hiking, Snorkeling, Kayaking.

The space
Cozy, nice and clean room located 5 MINUTES WALK to the beach at the quiet zone of the Costa Brava.
Authentic Mediterranean beach house of 400m2 where you can discover the Costa Brava beaches, hiking tours along the coast..

You can discover Costa Brava beaches and their unique landscapes.
Spacious house with terraces and gardens where you can have your breakfast or take a nap, living rooms, dining room and common areas with genuine modernistic pai

Quiet and safe neighborhood. Our neighbors are quite far from us. We offer a lot of privacy.
Local restaurant with Mediterranean gastronomy at the beach under the name Restaurant Cala Canyelles.
Bar at the beach for nice sunsets, daily menu, fresh juices...
Supermarket 5 minutes walk from the house.
Bus stop 5 minutes walk.

name: Els Racons del Fort: Castle in wine territory
description:
A stone building from 1694 having a shape of a fortified castle in the village of Capmany only 14 minutes away from Figueres and 26 minutes from Roses.

The fortified construction has a big garden, two terraces, and a covered outdoor space with a pergola. Swimming pool will be ready April 2022.

Capmany has more than ten wineries and your host Yves can teach you about local cuisine in form of: private dinners, hands-on cooking classes, or local experiences visiting wineries and food producers.

The space
The house offers a very unique feeling of the history that has happened inside and outside its walls. It has been renovated in a very respectful way and host Eli has decorated the house to make you feel good during your stay.

For family gatherings, it is possible to rent the apartments too and come together in the garden and pool.

There is also a huge diaphanous space very suitable for diverse activities such as retreats
neighborhood_overview: Capmany is a village with 614 inhabitants and more than 10 wine cellers. Beautiful walks can be done and the closest beach is a 26 min drive away.
host_about:
I was born in Switzerland and live in Barcelona since I am 8 years old.  I love cooking and I have decided to move from online marketing (10 years working in the field) to Cooking Workshops and private cooking events, following my passion in life.  
------

Nací en Suiza y vivo en Barcelona desde los 8 años. Me encanta cocinar y he convertido esta afición en mi ocupación principal, después de 10 años de marketing online.

The house has 3 big doublerooms, and 2 small childrens' room. It has 2 toilettes, one in every floor.
The house is antique, traditionally decorated.
It is fully equipped.

There are neighbours around the house, they are really nice.

name: Exclusive! only 45 m. from the sandy beach
description:
“Can Casellas” is an exclusive 18th. century village house in Sant Antoni de Calonge. The perfect location of our beach house in Costa Brava makes it the perfect place to stay whether you are visiting our area for leisure or business, as in our rental village house one finds exclusive serviced accommodation.

The space
The property has been carefully restored with charm, preserving as far as possible its original constructional features and preserving the architectural wooden beams, vaulted ceilings and centennial stone walls that gives warmth and authenticity to the house. The property has been refurbished without sacrificing comfort in order to offer the visitor a pleasant stay.
Distribution:
* Ground floor: the main entrance gives way to the living room opened on a nice dining room (for 10 pax) located under the original roof with Catalan vault.
From the entrance of the house, a long vaulted corridor leads the visitor to a beautiful well-equippe
neighborhood_overview:
Located in a very quiet area, the house is close to all shops, excellent restaurants and health services.
Every year the local beaches receive the blue flag granted by the European authorities for their uncontaminated crystalline waters.
host_about:
Hello! I'm so glad you are interested in renting one of my three properties here, in the heart of the Costa Brava. Each one has something special to offer our guests, a rustic village house with lots of character, a modern elegant family house and a stylish beach front apartment. 
What I love most about my place is the location, out of the ordinary and  literally steps away from supermarkets, restaurants, and the most beautiful beaches anywhere in Spain.
I work in a local real estate agency and I live only five minutes away from all the properties, I will help you make your stay perfect, just ask. I like to meet guests’ needs from before they even step foot in the door. Every year, at the end of the summer season, together with my husband, we plan a new improvements.  
I am very fortunate in that I get to enjoy where I live all year-round. Each season is a special time here on the Costa Brava!

Mas Torrencito offers its four-legged and human visitors the possibility of actively enjoying the rural tourism of Girona, among the different options that we propose are the routes that surround the unique environment of Mas Torrencito. Holiday cottages Girona Mas torrencito. Our House - Rural Tourism pets girona Make the best of the nature and beauty of the area by foot, by bike or by car, to get lost in long woods or the hills of the empurdanese plain, long routes that without Doubt if you will be short, from forest to costa brava. No doubt an ideal starting point for rural tourism in Girona, especi
neighborhood_overview: It is an "isolated" house with more than 70 hectares of land, where puppies and people can walk to our langillo ... Surrounded by woods and rivers ... a quiet place where silence is only broken by the singing of the Little birds We are 2 kms from Bascara, 14 from Figueres (museum Dali) 19 from the beach (La Rubina, an immense beach where you can go with your pet), 40 from France, 14 from Besalú and Banyoles, ....
host_about:
NIÑOS, PERROS Y CINTAS DE VÍDEO

Mas Torrencito es una casa rural diferente. Una masía del siglo XV, restaurada con un estilo muy personal, y rodeada de campos, bosques y caminos que llegan hasta un río que merece ser escuchado al menos durante un rato. Su propietario, Miguel, se ha encargado de darle su propia personalidad a la casa durante siete años, creando diferentes rincones en los que puedes charlar con tu pareja disfrutando de una buena botella de vino mientras tus hijos juegan libremente por los alrededores, compartir con otros huéspedes costumbres y (Website hidden by Airbnb) de tus mascotas mientras ves cómo ellas disfrutan y se persiguen felices, o subir a la planta de arriba y escoger una de esas películas que tenías pendiente para hacerte un homenaje frente a una gran pantalla. Puedes hacer lo que quieras, porque en Mas Torrencito la libertad se respira a cada momento y en cada lugar.

Marcos, Manuela y Matías, tres de las mascotas de Miguel, son el auténtico espíritu de la casa. Esos tres perros deberían tener contrato indefinido y pensión vitalicia. Ellos muestran la casa a los nuevos huéspedes, sus 8 confortables habitaciones dobles y triples, los baños completos, el salón de techos altos y vigas de madera, el antiguo horno de pan, la sala de entretenimientos, la piscina y el jardín con mobiliario y juegos para niños. Pero también acompañan a los huéspedes durante los paseos, entretienen a mayores y niños con su buen carácter y sus ganas de jugar, y relacionan con las mascotas recién llegadas con paciencia, cariño y una gran amabilidad.

Mientras tanto, Miguel cocina. Y cómo cocina. Platos elaborados con productos de su propia huerta. Recetas que le chivan las madres de los propietarios de los restaurantes de los alrededores. Bizcochos con diferentes sabores, mermeladas, cereales, pan recién hecho y embutidos de la zona, una de las mejores del país en esta especialidad.

Mas Torrencito se puede disfrutar en pareja si te gustan los animales, ya que es una manera de poder disfrutar de su compañía siempre que quieras. También es un lugar ideal para niños, ya que rápidamente se enamorarán de Marcos, Matias y Manuela, probablemente la mejor buscadora de piedras del mundo. Y también es un lugar perfecto para visitar con tu propia mascota, disfrutar de unos días en la naturaleza y que los dos hagáis buenos amigos. En Mas Torrencito te sientes parte de algo, y cada visita es diferente a las demás.

El único problema de Mas Torrencito es que obliga a volver. Yo ya lo he hecho, y no será la única vez.

name: Beautiful old farmhouse with pool I  (PG-503)
description:
Mas Vinyoles is a Catalan countryside house that is partly converted to offer a pleasant space to you to spend your holidays. We have two comfortable apartments fully equipped (central heating, dishwasher, washing machine). There is a garden with a swimming pool and a barbecue, a biological vegetable garden and an orchard.
We are in the heart of the protected area Les Gavarres, a series of lovely hills covered with Mediterranean forest that go from Girona to the Costa Brava.

The space
Mas Vinyoles is at the same time away from it all and close to everything: Beach, mountains, beautiful cities like Girona, Barcelona, Figueres.... After a full and busy day it is wonderfull to retire to it's unique quietness.
Mas Vinyoles is also ideal for people who look for a peaceful spot for working: good internet (fibra optica) and 10% to 30% discount on long term rent.

Guest access
Guests will have access to the swimming pool, a beautiful garde
neighborhood_overview: We are 33 neighbours in the middle of a protected wooden area.
host_about: I live in "Les Gavarres" since 1985 and I love it. To take care of the forest and the wild life has become an important project of my life. I am happy to realise that every year a new variety of birds discover that this is a good place for them to spend at least part of the year.

name: MAS CAMPMOL
description:
MAS CAMPMOL RURAL HOSTEL is the perfect choice for enjoying a quiet holiday in the immediate vicinity of Cistella. It offers spacious rooms with wonderful views, fully equipped kitchen and a variety of modern amenities that enliven your stay.

The space
MAS CAMPMOL RURAL HOSTEL is located outside in a circuit Cistella better, since we are surrounded by mountains, rivers , beaches, lakes ... You can perform a multitude of outdoor activities , suitable for guests of all ages.
 
Hiking
Excursions by mountain rivers
Horseback riding ( with professional oriendador )
Cycling
Pickups wild
 
The hostel is within a circuit of trails that run through dreamlike landscapes . Small mountain villages crossed by crystal clear rivers as Albanyà or San Llorenç de la Muga take us back to the Middle Ages .
Around her, in a radius of about 20 kms you can visit stunning sites like Rodes Monastery , the Cathedral of Castellon de Ampurias Vil
neighborhood_overview:
We are about two kilometers from the village of Cistella. It is a small village of farmers and ranchers, welcoming and full of traditions. And although we have a reputation for being hard workers, always have time to chat with friends and a good celebration!.
In the village we have a small school, a church, a small grocery store (Lydia and Montse), the village café (The Society) is, and a good restaurant (Badó Restaurant), plus a wonderful environment to walk and contemplate dreamy landscapes.
host_about:
A mi marido y a mi nos gusta vivir en el bosque, su serenidad y frescura es nuestra energía. 
Yo siempre les digo a mi familia que soy como un nomo, pero que de vez en cuando necesito visitar a mi amigo el mar.
Puede sonar cursi, pero así es. 
Por eso este lugar donde vivimos es mágico.

Vivimos entre montañas en un precioso enclave,  pero tenemos a un paso magnificas playas donde disfrutar en verano y pasear en invierno. ¡ Qué más podemos pedir!. 
Juntos, nos ocupamos de la finca, sus animales, el huerto, la casa...
¡Nos encanta mimar cada detalle para que las personas que nos visitan puedan sentirse como en la suya propia y puedan así disfrutar de este lugar tan maravilloso!.

Os recibiremos encantados.
¡Bienvenidos al Mas Campmol"

Charo

name: Appartment in front of the sea
description:
Lovely appartment duplex just refurbished, 50 metres from the beach . One room, terrace and solarium, in front of the sea ! Walking distance from the village of L Escala. All kind of shops, supermarket, baker, bank, drugstore etc... Really close by.

The space
The best of this appartment, beside the excelent placement, is that is just renewed from last April. Furnitures brand new. The street and zone is really calm, without heavy transit. From the room on first florr and from the living room on the main floor you can reach the sea perfume. All shops, drugstore, supermarket, bakery, banks, etc.. are all of them really close:

Guest access
Living room, open kitchen very well equiped, nice terrace where to have dinner, under the moon light, lunch, and breakfast . Two bathrooms with bath in both of them. Main room, for 2 in queen bed, with solarium terrace facin the sea. Building with elevator and concierge. Main floor with sofa.bed for 2 adults.
neighborhood_overview:
The very best , besides the appartment itself, is the location of it. Really over the sea, and as stated before, all the shops and services, as well as beaches and restaurants are really close by.
Leaving the appartment we can find small creeks, and amazing rock zones. In 15 minutes we will be at the center of the fishermans village of L Escala, where you will find as well, restaurants, pizzerias, ice cream shops, and shops.
Just from the appartment a small and funny "village train" will bring you to L Escala if you dont want to walk, and from there to Sant Marti d Empuries, passing through the roman ruin village of Empuries. (please check internet it deserves it !).

description:
A pie de la iglesia en pleno centro histórico. Tranquilo y excelente ubicación 2 min de la playa, calles comerciales y restaurantes. Dos espléndidas terrazas con vistas al mar. El 2020 cocina y baños renovados. Totalmente equipado. Ideal para todo el año.
Alojamiento turístico HUTG-022332

The space
Descripción: Precioso dúplex con 3 habitaciones dobles ( 5 camas) , 2 baños completo, cocina equipada, salón comedor y dos terrazas con magníficas vistas a la bahía de Palamós. La vivienda está situada en el centro histórico muy bien restaurado , en la zona peatonal. Se accede al edificio por la Plaça de l’Esglèsia ( Santa Maria SXIII) . Es un tercer piso con ascensor. Por su inmejorable situación es muy céntrico, (compras , ocio, playa), pero a la vez muy tranquilo. Tiene magníficas vistas a la playa y al pueblo. La playa está a 2 min. caminando.

neighborhood_overview: sin registro
host_about:
Soy una mujer mediterránea que no podría vivir sin la luz del sol, la buena comida ni muy lejos del mar . Me gusta escribir, leer, la música y el buen cine. Y nadar en las playas de Palamós,  donde he pasado los veranos desde  mi infancia. 
Tengo tres maravillosos hijos: Carola  es músico profesional, Estela es pintora, y Eugeni , el pequeño de 10 años que quiere ser actor.
Con Jaume , mi marido, y con los hijos nos encanta viajar. Amigos europeos nos han hospedado en su casa (Paris, Bremen, London...)igual que nosotros les recibimos en la nuestra. Hace dos años que practicamos el intercambio simultaneo de casa . 
Nos encanta la gente y las tertulias después de una buena comida. 
Estamos muy orgullosos de nuestra segunda residencia y queremos compartir el placer de una estancia reparadora en l'Empordà, una de las zonas mas agradables del Mediterráneo.

neighborhood_overview: The town of Pals is a medieval walled enclosed, now restored and very well conserved. The first reference to the town dates from 889. With just over 2,800 inhabitants Pals and the surrounding area offer you a wide range of things to do, from organised activities to gastronomic routes with the most exquisite recipes. You can play golf, scuba dive or go windsurfing at the beach of Pals. You can enjoy nature by walking over the dunes or cycling through the rice fields.

name: CAN FELIP - Apartamento 2 (s.XVIII)
description:
Magnífica casa de pueblo del siglo XVIII, ubicado en el centro de la villa de Palafrugell. La casa ha sido totalmente rehabilitada y dividida en 3 apartamentos “Can Felip”

The space
Magnífica casa de pueblo del siglo XVIII, ubicado en el centro de la villa de Palafrugell. La casa ha sido totalmente rehabilitada y dividida en 3 apartamentos “Can Felip”: -Piso 1: 156m2 + 33 de terraza. -Piso 2: 114 m2 + 70m2 de preciosa terraza soleada a 4 vientos. -Piso Ático: 76m2 + 47 de fabulosa terraza privada a 3 vientos.

Todas las habitaciones son grandes y frescas. Estas disponen de un ventilador en verano y calefacción en invierno.

“Can Felip” se encuentran situados en el centro del pueblo de Palafrugell a 50 metros de la Iglesia y del Mercado. En una zona tranquila con agradables vistas, situada en el corazón del “Baix Empordà” (Costa Brava).

A 3 Km de las fantásticas playas de Calella de Palafrugell, Llafranc y Tamariu.
neighborhood_overview:
Palafrugell se remonta al siglo X. El núcleo antiguo, conserva aún hoy algo de su trazado urbanístico medieval, encabezado por la iglesia de Sant Martí y formado por un conjunto de calles y callejones que configuran un gran centro comercial.

El máximo desarrollo de la localidad se produjo a finales del siglo XVIII con el inicio de la producción de tapones de corcho, hecho que aún hoy es evidente en la arquitectura local, con las fábricas de corcho y los edificios modernistas de la época. En el Museo del Corcho podrá conocer más a fondo esta industria.

A pie o en bicicleta, y a tu ritmo, explora tanto como desees, por la extensa red de 350km de caminos que hay actualmente en la Costa Brava, por los arrozales, o por las dunas de la playa de Pals a través de miradores privilegiados sobre el mar o bien por los yacimientos del Empordà... y, por supuesto, por los caminos de ronda: un impresionante paseo que acaricia el mar entre acantilados y que une todas las playas d

neighborhood_overview: Palafrugell se remonta al siglo X. El núcleo antiguo, conserva aún hoy algo de su trazado urbanístico medieval, encabezado por la iglesia de Sant Martí y formado por un conjunto de calles y callejones que configuran un gran centro comercial. El máximo desarrollo de la localidad se produjo a finales del siglo XVIII con el inicio de la producción de tapones de corcho, hecho que aún hoy es evidente en la arquitectura local, con las fábricas de corcho y los edificios modernistas de la época. En el Museo del Corcho podrá conocer más a fondo esta industria.A pie o en bicicleta, y a tu ritmo, explora tanto como desees, por la extensa red de 350km de caminos que hay actualmente en la Costa Brava, por los arrozales, o por las dunas de la playa de Pals a través de miradores privilegiados sobre el mar o bien por los yacimientos del Empordà... y, por supuesto, por los caminos de ronda: un impresionante paseo que acaricia el mar entre acantilados y que une todas las playas de la Costa Brava.

name: Can Caranta: Aurora House
description:
The house has been completely refurbished mixing the XVIII century antique house with XXI century avant-garde architecture. Fantastic location in the centre of the medieval town of Pals (Girona).

The space
A splendid old town house with 199 square meters of living space and 100 square meters of a private fantastic garden with a swimming pool and a porch.

3 Double Bedrooms House to sleep up 8-9.

“Can Caranta” is situated on the Medieval town of Pals. Quiet area and nice views, located in the heart of “Baix Empordà” (Costa Brava). At 7km from the magnificent beaches of Pals, Sa Riera, Sa Tuna, Calella de Palafrugell and Llafranc.

Guest access
The house has a very nice living room with a fire place. The place is decorated with a mixture of Antique and contemporary furnishings to offer all the commodities. The house is equipped with a WIFI connection.

Other things to note
Catalonia HUTG001746
neighborhood_overview: The town of Pals is a medieval walled enclosed, now restored and very well conserved. The first reference to the town dates from 889. With just over 2,800 inhabitants Pals and the surrounding area offer you a wide range of things to do, from organised activities to gastronomic routes with the most exquisite recipes. You can play golf, scuba dive or go windsurfing at the beach of Pals. You can enjoy nature by walking over the dunes or cycling through the rice fields.

name: CASA DE DISEÑO A 450 METROS PLAYA
description:
Impresionante casa, recien reformada, 4 habitaciones, jardín privado además de zona comunitaria con piscina. Totalmente amueblada y a punto para entrar.

The space
La casa consta de dos plantas, la entrada tiene espacio para dejar un coche y otro en el garaje cerrado propio.
En esta planta salón comedor muy amplio, baño de cortesía, cocina espaciosa con salida al jardín y el garage.
En la planta superior, 4 habitaciones: 1 habitación suite con cama de matrimonio y baño propio, además de terraza propia, 1 habitación con cama matrimonio, 1 habitación con dos camas individuales y 1 habitación abierta que puede usarse de despacho, zona de juegos, habitación auxiliar…posibilidad de 2 camas más.
En esta misma planta baño con ducha y baño con bañera en suite.

Guest access
En el jardín privado, un maravilloso porche con cenador cubierto con sofás, sillones, mesa y sillas de exterior. Además la casa dispone de barbacoa de obra propia.

Toda la oferta a 10 minutos pero con la tranquilidad de una urbanización.
Tienes al lado los pueblos de Palamós y Platja d'Aro.

name: A restored fishermans cottage Tamariu
description:
This is a house set in the heart of Catalan living, very traditional and very unspoilt. It is ideally located, so very close to the sea but set back away from the bustle with no traffic at all. A big house, not just a holiday house but a home, happily shared with guests and friends who wish to have a quiet break, relaxing on the Costa Brava.

The space
A most beautifull tradtional cottage nestled amongst the Catalan houses less than a minutes walk to the breathaking bay of Tamariu, a safe haven for families with no traffic, safe swimming and typical Spanish restaurants overlooking the sea and cliffs, a real unspoilt hidden jem on the Costa Brava. Newly renovated, completed April 2019 to include new courtyard, and balcony plus newly decorated and new kitchen.

Guest access
The house has 3 double bedrooms, one is a family room, 3 shower rooms, a very large well equipped kitchen and lounge with bifold doors plus big a beautiful new courtyard
neighborhood_overview: We love the fact that this is true Spain, a simple friendly place with local traditions and excellent food.  Very safe, relaxed and has a great feel, excellent for families.

Hace 29 años que me dedico al mundo de Real Estate y tambien desde entonces he pasado mis vacaciones en Tossa de Mar , a mis hijas le gustaba tanto que finalmente me compre una casa en Santa Maria de LLorell ( Tossa de mar) Me encanta, no se si me gusta más en verano para disfrutar de la playa y de la maravillosa agua transparente  o en invierno de esos paseos tranquilos tanto por las playas como por las montañas cercanas, tienes mil cosas por hacer. 
Debido a mi profesión mis vecinos y amigos me dijeron que les ayudara a alquilar sus viviendas  para las vacaciones y desde entonces nos dedicamos hace ya quince años a preparar estos hogares para que personas de todo el mundo vengáis a conocer este maravilloso pueblo marinero. Estaré encantada de recibirte junto a tu familia y de poderte ayudar en buscar restaurantes , tiendas, excursiones  y que el apartamento o casa que hayas elegido se convierta en tu hogar durante tus vacaciones.

name: LA CASA NOVA - Mas with much comfort
description:
The space
The house is a detached stone house near the village Pontós. The farmhouse is situated at 145m altitude and offers a beautiful view out over the valley towards the sea to the east and south. To the north and west, you got the view of the Pyrenees Mountains and its foothills. It is just 20 minutes drive away from the spectacular beaches and coves of the Costa Brava, 15 km from the towns of Figueres where the Dali Museum is situated, from Banyoles with its large lake, and 25 km from Girona with its very attractive old town. Barcelona is situated 130 km south and by car, but also by train, well and quickly accessible.

The farmhouse was built in 1640 on the site of a former Iberian settlement. The house is detached and surrounded by fields and forest. The nature begins thus directly outside the front door. name: Historic Rural House in Catalonia
description:
This is a 200 year-old historic house rehabilitated by a local architect in the center of medieval town Besalu (Girona), with peaceful garden where to disconnect from the world. County of Garrotxa, a remarkable region plenty of outdoor options.

The space
House is suitable for two families (max capacity is eight), with a private garden and a small natural pool (no chemical depurator). Walking distance from main facilities (supermarket, bakery, press, etc.). Situated in the inner center of old town. Restricted access to cars.

Guest access
Three-level house with private garden. Small natural pool (in the garden). House is fully equipped for self-catering and has washing machine too.

Other things to note
Visit the official Website of Besalu and of the Garrotxa region to learn more about what to do; it's amazing!

License number
HUTG-025139
neighborhood_overview: This is a 2,200 inhabitants old village in deep Catalonia with roots in the 10th century. Neighbors are very exposed to visitors since Besalu is well-known in the travelers' guides as a must-do visit. Characters of local inhabitants is therefore very open and charming.

name: BEAUTIFUL APARTMENT with POOL TOSSA
description:
Nice, open and bright apartment with terrace, where you can enjoy nice relaxing moments, meals, etc.
Another important detail is the swimming pool, where you can enjoy of the common zone, which you can see from your terrace.

The space
The apartment has 3 bedrooms, 2 family bathrooms and a wide and open living room. Fully equipped kitchen with dishwasher and washing machine. The terrace, has furniture so you can have nice meals outdoors.
It has parking lot in the same building.
The living room has AC, that thanks to its location, can cool all the apartment.
It has room for 6 people, with the following distribution:
- Bedroom with double bed.
- Bedroom with 2 single beds.
- Bedroom with 2 single beds
We have cribs for the babies and high chairs. Please, if needed, ask for it before your travel. It is 15€ for the hole stay.

Guest access
There is a really nice common zone, with grass and a swimming pool,
neighborhood_overview:
The apartment is located in a very quiet zone, less than 10 minutes away (walking) from the beach, with an easy and flat access, in the middle of the comercial street.
It is a new neighborhood, very spacious and bright with parks and green areas al around.
Just a 2 minutes walk away from a big supermarket and a restaurant.
Four minutes away, is the beautiful comercial zone, with all kind of shops.
Tossa is a beautiful and quiet town, with a lot of charm. Ideal to travel with your couple, family or with the kids.
It is one of the most beautiful town in all Costa Brava, where you can steel feel the little old town atmosphere and where is not allowed to build tall buildings.
Besides enjoying the beaches, there are a lot other things to do. For example: walk around the old and narrow streets from the walled town "Vila Vella", go the the lighthouse and relax at the "Bar del Far", while you enjoy the incredible views of the rugged coastline and the cliffs. Wal
host_about:
We are Ana and Kristjàn and we’ve been offering accommodation in Tossa de Mar for over thirty years. Seven years ago, we were very happy to found Let’s Holidays.

The passion with which we’ve been working these past years has made us grow, and we now have a vast team of professionals working with us. 
With them, we will make sure to find the best option for you and to get you everything you will need during your stay :)

If there is something that we have learnt this past years is that we like to be treated the same way that we treat you. 
That’s where our philosophy comes from. We like to chat and we will try to get you anything that you need and find solutions to anything that you propose.

At the end, holidays should be exactly the way we want them, right?

We present some of our services :)

The Home Selector is the person who will help you choose the option most appropriate to your tastes. You will save time in searching and finding the best choice.

The Host is the person who will take care of you during the whole stay and try to find anything that you need with the help of the other hosts.

Let’s Holidays Home will be your second holiday home. A place where you will be able to meet with our Hosts, chat, have a glass of wine and listen to some live music.

We’ll love to meet you!

See you soon ;)

name: Rural house El Pati de l´Albera - Wine Experience
description:
Surrounded by three national parks, between vineyards and olive groves, offers the opportunity for a relaxing holiday, with the possibility of sports, culture and culinary experiences.
We might organize for you guided tours to the several wine factories in the area, where you can taste the excellent wines from DO Empordà.
Besides all the region offer lot of routes for trekking and for bike lovers!

The space
El Pati de l´Albera is a friendly and welcoming rural house located in the village of Sant Climent Sescebes, around 15 Km from Figueres, in the heart of Alt Empordà. The house boasts five unique guest bedrooms, each with its own style and personality, providing facilities to suit any guest.
The house is an inviting holiday location at any time of year: in winter a real log fire creates a cosy atmosphere in the common room, while in summer the spacious terrace offers a magical backdrop for an informal evening spent in the company of friends, goo
neighborhood_overview: Sant Climent is a tiny village, with a population of only 600, but despite its size it boasts a full range of amenities: from a mini-market to a butcher´s shop which offers fresh meats and home made deli products, as well as a pharmacy and a modern hair salon with spa and wellness centre.
host_about: Soy una persona abierta, a que le gusta conocer gente nueva de todos los países y que comparten con migo una actitud positiva para un turismo responsable que nos ayuda a conocer los lugares para lo que realmente tienen y representan. No quiero vender tan solo camas, quiero vender emociones!

description:
Special villa for holidays in L´Escala, in 300m from the beach with private pool and large garden.
Villa del Sol is located in the best area of L´Escala. This area is surrounded by Riells Beach and the magnificent promenade overlooking to the bay and to the Pyrenees.
The villa has a wonderful garden of 870m2 with private pool, a porch for outdoor meals and a barbecue.

The space

Special villa for holidays in L´Escala, in 300m from the beach with private pool and large garden.
Villa del Sol is located in the best area of L´Escala. This area is surrounded by Riells Beach and the magnificent promenade overlooking to the bay and to the Pyrenees.
The villa has a wonderful garden of 870m2 with private pool, a porch for outdoor meals and a barbecue. The location of the villa is perfect, is just 300 me
neighborhood_overview:
L'Escala has a strategic location - everything is close. Girona, Roses, Cadaques - only 40-45 min; Figueres and Empuriabrava - 20min; Begur and Palamos - 30 min; Pals and Playa de Aro - 40 -50 min; Banyoles, Olot - 40 min - 1 hour. Overall, L'Escala is perfect for exploring the Costa Brava.
L´Escala offers various activities and areas which can be enjoyed with children. The beaches of L´Escala are characterised by their fine sand and shallow waters, which means that they are ideal for children. Also is a paradise for children, with children´s parks, go-karts and horse trip, as well as bicycle hire. What´s more, L´Escala offers a wide range of sports and adventure-based activities - discover new sensations!! Bicing in l´Escala is more than a simply renting bikes service. L'Escala Cycling is a public transport service. It is practical, sustainable and easy to use. Tour and enjoy the l'Escala region free from air and noise pollution. A walk along El Camí Forestal between l´Escala

name: Llançà (Costa Brava)
description:
Apartamento grande, amplio y luminoso, de 3 habitaciones (una suite), 2 cuartos de baño y salón comedor con sofá cama de 150 cm. Las habitaciones y el salón comedor dan a la terraza, de 30 m. en forma de L. Amueblado, con electrodomésticos (TV Led, DVD, lavadora, lavavajillas, microondas...), menaje, ropa de casa y aire acondicionado. Wi-Fi y garaje. Está en una zona muy tranquila del pueblo histórico (la vila). Vistas a las montañas y, un poco, a lo lejos, al mar. Con servicios muy próximos.

The space
Está ubicado en un lugar excepcional, en la zona alta de la vila, muy tranquilo y, a la vez, con todos los servivios cercanos. muy bien comunicado. Confortable y luminoso, con bellas vistas y muy silencioso.

Guest access
Garaje particular cerrado. Se accede por un pasaje particular. Edificio formado por planta baja, donde está el garaje particular (cerrado) y 4 plantas con ascensor, con un piso por planta.

Other things to note</
neighborhood_overview: Está en la “vila” (pueblo histórico), en una zona muy tranquila, con todos los servicios, junto al inicio del parque natural del Cabo de Creus, con vistas a las montañas y, un poco, al mar, a unos quince (o veinte) minutos andando del puerto y de la playa más cercana. Está a media hora de Girona, hora y media de Barcelona, a 10-20 minutos de El Port de la Selva, Portbou, Perelada, Figueres, Garriguella, Pau, unos 30 de Cadaqués, y cerca de l’Escala, Begur, Pals, Olot, Colliure, Céret, Perpignan, Carcassone...
host_about: Soy profesora de secundaria, ya inactiva. Me encanta el cine y la literatura. Soy persona pacífica y de gustos tranquilos. Soy muy respetuosa con la propiedad ajena y con los gustos de cada cual. Me gusta conversar de forma sincera y directa.

name: Best terrace of Costa Brava
description:
In the very first line of the sea, and only a dozen meters from the water, you will have the sensation of sailing through the interior of Satuna Bay, one of the 25 best beaches in Europe according to "The Guardian".

Satuna is the smallest, most romantic and quiet of the three coves of the municipality of Begur (Costa Brava - Girona). Has managed to preserve the air and the size that his former fishermen gave him. And its tranquility is only disturbed by the winds of East and Tramontana.

The space
Large apartment of 140sqm (1507sq feet, with 4 bedrooms, and two magnificent terraces that views the cove and the sea, just 10 meters from the water.
Unique property on the seafront, in the heart of Costa Brava.

With two huge terraces from which you can see the whole bay, from the beach to the open sea and the sunrise.

Inside, a living room with marble flooring (designed by architect Josep Llinàs in 80's), which is elevated so that
neighborhood_overview: Cala Sa Tuna embodies the foreigner’s vision of the Mediterranean, with narrow whitewashed houses that accentuate the craggy bay. A place of large family lunches, gnarled old men and brightly coloured fishing boats, it’s the kind of village you see in travel brochures, but rarely in real life.

July minimun nights 4
August minimun nights 7.
Swimming-pool shared from june to september.
Children under 14 have to go aconpagnated in the pool by an adult (over 18 yerars old).

The space
Our house, El Moli d'en Solà, is a Catalan farmhouse situated in a privileged environment for its beauty and peacefulness. It dates back to the fourteenth century. The house is surrounded by meadows and forests and the river that moved the mill is clean and perfect for swimming. If you find it too cold you can also bath in the pool(open from june to september)

Guest access
The house has a large communal green area with playground playground and football goal.
Each unit has access to its own BBQ and shared pool (open from June to September ).
The old mill
neighborhood_overview:
The house is at the bottom of a valley in a rural area with few isolated farmhouses. It is a green and quiet corner, away from the madding crowd but only 5 minutes from the village.
We are in the region of La Garrotxa, which is famous for its volcanoes, the Fageda d'En Jorda and medieval villages like Santa Pau, Besalu. It is an excellent starting point for trips to the Costa Brava or the Pyrenees, as we are between the two sites.
host_about: We are a family in love with the place where we live. It's a special place and we want to share it with people. That's why part of our house has appartments for guests.

name: Just us 2, in a cozy apartment in the mountains!
description:
in English...

Can Banal is a 16th century catalan farm house locally called masia that has been restored into three independent livings. During the summer we run a camp-site on the terraces below the main house.

The Green Apartment...
· Is a 20 m2 room with no balcony. There is a common outside space one floor below.
· Suitable for a couple and eventually a baby or a small child.
· Double bed (160cm) and private bath room.
· Kitchenette suitable for breakfasts and/or a simple meal preparation. With fridge, microwave and kitchen utensils.
· Central heating and tv&wifi. All the facilities for an own supported stay (sheets, towels, kitchen-tools, household items).
· The entrance to the house will be shared with us.

The landscape around Can Banal is in a rural and peacful environment with rivers and forests that changes colors depending on the season. In autumn there are varieties of mushrooms and in spring many types of orqu
neighborhood_overview:
Can Banal is situated in the beginning of the Catalan Pyrenees, in a region called “Alta Garrotxa”. Located midway between the sea-shore (45 min) and the high mountains of the Pyrenees (1h) makes it possible for many types of day-trips.
Close to many interesting places of cultural, natural or gourmet aspects like Castelfullit de la Roca, Besalu, the Garrotxa Volcanic Park or Olot.
Within a 6 km drive, Sadernes is reached from where the wonderful trekking path towards Sant Aniol d'Aguja starts.

The landscape around Can Banal is peaceful and rural, with rivers and forests that changes colours depending on the season. In autumn there are varieties of mushrooms and in spring many types of orquids and butterflies to enjoy.

If you just decides to stay around in Can Banal you'll find enough to do for few days. Walk our own signed trails along water creeks, fields, forests, hermitage, farms and villages round us. We have mountain bike’s to rent and in a 25' wal
host_about:
Hola, we are Stendert & Maria

We live in Mas Can Banal for many years. Stendert, born '51, originally is from Breda-Holland, and Maria, born '66, is from Stockholm-Sweden, where her parents once had arrived from Spain. We enjoy very much living here in the countryside surrounded by hills, forests, and rivers. Halfway to the sea and to the high mountains.

We are accompanied by our daughter Saskia born '02 and Stendert's son - Luuk, born  '93, who works in our village and in their spare time help us.

Our professions are of the most diverse; Maria studied interior design and artistic glass techniques and Stendert studied to become a tropical agronomist and later carpentry. Probably this multifaceted mixture connects us with many diverse interests and activities, especially the maintenance of CB with its forest, animals, and agro-tourism.

We hope to be able to combine these aspects of us and make your stay as pleasant and memorable as possible. Together, we speak 7 European languages and understand a few more. We like very much to tell you about our favorite places, help you out for more personal advice and add if there is a special event going on.

  Welcome·Bienvenidos·Welkom·Benvinguts·Välmommen·Bienvenue·Willkommen

Hola somos Maria and Stendert

Vivimos en Mas Can Banal desde hace muchos años. Stendert, nacido '51, originario de Breda , Holanda y María, nacida '66, de Estocolmo- Suecia , donde sus padres una vez llegaron desde España . Nos gusta mucho vivir aquí en el campo, rodeado de colinas, bosques y ríos. A mitad de camino hacia el mar y la mitad del camino a las altas montañas.

Nos acompaña nuestra hija Saskia, nacida '02 y Luuk, hijo de Stendert,  nacido en el '93, que trabaja en nuestro pueblo. Ambos en sus ratos libres nos ayudan en diferentes tareas.

Nuestras profesiones son de la más diversa; María estudió diseño de interiores y técnicas de vidrio artístico y Stendert estudió para ser ingeniero agrónomo tropical y mas tarde carpintería. Probablemente esta mezcla multifacética , nos conecta con muchos diversos intereses y actividades, en especial el mantenimiento de CB con su bosque, los animales y el agroturismo.

Esperamos ser capaces de combinar estos aspectos de nosotros y como hacer que su estancia sea lo más agradable y memorable como sea posible. En conjunto, se habla 7 idiomas europeos y entender algunos pocos más. Nos gusta mucho que decir acerca de nuestros lugares favoritos, ayudará a cabo el asesoramiento más personal y añadir si hay un evento especial ocurre.
neighbourhood: Montagut i Oix, la Garrotxa, Cataluña, Spain

name: Space Oasis - a tranquil and stylish retreat.
description:
Space Oasis is your haven of peace and quiet just a stones throw away from the beautiful beaches and bustling towns of the fabulous Costa Brava - a truly welcoming escape for friends & family to settle back, relax and unwind - hammock in the garden, a dip in the pool, fire pit BBQ, dinner & drinks on the terrace and total privacy as the space is all yours. Bliss!

The space
Space Oasis Holiday Villa is the perfect destination for groups of up to 12 people looking for somewhere a little bit special. We had a lot of fun creating the 'Pop Art' guest accommodation and love sharing our distinctive home with appreciative and laid-back friends from all over the globe.

Our living spaces are split into sections all accessible from a large central courtyard with 100 m2 terrace & 10 x 5 m swimming pool. The main guest house has 3 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms and a lovely spacious open plan kitchen/diner/living area with a wall of glass doors opening out to the terrace
neighborhood_overview: The setting is really special and unique. We enjoy lots of peace, quiet and tons of privacy but are just minutes away from some of the most stunning old towns and fabulous beaches in Europe. Pals old town is truly unique with narrow stone streets and a multitude of great restaurants and shops and Begur, Girona and Barcelona are of course bucket list places to visit.  If action and activities tickle your fancy then there is fab scuba diving on the Illes Medes a few minutes drive away plus skiing in the Pyrenees, road and mountain biking, great walking routes and beaches & sparkling little coves to die for all up and down the coast.
host_about:
Welcome to our Space Oasis! My name is Amalia, I am English/Canadian and my husband Dani is Russian. We met here on the Costa Brava, have lived here for almost 15 years. We speak EspanglishRuss together!

I work from home whereas Dani manages a super yacht in Barcelona and is often out 'at sea'. We both enjoy travelling and finding adventure when we can doing outdoorsy stuff like motorbiking or cycling; on-and-off road, horse riding and long dog hikes, but more often than not we're both working or relaxing in the garden at home. Well, to be honest, usually Dani is doing the gardening whilst I practise juggling, hula hoop, poi - or whatever is the latest skill I'm learning off YouTube!
 I'm a passionate animal lover and have 2 dogs, 8 cats and 1 horse. When I'm relaxing I love to just hang out with my animals and read a book. Guests have full access to my large library of books. Quite a few are beach-read best sellers - perfect for holidaymakers.

As we are often out-and-about our good friend Amber Jane will help you with  enquiries and bookings in the first instance and I will meet you when you arrive at Space Oasis Holiday Villa.

I will be here to help you get settled in but once I give you the keys my house is yours to enjoy in your own way. 

I like to share my house with good people , all I ask is that you respect my belongings and we both respect each others privacy. Other than that: 
Eat, Drink, Swim and Make Merry!

name: Dream Architect in Costa Brava
description:
The space
The house, which opened in 2010, is built on one of the last available sites in the old town of Begur, is 5 minutes from downtown and at the same time enjoying 600m2 of land equipped with porch, lawn and pool perfectly oriented to the Mediterranean. The house style is a blend of contemporary lines solved with technology and materials. Environmentally friendly, using organic materials, and home automation systems to ensure maximum comfort. It features a bedroom suite with Jacuzzi tub and shower room with a big window facing the Mediterranean. Two rooms with shared bathroom also overlooking the sea and the castle. And fourth room free to the main body of the house with a window looking at the bottom of the pool. The kitchen dining room is set in a single room under a massive dome-shaped cover Catalan. You can park up to 3 cars. Fully exposed to the sun.

Licencia: HUTG-001233

Guest access
There are three parking spaces in the house.
neighborhood_overview: Begur is a medieval village, situated 400m from the sea level around a castle that served as protection from pirates. It is surrounded by numerous small beaches only by the emerald water and the cuisine. The house is oriented toward the valley that ends at the beach Aiguafreda and enjoys magnificent views of the horizon of the Mediterranean and the castle of Carmen Amaya. Front of the house, and almost runs into the sea with a forest of oaks that have just trekking routes on the beach.
host_about:
Born in Brazil, Catalan by choice.
Since 1998, from Monday to Friday I live in Barcelona and from Friday to Sunday, in Begur.
Sharing life with a husband, 2 wonderful daughters and a huge dog!

name: Gran casa familiar en Ampurdán.
description:
Casa ( 300 metros cuadrados) de 3 pisos,parte historica de Torrent, típica de granja del Ampurdán, original jardín, única vivienda en la placita de la iglesia S .XVIII Caminos entre cultivos para recorrer en bicicleta. A 5 kms del pueblo medieval de Pals, a 12 de las playas de Tamariu, Llafranch o Calella. Ideal para familias numerosas. Porche y jardín con enorme encanto . En invierno amplia y muy acogedora zona común de 90 metros y gran chiminea

The space
Nuestra casa disfruta de la tranquilidad de Torrent y de su posición dentro del casco antiguo del pueblo y de la cercanía de las playas y pueblos del interior más bonitos de esa zona de la Costa Brava.

Other things to note
Otoño y primavera son épocas maravillosas por la belleza del campo y la posibilidad de disfrutar de las playas con poca gente.
Los jugadores de golf tienen tienen dos campos a cinco minutos de casa.
Gastronomía fuera de serie. En Gerona Can Costa ha sid
neighborhood_overview: Resulta difícil hacer recomendaciones de playas o restaurantes pues las opciones son prácticamente infinitas. Como regla general se puede decir que los restaurantes de las playas son más caros que los del interior por razones obvias.
host_about: Diplomático,más de la mitad de mi vida he vivido fuera de España. Nací en Marruecos. Padre de seis hijos (cuatro son mujeres) y abuelo de doce nietos. Mi mujer y yo somos felices desde 1963 !. hemos tenido que montar muchas casas en lugares muy diferentes y hemos depositado en las que tenemos en España nuestra experiencia,nuestros recuerdos,y y la pasión por mantener el ambiente,sereno,armónico y  original de la construcción, Así hemos restaurado esta casa del XVIII.  Lo hicimos  para uso de nuestra familia en vacaciones  hasta mi jubilación, cuando la pusimos en el (Website hidden by Airbnb) gusta caminar largos recorridos (llevo hechos más de 12000 Km por caminos de Santiago) la música (buena oferta en temporada en esta zona) la buena cocina y las buenas bodegas (oferta excelente en la zona) la naturaleza,y quienes en ella viven,entre ellos naturalmente el ser humanos,por encima de todo. Me gusta que la gente que viene a casa se encuentre bien y aprecio aprender de los demás. Soy pescador empedernido,pero sin muerte cuando es posible.

We are Aleksandra, Stela, Raquel and Judith (K3HOMES) and we are dedicated to tourist rentals.
We will help you to spend your best holidays with our agency. The agency is located in the center of L'Escala. Our mission is to give to our customers the opportunity to spend their vacation without worry.
We work for you to rest. We strive to offer the best service to our clients and to our property owners.
Our company is built around the needs of our customers. The owners and guests define the direction of our development. We treat our customers as we would like to be treated.
We hope you will come to visit us and thank you in advance for being our guest!
Warmest wishes,
K3OMES family

name: Apartamento Ancora - primera linea de playa para 6 personas en Tossa de Mar
description:
Three bedroom apartment for 6 people, elevator, parking space, wifi, air conditioning, master bedroom with dressing room. In front of the beach and two minutes from downtown

The space
High standing apartment on the beachfront. Three bedrooms, two bathrooms, all parquet, terrace with profile views of the sea, elevator, air conditioning, WIFI, and parking. 2 minutes from the center of Tossa de Mar.
Very nice and well kept.

The Ancora apartment is located in the best area of ​​Tossa de Mar, on the beach, in a street with restaurants and supermarkets, Ideal for a family vacation.
You can get there by bus from Girona and Barcelona airports. There is also a bus to the center of Barcelona and the nearest towns.

This apartment has as a courtesy; kitchen paper, cloth, garbage bags, dish soap, and dish soap or tablets. And toilet paper and hand soap in bathroom.

Bed linen and towels are not included in the price. You can bring the
neighborhood_overview: The apartment building is on the Paseo Marítimo. Next to the Grande de Tossa de Mar beach and 2 minutes from the center. A few meters away is the medieval castle. Less than 100 meters you have a supermarket, restaurants, cafeteria and pharmacy.
host_about:
Hace 29 años que me dedico al mundo de Real Estate y tambien desde entonces he pasado mis vacaciones en Tossa de Mar , a mis hijas le gustaba tanto que finalmente me compre una casa en Santa Maria de LLorell ( Tossa de mar) Me encanta, no se si me gusta más en verano para disfrutar de la playa y de la maravillosa agua transparente  o en invierno de esos paseos tranquilos tanto por las playas como por las montañas cercanas, tienes mil cosas por hacer. 
Debido a mi profesión mis vecinos y amigos me dijeron que les ayudara a alquilar sus viviendas  para las vacaciones y desde entonces nos dedicamos hace ya quince años a preparar estos hogares para que personas de todo el mundo vengáis a conocer este maravilloso pueblo marinero. Estaré encantada de recibirte junto a tu familia y de poderte ayudar en buscar restaurantes , tiendas, excursiones  y que el apartamento o casa que hayas elegido se convierta en tu hogar durante tus vacaciones.

name: Villa Extravagance 8 pax pool-beach
description:
#Modern Villa to #rent  in #Lloret de Mar on the Costa Brava. Total area more than 340 m2. Villa has  4 bedrooms (2 of them Suite), 4 bathrooms, separate kitchen, dining room, large living room, terrace with dining table and chairs, closed garage for 4 cars, to the sea 400 meters, house with swimming pool and barbecue. Capacity for 10 persons.

The space
Exterior:
Vila is located in the prestigious urbanization of Cala Tortuga, far from the city noise and at the same time near the centre of Lloret de Mar. House with swimming pool, barbecue and large terrace from where you can join beautiful sea view.
Cala Canyelles beach is about 7 min by car; there are two restaurants, cafes on the beach, yacht club. The centre of Lloret de Mar 5 minutes by car.
Within 10-15 minutes by car there is a Water world, children's entertainment Park and Dolphinarium.

Guest access
General
- air conditioning
- central heating
- Privat
neighborhood_overview:
Lloret de Mar’s diversity will make your holiday unforgettable
Villa Extravagance is so entertaining that you’ll almost forget about Lloret de Mar and the beach. Nevertheless, it’s only 2 km away Lloret de Mar’s centre and promenade so, in the unlikely event of you getting bored, you can always pay a visit to it. First of all, you can walk over the pebble sand beach and dip in the Mediterranean Sea. Besides all the tourist and cultural sightseeing, you’ll find many other interesting places.

And what about a city trip, or discovering other villages and places in the surroundings? Cities like Girona or Barcelona are easily reachable by car or public transport (from the bus station of Lloret de Mar). Villa Extravagance is also very well located to have a one day trip to a small and almost forgotten place, like Banyoles, Besalú, Rupit or the Sau reservoir.

name: Luxury Villa&Spa, 10m from the sea
description:
MAS TORROELLA is a superbly restored Catalan farmhouse dating from the 14th Century. A large and roomy property both inside and out, the house radiates unassuming grandeur and luxury yet has all the home comforts, mod-cons and facilities such as its own spa, sauna, gym, tennis court and outdoor swimming pool.

The space
Thanks to its excellent location, guests can disconnect and enjoy complete privacy and seclusion at Mas Torroella which is set amid protected pine and cork forests. Yet just a short drive away, you find rustic villages dotted along the coast and inland where you can discover the essence, the character and gastronomy of this romantic region.

Mas Torroella´s scrupulous restoration highlights some amazing details such as Baroque style hand-painted ceiling friezes, traditional stone windows and rustic stone walls. These features combine with grace and luxurious finishing touches to give a lasting unique, magical feeling the moment you step f
neighborhood_overview: sin registro
host_about:
Mas Torroella was built in the XIV century. When my father bought it in 1989 it was an abandoned stone ruin crying to be loved and cared for by somebody... And he spent most of his life rebuilding it, investing all his love and passion to create his dream. When my father passed away, my husband and I decided to fulfill his dream and complete the restoration... now our historic masia has been turned into a charming luxury villa & spa.
Most of our guests agree that you can feel peace, tranquility and love inside and outside our house. We are proud of it and must admit that, after a long and hard period of restoration, it has been worthwhile.
We have really put lots of effort and lots of love in restoring it... and I hope this can be seen in the result...

I am sure the Villa will be up to your standards and that you will be able to enjoy the holiday you have wished for, here with us in the Costa Brava.
We will do our best to make it happen!

neighborhood_overview: La urbanización es una zona tranquila por lo que se pide el respeto para tener una buena convivencia con el vecindario. Sin ruidos molestos a partir de las 22h de la noche
host_about:
La vida es un camino que hay que recorrer con tanta intensidad como si cada día fuese a ser el último.

Me encanta el trato con el público, por lo que me considero buena anfitriona de mis invitados, haciéndoles sentir como en su propia casa.

amante de la naturaleza, no podría vivir sin mis bichitos, compañeros inseparables de aventuras.

Me encanta viajar y puedo sentirme orgullosa de haber vivido en lugares tan dispares entre sí como idílicos como  Ibiza, Málaga, Andorra, New York y Costa Rica, cada uno de los cuales ocupan un rinconcito en mi corazón.

¿Mi asignatura pendiente? Un safari por Africa

name: Can Nentia, encantadora casa de Turismo Rural.
description:
Can Nentia es una hermosa casa rural del siglo XIX que recupera la hospitalidad de las antiguas casas de pueblo, con amplias estancias y rincones acogedores. En el corazón del Baix Empordà, entre el mar y la montaña, aún existen lugares donde disfrutar de unos días inolvidables. A tan solo 20 minutos de nuestra casa estan las playas más maravillosas de la Costa Brava, lo cual os permite disfrutar de un fantástico día y retiraros al atardecer a Can Nentia para gozar de la paz y el descanso.

The space
En Can Nentia encontrará un amplio comedor muy iluminado, con bóveda catalana, en el que podrá disfrutar de grandes momentos, en la mejor compañía.
Una acogedora cocina con chimenea, donde podrá preparar unas tostadas con pan con tomate y carne a la brasa.
Una entrada muy grande que hace de distribuidor de los espacios.
Habitación Romero, con cama de matrimonio y baño con ducha. Una combinación perfecta entre piedra y madera, calidez y bienestar.
neighborhood_overview: El pueblo de Fonteta está situado a pie de las Gavarres, prácticamente a la entrada de sus bosques, justo a la derecha del arroyo que lleva su nombre. El núcleo urbano forma un conjunto compacto de calles estrechas en el entorno de la iglesia parroquial de Santa María. Algunas de sus calles conservan aún el antiguo empedrado y le dan un característico aspecto rural de pueblo marcadamente ampurdanés. El edificio más singular y notable del núcleo, además de algunas casas de gran valor histórico y arquitectónico, es la iglesia parroquial de Santa María, que debía existir ya el 904.
host_about: Soy un hombre trabajador, amante del hogar y la familia, gran amigo de mis amigos, mi gran pasión es mi huerto. Trabajo de constructor, lo que me ha permitido restaurar la casa que ahora les ofrezco, espero que la disfruten.

description:
Cal Pedrals is early nineteenth century, next to the Sant Climent Church of (1037) in the most emblematic square of Urús, a charming rural village of La Cerdanya (Pyrenees). Preserves the architectural elements characteristics of the area.

The space
Urus is a small nearby town situated at the foot of the Alp and Tossa de la sierra Moixeró in full Cerdanya, in the Catalan Pyrenees them. It trafficking in a quiet and cozy village of unos 200 habitantes with excellent views over the valley of the mountains that rodean ya.
In front of the house must be located Pedrals San Clemente church dating from the year 1037.

Guest access

neighborhood_overview:
Cerdanya is a mountainous region with a high flat only because it is one of the wider valleys of Europe, between the Moixeró and the Pyrenees. In Cerdanya can find scenic beauty and diversity that make it unique.

Time in this region is variable, but mostly sunny throughout the year. The slopes have a high high mountain climate, while the lower slopes and plains enjoy a continental Mediterranean climate prone mountainous, with cold winters and cool summers.

In Cerdanya can enjoy variety of outputs, meadows, forests, beech, mountain ranges, massive rivers, lakes, peaks, a unique ... that offers a wide range of possibilities.

Soy residente y autóctono de la comarca y me gusta dar a mis huéspedes , toda la información y asesoramiento necesario para que su estancia en mi casa y en La Cerdanya , sea lo más satisfactoria y agradable para que se sientan como en su casa y vuelvan en próximas ocasiones a disfrutar de este privilegiado valle;
LA CERDANYA

An ideal place to discover and enjoy the Costa Brava.

The space
Our house is a lovely retreat in a country setting, from which you can plan the most wonderful day-trips in Catalonia: going to swim to the neighboring beaches, or visiting the Roman ruins of Empuries, and even spending a whole day in Girona or in Barcelona. The house offers a beautiful private garden with a swimming pool and wonderful views.
It is an ideal place to spend the holidays for families with children, and specially with kids up to 16 years old.

The house is fully equipped to enjoy a comfortable accommodation. Includes linens and bath towels. It also has a maintenance service for the garden and the pool.

Around Llampaies you can do all kind of outdoor activities: cycling, horse riding, tennis, golf, diving, windsurfing. From the house you can take nice walks in the countryside.

neighborhood_overview:
Located just 1 minute walk from the beach, like restaurants and supermarket.
You will find the shopping street with all kinds of shops just 2 minutes walk, and the area of the old town 4 minutes.

Tossa is a beautiful and quiet town, with a lot of charm. Ideal to travel with your couple, family or with the kids.
It is one of the most beautiful town in all Costa Brava, where you can steel feel the little old town atmosphere and where is not allowed to build tall buildings.
Besides enjoying the beaches, there are a lot other things to do. For example: walk around the old and narrow streets from the walled town "Vila Vella", go to the lighthouse and relax at the "Bar del Far", while you enjoy the incredible views of the rugged coastline and the cliffs. Walk around the commercial area, full of little shops, incredible tours to the mountain, bike rides, ship tours, visit all the little and hidden beaches around, and so many other things we can recommend, according t
host_about:
We are Ana and Kristjàn and we’ve been offering accommodation in Tossa de Mar for over thirty years. Seven years ago, we were very happy to found Let’s Holidays.

The passion with which we’ve been working these past years has made us grow, and we now have a vast team of professionals working with us. 
With them, we will make sure to find the best option for you and to get you everything you will need during your stay :)

If there is something that we have learnt this past years is that we like to be treated the same way that we treat you. 
That’s where our philosophy comes from. We like to chat and we will try to get you anything that you need and find solutions to anything that you propose.

At the end, holidays should be exactly the way we want them, right?

We present some of our services :)

The Home Selector is the person who will help you choose the option most appropriate to your tastes. You will save time in searching and finding the best choice.

The Host is the person who will take care of you during the whole stay and try to find anything that you need with the help of the other hosts.

Let’s Holidays Home will be your second holiday home. A place where you will be able to meet with our Hosts, chat, have a glass of wine and listen to some live music.

We’ll love to meet you!

See you soon ;) 

Here you have all our options

neighborhood_overview:
Llafranc es una entidad de población del municipio de Palafrugell, comarca del Baix Emporda en Cataluña. En 2009 tenía 316 habitantes. Llafranc es una de las pedanías costeras de Palafrugell, situada en plena Costa Brava, una localidad pintoresca y que conserva el antiguo encanto de los pueblos de la zona antes de la llegada del turismo de masas. Pueblo situado sobre una costa rocosa, junto a otro núcleo costero y turístico como Calella de Palafrugell. Junto a Llafranch se encuentra el faro de San Sebastián, con un magnífico mirador en su cima.
Cuando lo visites te enamoraras de Llafranc...
host_about: Resolutivo y dinámico me gustar viajar y encontrar la esencia del lugar que visito. Por ello estaré encantado de aconsejarte y enseñarte lo mejor de la costa brava.

name: Luxury house in green oasis, huge pool, fab views!
description:
This is a spacious house with uninterrupted views of the stunning Mediterranean for people who want fun and exploration but value comfort and relative peace when they get back from their excursions.

It is light, spacious and very comfortable, with a/c, high speed, unlimited wifi and well-equipped kitchen.

The shared pool is very large - for swimming in, not splashing, and never crowded.

We use Maremar ourselves and want to keep it like a home. You will feel like our personal guests!

The space
Maremar is our holiday home not "a rental". Everything is designed with our own comfort in mind - from the extra comfortable beds and bedding to the A/C and unlimited wifi to the well equipped kitchen to the fact you will not have to go shopping for loo rolls and tea bags as soon as you arrive!

We have one of the largest houses in our community, which means you will not be cramped.

Our town is one of the very best on th
neighborhood_overview:
The beauty of Sant Feliu de Guixols is that it is a prosperous Catalan town visited by the well-healed of Barcelona and France. It is not a town that relies on packing visitors together like sardines and offering them a uniform touristic experience.

It has all of the best resort amenities but has not had to go "down market" to attract visitors and therefore attracts people who are genuinely interested in a Catalan experience (although the inhabitants do speak many languages).

You will have access to many beautiful coves, stunning beaches and all of that, but also history, first class gastronomy and fantastic art such as the three Salvador Dali properties.

You can spend the day on the beach or exploring the marina or the fishing port. You can enjoy first class shopping and night life. But then you can come "home" to relative peace and tranquility at Maremar.
host_about:
I am a semi retired company director and chartered accountant who has escaped to travel and have fun!

I love good company, food, wine, music, experiences and kind thoughtful people.

My wife and I delight in helping people to have really memorable holidays and experiences - we get a real buzz out of it!
neighbourhood: Sant Feliu de Guíxols, Catalonia, Spain

name: Cosy Modern Family Apartment with Mountain Views
description:
Can Cruanyes (complex of 4 apartments with shared gardens) is a unique holiday escape, immersed in the rich culture and stunning scenery of the Spanish Pyrenees, and perfectly situated between the mountains and the exquisite beaches of the Costa Brava.

The space
From the ruins of the 400 year old farmhouse, three beautifully restored apartments have emerged each retaining its own individual historic charm while embracing some of the modern touches of interior design.

Can Cruanyes (Alzina) is a unique holiday escape, immersed in the rich culture and stunning scenery of the Spanish Pyrenees, and perfectly situated between the mountains and the exquisite beaches of the Costa Brava.

The vaulted ceilings and original window frames are reminders of the farmhouse as it once was, while the large window into the open plan kitchen/livingroom gives a lovely vantage point onto the adjacent woodland of holm oak, pine and hackberry trees.

Seclu
neighborhood_overview:
Can Cruanyes is set within the Alta Garrotxa. Nature will be your neighbour while you are here. Immerse yourself in the forests, mountain views and valleys.

However we are well connected to local villages and towns including Tortella and Besalu. In Tortella you can buy all the basics including artesan bread. Besalu in only 10 mins in the car and has some wonderful restaurants.
host_about: I'm Donny from Ireland and I enjoy meeting people from all over the world. I don't travel as much as before I had kids but meeting my guests helps me feel like I'm still travelling and learning about new cultures. I love helping people discover the area, and letting them in on the little local gems that I've discovered over the years.

name: Villa de diseño en la Costa Brava
description:
es un chalet de diseño moderno y lineal, con piscina privada, jardin con cesped, zona de barbacoa y zona de juegos para los niños (columpio, tobogan, mesa y sillas, y cajon de arena).El chalet tiene disponibilidad para 10 personas, las habitaciones estan distribuidas en dos dobles, una cuatriple,otra habitación individual y un plegatin, dos baños completos, uno de ellos con bañera de hidromasaje doble.Dispone de un gran vestidor y cocina moderna y actual, en el comedor podran disfrutar de la televisión de 49 pulgadas y el sistema dolby surround.

Un chalet destinado a los mas exigentes.

Alrededores

Como una tela en la que la naturaleza ha querido combinar, primorosa y armónicamente, el verde intenso de las pinedas, la rotundidad de las rocas, la dulzura de la arena dorada y el fulgor del azul intenso del mar. Así es la Costa Brava. De Blanes a Portbou, el catálogo de vivencias contiene propuestas tan esenciales como los parques naturales del Cap de Creus

name: Casa unifamiliar en el Valle de La Cerdanya
description:
La limpieza de la vivienda se realiza según recomendaciones de las autoridades sanitarias
Nuestra casa, típica vivienda del pirineo catalán, está situada el pequeño pueblo de Guils con increíbles vistas al valle de la Cerdanya, con su espectacular iglesia románica del Siglo XIV. Cerca de diferentes estaciones de esquí, españolas, francesas y andorranas. Y a pocos minutos de la estación de esquí de fondo Guils-Fontanera.

The space
Esta vivienda unifamiliar de dos plantas y con jardín privado, es un lugar muy agradable para familias con niños que les gusta la tranquilidad de la montaña y la práctica de deportes al aire libre.
Está ubicada dentro del pequeño municipio de Guils, en el Valle de La Cerdanya, muy cerca de diferentes estaciones de esquí, españolas, francesas y andorranas. Y a pocos minutos de la estación de esquí de fondo Guils-Fontanera..
Se accede desde la calle Muntanya por el garaje, en la planta inferior, o por el jardín entrando d
neighborhood_overview:
El pequeño municipio de Guils de Cerdanya está situado en los Pirineos gerundenses, en el valle de La Cerdanya, cuya capital es Puigcerdá, en la que el viajero encontrará todos los servicios, tales como tiendas, Hospital, cines, etc.
Guils de Cerdanya es un pueblo pequeño y muy tranquilo. Solo hay un restaurante, El Picarol, que abre los fines de semana, en Navidad y durante el mes de agosto. La estación de esquí nórdico Guils-Fontanera pertenece al municipio, y se accede por la carretera que sube desde Puigcerdá.
host_about:
Soy ingeniero de profesión, lo que hace que sea muy meticuloso y perfeccionista. Soy extrovertido, me encanta conocer nuevas gentes y culturas de las que aprendo muchas cosas.
Una de mis pasiones es viajar, que comparto con mi mujer. Juntos hemos visitado muchas de las hermosas ciudades europeas. Me encanta conocer mundo, soy un enamorado del continente africano, he viajado por diferentes países de ese continente.
Practico varios deportes pero sobre todo que sean al aire libre: esquí, tenis y golf, pero mi gran pasión es la pesca a mosca.
Me encanta el cine, las obras maestras las veo varias veces para no perder los detalles, y la lectura de novelas.

name: Beautiful apartment along the beach, pool, parking
description:
Spacious apartment in Roses, with view from the terrace over the beach and the swimming pool in the garden.
The apartment is very comfortable distributed. It has a large living with sofas and a dining table for 6. The Kitchen has all the utilities to have a comfortable holiday. There a 2 comfortable bedrooms with 2 bathrooms. All the rooms have windows and view over the back garden or the front garden with the swimming pool.
It has good quality wifi, TV satellite and a private parking.

The space
The apartment is decorated in light and sunny colours. The apartment is about 70 m2 and the terrace an extra 10 m2.
The very spacious living room with American kitchen is directly connected to the beautiful terrace where you can enjoy a delicious meal with a view over the pool in the garden and the sea in front of you. In the salon there are sofas, a table for 6, a television and internet. There are 2 bedrooms, 1 with a double bed and tele and an en-suit
neighborhood_overview:
The apartment is in a very quite neighborhood. Nearby there is a small supermarket with fresh bread. In front of the apartment on the promenade there are restaurants to enjoy breakfast, lunch or diner. The beach is just 2 steps from the apartment.
You can walk in the neighborhood, or rent bikes.
Also you could visit, Cadaques, Figueres (Dali), Castello de Empurias or Girona.
host_about:
I live in Roses with my husband and 2 children since 2006. It is a lovely place to live, always something to do and many days of the year you can find us playing on the beach, biking at the boulevard or walking in the nearby mountains. 
We would be glad to welcome you to our apartments.

name: MASIA AISLADA EN LA ALTA GARROTXA
description:
Se alquila Masía aislada del S XV totalmente restaurada conservando los elementos originales, pero con las comodidades actuales. La casa está situada en el Espacio Natural de la Alta Garrotxa a 12 Km del pueblo de Tortellà por un camino rural en buenas condiciones (20 mints en coche).

The space
Lugar para desconectar de la rutina, autentica Masia catalana del año 1403 rodeada totalmente de naturaleza y grandes bosques, donde podrás estar integrado en un paisaje Único y totalmente aislado.
La casa es auto sostenible y ecológica: se calienta con caldera de leña se ilumina con energía solar y el agua brota directamente de unas fuentes.
Junto a la casa está la Masoveria y la casa de los propietarios que se dedican a la ganadería ecológica.
Con una superficie de 220 metros y capacidad para 8 personas dispone de 4 habitaciones dobles y dos baños completos. Cocina con chimenea, Salón de 55 metros, pequeña capilla y zonas exteriores con piscina de mader

Apartamento a primera línea de mar, muy luminoso y acogedor, ideal para parejas, hay otra mini habitación con una litera, hay un lavabo con bañera. La estancia mínima es de 5 días.

Tiene vistas al mar y al río Muga que es una zona de reserva natural de l'empurdá, las vistas son impresionantes, el piso es muy luminoso y se encuentra a 50m de la playa y paseo marítimo

se pueden hacer paseos en barquita por los canales,de nuestra pequeña venecia,paseos en bici y si eres mas atrevido y te gusta el riesgo saltos de paracaidismo,anímate es muy divertido. Y la novedad túnel de viento y sino simplemente,relax,sol y playa y a disfrutar de las vacaciones
la entrada del apartamento sera sobre la 13.00 del mediodía.y la salida a las 11.00h

neighborhood_overview: Cistella es un pueblecito encantador, de vida tranquila y familiar. name: Mas Quatre Camins.
description:
Nineteenth century cottage located in an exceptional place. You can enjoy the wonderful views of the pastures and forests that surround it, as well as easy access to the most important places and the best beaches of the Costa Brava.

The space
This nineteenth century Catalan cottage, available for ten people, has the best amenities and comfort to make you feel at home. On the ground floor, there is a big living room with two different chilling areas. from wich you can acces to the toilet and to a double bedroom. At the other end of the floor there is the kitchen, fully equipped with a large solid wood table and a fireplace.
The first floor has a small lounge, four double bedrooms and three bathrooms. From every room you can enjoy wonderful views of the fields and the woods surrounding the house.
And, if the cozy inside of the house has dazzled you, the outside is even better!
In the garden you can prepare a delicious barbacue in the summer porch,
neighborhood_overview: The house is located in a road within 2 kilometers from the village of Viladasens and Sant Jordi Desvalls. It's a quiet place where you can enjoy the silence, fresh air and the sights  reach you until the last meadow. A beautiful landscape, where small forests offer you nice walks next to the Ter river.
host_about:
Somos una familia que reside en Barcelona.
Somos amantes del viaje, de los buenos paisajes y vivir con harmonía y felicidad.
Nos fascina conocer culturas y mundo.

description:
Appartment with impressive views to the Palamos bay in the heart of Costa Brava. In a luxury residential area with 3 swimming pools, 3 tennis courts, 3 minutes from the beach and small bays and with room and meal service if required.

The space
Appartment with impressive views to the Palamos bay in the heart of Costa Brava. In a privileged and quiet area between pines, a big garden and the sea, the building has the Mediterranean sea in front. Direct access to the beach and small bays typical on Costa Brava with pines, sand and rocks.

Guest access
3 swimming pools (one with salted water), 3 tennis courts, pin-pon rooms, room, laundry and meal service if required. Caretaker and surveillance 24 hours/7 days a week all the year round. Wi-fi. TV. In July and August there are swimming clases and some activities (tennis competition, swimming clases...) for children and adults.
neighborhood_overview: Quiet residential area very close to villages with restaurants and shops (Palamos). In the heart of the Costa Brava which has many places to visit (middle-age village Pals and Peratallada, small fisher villages like Tamariu, small bays and lovely mountain/sea landscapes).

host_about:
Hello,

We are a family who own a number of apartments and houses
-  Costa Brava, Spain (town of Sant Antoni de Calonge and town of Palamos)

We speak fluent English, French, Danish, Spanish, Catalan, German and Mandarin Chinese.

My father is a diplomat, so we have lived and traveled extensively around the world. We enjoy meeting travelers and try our best to make your stay as enjoyable as possible.

We have contracted cleaning and maintenance staff, available to solve any issue that may come up during your stay, as soon as possible.

Generally Ana (in Spain) will be the ones to meet you at the property and provide tips about the area (she can advise on activities, restaurants, shops...). 

We enjoy good food and wine, sailing (and may be able to take you out on a boat trip locally depending on the dates of your visit), scuba diving, skiing, go-karting, adventure sports in general, entrepreneurial ventures, football, art and architecture, handicrafts etc.
