name: 10th century medieval Castle
description:
In the Ripollès region, between rivers, valleys and mountains, the ancient Castle of Llaés (10th century) stands splendidly. A unique place, of exceptional beauty, where absolute tranquility reigns in the middle of an exuberant nature.
The Castle has been fully renovated for the comfort required by the facilities for rural tourism, with 8 rooms, 5 with a double bed, and 3 with two single beds. It has a living room, dining room, kitchen, 4 bathrooms, garden and terrace.

The space
The Llaés Castle is a project of reform and maintenance of this national cultural asset that, by force of spirit and the guests from all over the world who come to visit us, can continue its journey.

Guest access
Currently the fortification retains the physiognomy of a castle, the homage tower, the parade ground, and the religious enclosure with a garden area, the small cemetery, and the church of San Bartolomé, in a marked Romanesque style.

Other
neighborhood_overview: In the town of Llaés we are 12 inhabitants, and what we like the most about our neighborhood, the tranquility and harmony that is breathed, the green of the mountains with the contrast of the electric blue of the sky. We love quiet afternoons where just looking up you see eagles, owls at dusk, butterflies, hares, moles, foxes, and countless more neighbors running around the neighborhood!
host_about:
Hello!
 We love the rural environment and the variety of activities offered: hiking, mountain biking, climbing, and a lot more.
We are fortunate to be able to receive people from all over the world in this small and incredible X century castle.
Always there, 24 hours 7 days a week, we ensure that our guests feel like royalty!
 We hope you have the best experience during your stay :) Marc & Ginny

Hola!
  Somos una pareja joven, amamos el entorno rural y la variedad de actividades que ofrece: senderismo, ciclismo de montaña, escalada y mucho más.
  ¡Somos afortunados de poder recibir personas de todo el mundo en este pequeño e increíble castillo del siglo X!
  Siempre allí, las 24 horas, los 7 días de la semana, nos aseguramos de que nuestros huéspedes se sientan como la realeza.
  ¡Esperamos que tengas la mejor experiencia durante tu estancia! :) Marc y Ginny

host_about: Estoy casada y tengo cuatro hijos, un chico de 21 años y trillizas de 16 años. Trabajo por cuenta propia, soy arquitecta técnica. Pero también me apasiona el contacto con la naturaleza y descubrir lugares con encanto.

name: Céntrico y familiar
description:
Céntrico apartamento de 3 habitaciones y 2 baños. En el centro de Roses. Ubicado a 3' de la playa principal. En la misma calle, todo tipo de comercios y restaurantes. Climatizado y con doble cristal, optimo para el descanso. Dispone de ascensor, TV. y Wifi. Cocina de lujo, grande y bien equipada, con nevera, horno, vitro, microondas, lavavajillas, cafetera y tostadora. En un cuartito, todo para la perfecta colada, lavadora, y plancha de ropa.

The space
El apartamento se encuentra en pleno centro de Roses, pero en un barrio tranquilo para el descanso. a 200 metros de la playa de arena de Roses, así como del puerto y paseo marítimo. A 5 minutos a pie de toda la zona más turística si os apetece.
Es un apartamento nuevo con todas las comodidades.
3 habitaciones, una de ellas con el cuarto de baño incorporado tipo suite.
Espacios amplios y diáfanos. Completamente exterior. Climatizado frio y calor
Se trata de un edificio pequeño y familiar, 2º piso
neighborhood_overview:
Vecindario tranquilo, con varios comercios y restaurantes cercanos.
En la misma calle hay de todo, frutería, carnicería, pescadería, panadería, así como varios supermercados cercanos.
Hay una plaza de juegos infantiles en el mismo barrio.
host_about:
Mi prioridad es que los huéspedes se encuentren a gusto en mis apartamentos.
guardando la esencia de Airbnb.
Desde siempre, damos una especial atención a la limpieza e higiene, ahora más, ajustándonos a los protocolos marcados por el ICTE.
Roses es la ubicación ideal para una extensa variedad de actividades por toda la zona.
Gracias por confiar en mí ! Espero conocerte!

name: Peratallada. Casa Orient (Girona - Costa Brava)
description:
Casa de pueblo rehabilitada, de diseño, con estilo y con encanto. Está ubicada en una de las calles más tranquilas del casco antiguo de Peratallada, probablemente el pueblo medieval más bonito no solo de la Costa Brava sino de Catalunya. Peratallada cuenta con pequeñas tiendas de producto local, restaurantes donde se come muy bien y se encuentra, solo, a 15 minutos de las mejores playas del litoral catalán.

Distribución en tres niveles: Planta baja con un espacio diáfano y baño / 1er piso con cocina, comedor, sala de estar y patio-terraza / Buhardilla con dos habitaciones con vistas y baño. Materiales: Piedra, madera, hierro y cristal.

name: CAN FELIP - Apartamento 1 (s.XVIII)
description:
Magnífica casa de pueblo del siglo XVIII, ubicado en el centro de la villa de Palafrugell. La casa ha sido totalmente rehabilitada y dividida en 3 apartamentos “Can Felip”

The space
Magnífica casa de pueblo del siglo XVIII, ubicado en el centro de la villa de Palafrugell. La casa ha sido totalmente rehabilitada y dividida en 3 apartamentos “Can Felip”: -Piso 1: 156m2 + 33 de terraza. -Piso 2: 114 m2 + 70m2 de preciosa terraza soleada a 4 vientos. -Piso Ático: 76m2 + 47 de fabulosa terraza privada a 3 vientos.

Todas las habitaciones son grandes y frescas. Estas disponen de un ventilador en verano y calefacción en invierno.

“Can Felip” se encuentran situados en el centro del pueblo de Palafrugell a 50 metros de la Iglesia y del Mercado. En una zona tranquila con agradables vistas, situada en el corazón del “Baix Empordà” (Costa Brava).

A 3 Km de las fantásticas playas de Calella de Palafrugell, Llafranc y Tamariu.
neighborhood_overview:
Palafrugell se remonta al siglo X. El núcleo antiguo, conserva aún hoy algo de su trazado urbanístico medieval, encabezado por la iglesia de Sant Martí y formado por un conjunto de calles y callejones que configuran un gran centro comercial.

El máximo desarrollo de la localidad se produjo a finales del siglo XVIII con el inicio de la producción de tapones de corcho, hecho que aún hoy es evidente en la arquitectura local, con las fábricas de corcho y los edificios modernistas de la época. En el Museo del Corcho podrá conocer más a fondo esta industria.

A pie o en bicicleta, y a tu ritmo, explora tanto como desees, por la extensa red de 350km de caminos que hay actualmente en la Costa Brava, por los arrozales, o por las dunas de la playa de Pals a través de miradores privilegiados sobre el mar o bien por los yacimientos del Empordà... y, por supuesto, por los caminos de ronda: un impresionante paseo que acaricia el mar entre acantilados y que une todas las playas d
host_about:
Como representantes de una pequeña empresa familiar que se dedica a la restauración de Casas y Apartamentos nos complace mucho integrarnos en la comunidad Airbnb para poderos ofrecer nuestras viviendas, que esperamos sean el futuro de magníficas experiencias para nuestros invitados...

------------------

As partners of a small family business dedicated to the restoration of properties, we are delighted to become Airbnb members to offer our Houses and Apartments, which we hope will be the future of great experiences for our guests...

name: Fab view Penthouse, Pool&Beach, terrace, garage,AC
description:
Duplex-Atico Penthouse with community POOL, roof TERRACE with wonderful VIEWS over the Bay of Rosas, Empuries and the old town up to the port and Montgó. The fully equipped apartment accomodates 4 people - It has 2 double-bedrooms with bathroom en-Suite. AC and heating.
Oldtown and beaches 5 min walking.
No parking problems with a garage!

The space
My wonderful view- penthouse with 2 bedrooms, balcony and roof terrace accomodates 4 people.
On the first floor you have one bedroom with bathroom and the livingroom, dinnertable and fully equipped kitchen. Upstairs you find the main bedroom with a 160cm bed and a bathroom. From there you exit onto the roof terrace with sunbeds, table and BBQ - and amazing views :-)
For direct refreshment you can jump in the pool.
No parking problems with a garage!

5 min. walk to the oldtown, 5 min walk to the lovely beaches of Empuries (just take the steps at the end of my road, or the new pano
neighborhood_overview:
- Quiet street, 5 min walk to old town and Empuriesbeaches (direct steps at the end of my road leading down to the beaches ad the beautiful walkway to Sant Marti d'Empuries).

- Around us:
Have a walk to the roman-greek Ruins or the little village Sant Marti dEmpuries, passing by the Hostal Empuries – it’s worth a look inside! Its terrace or the “Chiringuitos” invite to take a aperitif on the way to the village or just during your stay on the beaches. The magnificent Empuries beaches are very child friendly as very shallow, although in the first one you will find quite a few rocks underneath the water.
Southwards you can walk along the sea as well – over the new part of Riells (second hand market every Sunday!) to the port. Also in the port you find many restaurants. If you want to walk even further, you will reach the beautiful bay of Montgo. Amazing sand, clear shallow waters, hiking tracks and restaurants.

Sant Antoni combines a rich medieval history with modern day facilities, offering an ideal place to relax, either on the beach or in the mountains. It lies 2 km away from Palamós, along the seashore path, offering the visitor exceptional views of our coasts.

The beautiful winding path along the "Camino de Ronda", will also take you to Playa de Aro. During the walk, you will be able to sit down and rest on any of the terraces and enjoy the sunshine, even during the winter months.
host_about:
Hello,

We are a family who own a number of apartments and houses
-  Costa Brava, Spain (town of Sant Antoni de Calonge and town of Palamos)

We speak fluent English, French, Danish, Spanish, Catalan, German and Mandarin Chinese.

My father is a diplomat, so we have lived and traveled extensively around the world. We enjoy meeting travelers and try our best to make your stay as enjoyable as possible.

We have contracted cleaning and maintenance staff, available to solve any issue that may come up during your stay, as soon as possible.

Generally Ana (in Spain) will be the ones to meet you at the property and provide tips about the area (she can advise on activities, restaurants, shops...). 

We enjoy good food and wine, sailing (and may be able to take you out on a boat trip locally depending on the dates of your visit), scuba diving, skiing, go-karting, adventure sports in general, entrepreneurial ventures, football, art and architecture, handicrafts etc.
neighbourhood: Sant Antoni de Calonge, Girona, Spain

name: Casa de piedra rehabilitada Cal Masover
description:
En un entorno privilegiado,destaca el silencio y la era exterior. La casa consta de cocina-comedor con chimenea,dos cuartos de baño,salón y dos habitaciones con altillos practicables,se pueden alojar 5 adultos en camas + 2 jóvenes en altillos.

The space
Antiguo convento adosado a la iglesia de Sant Marcel de Planès,armoniosamente rehabilitado pero respetando su esencia de paz y tranquilidad,bien comunicado a la vez goza también de inmejorables vistas del valle del Rigard.
Buen punto de partida para conocer la comarca,destacando el Santuario de Nuria a 2.000 metro de altitud y las estaciones e esqui de la Molina y Masella.

Guest access
Comedor exterior situado debajo del porche con mesa,banco y dos sillas,hamacas para tomar el sol en la era.
Mesa de ping pong a su disposición.

name: Seafront Penthouse Punta Romana, Pool-Wifi-Lift-AC
description:
You can enjoy your holiday sitting with a BBQ on the big terrace over the rocks at the blue sea Seafront Atico in Punta Romana (Sleeps 4), in the old town of Escala. You find the most beautiful Panoramic views over the whole bay, oldtown bay and Empuries beaches with its Ruins, up to the Pyrenees (latter especially in wintertime). The centre you reach within 3-5min by feet. The pool has panoramic views, a lift to the apartm. Our apartment has been recently refurbished with Parquet and new bathr

The space
Welcome to our beautiful by the sea home.
You can enjoy your holiday sitting on the big terrace over the rocks in the blue water, with a book in the sun, with a BBQ or a wine underneath the stars, in the old town of L’Escala. You find the most beautiful Panoramic views over the whole bay, oldtown bay and Empuries beaches with its Ruins, up to the Pyrenees (latter especially in wintertime), even from the pool site. The lift to the apartment is a comfortable
neighborhood_overview:
Around us:
Have a walk to the roman-greek Ruins or the little village Sant Marti dEmpuries, passing by the Hostal Empuries – it’s worth a look inside! Its terrace or the “Chiringuitos” invite to take a aperitif on the way to the village or just during your stay on the beaches. The magnificent Empuries beaches are very child friendly as very shallow, although in the first one you will find quite a few rocks underneath the water.
Southwards you can walk along the sea as well – over the new part of Riells (second hand market every Sunday!) to the port. Also in the port you find many restaurants. If you want to walk even further, you will reach the beautiful bay of Montgo. Amazing sand, clear shallow waters, hiking tracks and restaurants.

As well as Montgo as Sant Marti you can reach with the choo-choo-train in the summer. Best stop is downtown at the beginning of the Pedestrian Zone (for Montgo) or even directly up the stairs from Punta Romana (or around the corner),

name: Can Janot
description:
Can Janot es una casa rural en la zona de Camprodon, Girona.

Una casa rural para poder disfrutar unos días en grupo y/o familia y tener una estancia perfecta.

Dispone de un jardín privado de unos 100 m2, con una mesa de picnic y también hay una barbacoa propia en la zona común.

Tiene capacidad para 8 personas y una cuna a disposición del grupo.

The space
CASA 2 “CAN JANOT” (Disponible) Capacidad: 8 personas más una cuna/ cama de 60x120cm (para bebes o niños de hasta 6 años)

PRIMERA PLANTA

1. Sala anexa con llave y salida directa al gran Jardín trasero de la casa (1.500 m2) para 2 pax TV.
2. Salón con mesa para 8 comensales al lado de la chimenea, sofá y butaca individual para leer, juegos de mesa, televisión, calefacción y TV. El Salón tiene salida directa al jardín principal, de unos 2.500 m2
3. Cocina completamente equipada, lavavajillas, horno, microondas, tostadora, cafeteras Oroley y Nespresso
neighborhood_overview:
Este magnífico lugar ubicado en Rocabruna está rodeado de montañas, riachuelos, prados donde pastan vacas, ovejas, caballos y cabras, y dónde podemos encontrar espectaculares bosques, árboles frutales, setas e infinidad de rutas para descubrir y explorar. En los alrededores de Rocabruna podemos encontrar desde cuevas naturales hasta una mina abandonada de cobre, piedras semipreciosas y plata, y que según cuenta una leyenda, parece ser que estuvo habitada por gnomos, así como una historia medieval de un amor imposible - al estilo de Romeo y Julieta -entre los hijos de dos señores feudales.

Hay constancia escrita de su existencia desde el siglo IX. Es un pequeño y armonioso ejemplo del Románico Pirenaico con su gran castillo de defensa en ruinas, su iglesia del siglo Xll y un núcleo de casas antiguas a su alrededor.

Las tres casas están situadas en Rocabruna (Camprodón), que es un pueblo de origen medieval y uno de los rincones más bellos y vírgenes del Pirineo Ca
host_about:
Somos muy familiares, nos gusta leer cerca de un buen fuego, con una buena comida a la brasa de leña, somos amantes de los animales. Es por eso que queremos que otras personas puedan disfrutar de nuestras casas.

.

L'apartament disposa d'un saló menjador cuina, de dues habitacions i un bany.
Hi ha una habitació de matrimoni i una amb un llit individual amb llit supletori.

name: stunning villa on the costa brava,
description:
Located on the most beautiful part of the Costa Brava, Vila Gelida has it all. A guesthouse for 3 downstairs, a private elevator to take you up to the mainhouse where the views are simply stunning, and the swimming pool awaits you. PermitHUTG- 009961.

The space
Enjoy lounging on one the terraces, by the pool, in the comfortable living room. Wherever you go, the Mediteranean sea follows you. Villa Gelida is decorated in modern style with some Asian touches.

License number
HUTG-009961
neighborhood_overview: Overlooking the impressive coast line of Aigua Blava and Begur and very close to the town of Tamariu, Villa Gelida is in a very unique location. Girona and Barcelona are an easy drive away. Numerous excellent golf courses are nearby, not to mention a huge choice of excellent and well priced restaurants. The waters in front of the house are among the best diving waters of the Coast, and you can rent gear or join a diving school in Tamariu. Boat rental is available in Tamariu.The famous Dali museum in Figueres is an hour's drive.
host_about:
This is our little piece of heaven..... It is our second home and we drive down as many weekends and holidays as possible from Barcelona. We have all traveled most of our lives and that would be a very important factor to the whole family, the need to travel and see and discover as much as possible. Part of the family spent many years in italy and the other part of the family in Asia.

5 things i would not be without, would be my family, recycling, animals,nature and the sea.
I love Jazz and Clasical music and love to read history books!

name: Country House in Costa Brava
description:
Can Gironella is a typical country catalan house. It is located in a little and quiet town far away from the coast crowds, but near from the beaches of Ampurias and La Escala (5km).

The space
Can Gironella is an airy and large rustic house (200m). It has 3 double rooms and one single with 2 beds (8 persons). There is a kitchen with a fireplace, a sitting room with TV, 2 bathrooms, a big balcony and a billiard hall.

Guest access
Bed linen and towels are provided.

Other things to note
The village of Viladamat counts with an exceptional location due to its nearness to many interesting points both cultural and leisure. It has a large variety of possibilities around.

The Natural Park of Aiguamolls de l'Empordà is 8km away, the Empúries ruins and museum at 5km, La Escala at 5km, the Natural Park of Cap de Creus at 21km, the Natural Park of l'Albera at 25km, Figueres at 20km, Girona at 32km, La Bisbal at 19km, Bar
neighborhood_overview:
Viladamat is the typical rustic town of the Ampurdan zone. Even though is little and very quiet, it counts with all the basic services such a cash machine, a little supermarket, bakery, butchers, bar and a restaurant.

It is located 5km away from the coastal town of La Escala and very close to the Costa Brava beaches.

name: Salt water pool with whirlpool jets and Jacuzzi
description:
Rural house more than 300 years old located in the heart of Girona.
It consists of about 13.000m2, where a dream property stands out, accompanied by a saltwater swimming pool and extensive green gardens that fit into a unique natural environment.
At Can Xera you can enjoy sublime tranquillity, far from the noise of the city, but close enough to enjoy the cities of Girona and Barcelona.
Adapted for events, children and accessible for people with disabilities.

The space
FROM YOUR HOME TO YOUR OTHER HOME, BUT ON HOLIDAY.

Do you want a quiet holiday away from the usual noise, but still close enough for day trips to Barcelona, Girona or the Costa Brava? Do you want to experience the traditional Catalan hospitality and culture? Then this house is for you.
Set on a mountainside, this beautifully restored house, over 300 years old, offers stunning views from almost every point of the property.

name: Pet Friendly Mas Torrencito (dooble room)
description:
Possibly the first rural house in Spain for pets that accepts people. It is a different country house, specializing in pets. The whole house is ready for them. Refrain people who do not like pets.

Breakfast price: 7,50 - dinners: 15 €

The space
Possibly the best rural house in Girona to go with your pet
Mas Torrencito offers its four-legged and human visitors the possibility of actively enjoying the rural tourism of Girona, among the different options that we propose are the routes that surround the unique environment of Mas Torrencito. Holiday cottages Girona Mas torrencito. Our House - Rural Tourism pets girona Make the best of the nature and beauty of the area by foot, by bike or by car, to get lost in long woods or the hills of the empurdanese plain, long routes that without Doubt if you will be short, from forest to costa brava. No doubt an ideal starting point for rural tourism in Girona, especially taking into account that you will never be
neighborhood_overview: It is an "isolated" house with more than 70 hectares of land, where puppies and people can walk to our langillo ... Surrounded by woods and rivers ... a quiet place where silence is only broken by the singing of the Little birds We are 2 kms from Bascara, 14 from Figueres (museum Dali) 19 from the beach (La Rubina, an immense beach where you can go with your pet), 40 from France, 14 from Besalú and Banyoles, ....
host_about:
NIÑOS, PERROS Y CINTAS DE VÍDEO

Mas Torrencito es una casa rural diferente. Una masía del siglo XV, restaurada con un estilo muy personal, y rodeada de campos, bosques y caminos que llegan hasta un río que merece ser escuchado al menos durante un rato. Su propietario, Miguel, se ha encargado de darle su propia personalidad a la casa durante siete años, creando diferentes rincones en los que puedes charlar con tu pareja disfrutando de una buena botella de vino mientras tus hijos juegan libremente por los alrededores, compartir con otros huéspedes costumbres y (Website hidden by Airbnb) de tus mascotas mientras ves cómo ellas disfrutan y se persiguen felices, o subir a la planta de arriba y escoger una de esas películas que tenías pendiente para hacerte un homenaje frente a una gran pantalla. Puedes hacer lo que quieras, porque en Mas Torrencito la libertad se respira a cada momento y en cada lugar.

Marcos, Manuela y Matías, tres de las mascotas de Miguel, son el auténtico espíritu de la casa. Esos tres perros deberían tener contrato indefinido y pensión vitalicia. Ellos muestran la casa a los nuevos huéspedes, sus 8 confortables habitaciones dobles y triples, los baños completos, el salón de techos altos y vigas de madera, el antiguo horno de pan, la sala de entretenimientos, la piscina y el jardín con mobiliario y juegos para niños. Pero también acompañan a los huéspedes durante los paseos, entretienen a mayores y niños con su buen carácter y sus ganas de jugar, y relacionan con las mascotas recién llegadas con paciencia, cariño y una gran amabilidad.

Mientras tanto, Miguel cocina. Y cómo cocina. Platos elaborados con productos de su propia huerta. Recetas que le chivan las madres de los propietarios de los restaurantes de los alrededores. Bizcochos con diferentes sabores, mermeladas, cereales, pan recién hecho y embutidos de la zona, una de las mejores del país en esta especialidad.

Mas Torrencito se puede disfrutar en pareja si te gustan los animales, ya que es una manera de poder disfrutar de su compañía siempre que quieras. También es un lugar ideal para niños, ya que rápidamente se enamorarán de Marcos, Matias y Manuela, probablemente la mejor buscadora de piedras del mundo. Y también es un lugar perfecto para visitar con tu propia mascota, disfrutar de unos días en la naturaleza y que los dos hagáis buenos amigos. En Mas Torrencito te sientes parte de algo, y cada visita es diferente a las demás.

El único problema de Mas Torrencito es que obliga a volver. Yo ya lo he hecho, y no será la única vez.

name: Begur: lovely house with pool next to Sa Tuna
description:
Beautiful house with large garden and private pool. BBQ area and relax. Various outdoor spaces to relax in the sun or shade. Very close to Sa Tuna beach (you can walk). Sea views. Wifi highspeed 300MB. Ideal for 8 people. The house consists of 2 independent floors, each with 2 double bedrooms, bathroom, living room & kitchen. Games and books for children and protected pool. Parking area (2 cars). Towels, sheets and taxes included. Visit my Insta "begurisbeautiful" for more pictures of the area.

The space
The house is perfect for 8 people. Since the house is distributed in two independent floors (outdoor stairs), it is ideal for two families of four or to have certain autonomy among friends. The house has two bathrooms, one on each floor, four double bedrooms (two with single beds and two with double beds), two living rooms with access to a terrace or garden and a kitchen on each floor. The house is in an area between pine trees, overlooking the sea and has a priv
neighborhood_overview: The house is completely independent and located in a convenient spot, very close to some of the most beautiful beaches such as Sa Tuna, Sa Riera, Aiguablava or Aiguafreda. The house is in front of the "Camí Vell" of Sa Tuna, a forest path that goes from Begur to Sa Tuna. It is a pleasant path that allows you to walk to the town or to Sa Tuna. You can walk to Sa Tuna (about 10/12 minutes) and the town of Begur (18m). By car it takes 2 minutes to Sa Tuna and 5 minutes to Begur. A drive to Barcelona takes about 1:30 h and to Girona about 45 minutes, both worth day excursions! Not more than 20 minutes away you have many nice villages to visit and even Dali spots.
host_about: Vivimos en Barcelona con nuestros hijos pero siempre que podemos nos escapamos a la Costa Brava. Nos encanta ir a la playa para hacer snorkelling y padel surf, relajarnos y disfrutar de los muchos restaurantes y rincones que ofrece la costa.  Esperamos que disfrutes igual que nosotros!

description:
Large villa with Mediterranean seaview and private pool. Ideal for golfers and families who appreciate comfort, space and privacy. 5min drive from Platja d'Aro beach&town center. Several major renovations in the past years. Well equipped new kitchen and dining areas with sea & hill view.

Luxurious Villa with great sea views in Costa Brava (100km from Barcelona), garden, private swimming pool, barbecue, fire place, free WiFi, garage in a very quiet holiday area.

Guest access
The Villa is split into two parts. On the lower level, with its own access there are 2 bedrooms and a bathroom (shower + to
neighborhood_overview:
Area:
The villa is located in the Mas Nou Mountain, just up from Platja D'Aro (5min drive to the city center). As common in the area, the streets leading to the Villa are not very well maintained and slow driving is recommended to avoid damages to the car.

Region:
Costa Brava is a 220km long coastal region of northeastern Spain in the province of Girona. The Costa Brava stretches from Blanes, northeast of Barcelona, to the French border. Its rich culture includes picturesque fishing villages such as L'Estartit and Tamariu, hidden beaches and bays, some of which are only accessible by boat. The average air temperatures range between 24°C and 28°C in summer and in spring between 17°C and 25°C. The water temperature is comfortable for swimming from May 20°C until October and in summer goes up to 24°C.

Sport:

host_about:
Hola! Som la Laia i en Jofre. Som de Tossa, on vivim i tenim la nostra família. Treballem en el món de la cuina en diferents projectes, un d’ells a Tossa mateix, la Braseria Pini, un restaurant que sense perdre les arrels familiars aposta cada any per una carta més actual. Gaudim menjant bé, ens encanta descobrir llocs i provar nous plats. Fa més de 8 anys que allotgem hostes a Airbnb llogant apartaments i ben aviat també la Baby Blue, una “glamper van”. Ens agrada conèixer i compartir experiències amb altres persones que, com a nosaltres, els agrada viatjar i conèixer nous racons de món. Tossa és el nostre racó, un poble de la Costa Brava que ens dona molta vida a l’estiu i molta pau a l’hivern.
No dubteu a demanar-nos recomanacions.
Fins aviat!

Amplia villa en Sant Antoni de Calonge, con 4 dormitorios dobles, 2 baños completos, 1 aseo, cocina, salón-comedor, sala de estar y gran jardín que rodea toda la casa con piscina privada, pergola con sillas y sofás, la casa está a dos minutos en coche de la playa de Palamós y Sant Antoni.

Estupenda villa con 4 dormitorios dobles, 2 baños completos, 1 aseo, cocina, salón-comedor, sala de estar y dos terrazas muy amplias con sofás, mesas y sillones, donde pueden sentarse a comer, leer o simplemente relajarse, dispone de un amplio jardín con piscina privada, pergola con mesa sillas y sofás frente a la piscina, la casa está en una zona muy tranquila, a dos minutos en coche de la playa de Sant Antoni y Palamós, a pocos minutos también encontrarán estupendas calas con aguas cristalinas, pueden acceder a ellas con coche o andando por el "Camí de Ronda".

name: Cargols de Mar 3 - Empuriabrava
description:
Very nice house located in a small residence in front of the sea in Empuriabrava.
Comfortable and well equipped.
It has a community pool, WIFI, air conditioning and private garage.
Privileged location and magnificent views from its various terraces.

The space
Beautiful house located in a private residence with swimming pool.
Privileged location, on the seafront in Empuriabrava and on the canal.
House divided into 3 floors.
On the ground floor, there is a private garage with an extra bedroom and a large terrace with garden furniture and barbecue. This room is not air conditioned and is not recommended for young children, as it is independent from the rest of the house.
The first floor consists of a spacious living / dining room with terrace, an open kitchen and a bathroom with shower.
Stairs give access to the second floor composed of three bedrooms, two with a double bed and the third with bunk beds (two single beds), a sec
neighborhood_overview:
Very calm area in front of the sea and the maritime promenade.
A few steps from the city center of Empuriabrava and tourist activities.

name: AMAZING TRIPLEX SEA VIEWS TOSSA
description:
Lovely triplex apartment with terrace, in first sea view line, very bright, all rooms with windows and from where you will enjoy incredible sea views and the walls of “Vila Vella”
Perfect location, less than 1 minute from the beach

The space
The apartment with wifi included in the price, has 3 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, living room, kitchen fully equipped with dishwasher and a terrace with BBQ. This terrace, has furniture so you can enjoy meals outdoors.
AC in the entire apartment.
There is room for 6 people with the following distribution:
-Bedroom with double bed
-Bedroom with double bed
-Bedroom with 2 single beds, with the possibility of putting a third bed.
We have cribs and high chair if you need. Please requested in advance. Costs 25€ for the hole stay

neighborhood_overview:
The apartment is in the first line for sea views and at the same time, right next to the “Vila Vella”, the walled city.
For those who don’t know Tossa, you don’t have to worry about noises for being at the first line. Not much later than midnight all restaurant are close and the street is really quiet.
Distance from the beach is less than 1 minute. There is a little supermarket a minute away and another one, a little bit bigger 4 minutes away. The biggest is 10 minutes walking.
This zone belongs to the old neighborhood, so you will find narrow streets, nice shops and much more.

Tossa is a beautiful and quiet town, with a lot of charm. Ideal to travel with your couple, family or with the kids.
It is one of the most beautiful town in all Costa Brava, where you can steel feel the little old town atmosphere and where is not allowed to build tall buildings.
Besides enjoying the beaches, there are a lot other things to do. For example: walk around the ol
host_about:
We are Ana and Kristjàn and we’ve been offering accommodation in Tossa de Mar for over thirty years. Seven years ago, we were very happy to found Let’s Holidays.

The passion with which we’ve been working these past years has made us grow, and we now have a vast team of professionals working with us. 
With them, we will make sure to find the best option for you and to get you everything you will need during your stay :)

If there is something that we have learnt this past years is that we like to be treated the same way that we treat you. 
That’s where our philosophy comes from. We like to chat and we will try to get you anything that you need and find solutions to anything that you propose.

At the end, holidays should be exactly the way we want them, right?

We present some of our services :)

The Home Selector is the person who will help you choose the option most appropriate to your tastes. You will save time in searching and finding the best choice.

The Host is the person who will take care of you during the whole stay and try to find anything that you need with the help of the other hosts.

Let’s Holidays Home will be your second holiday home. A place where you will be able to meet with our Hosts, chat, have a glass of wine and listen to some live music.

We’ll love to meet you!

See you soon ;) 

Here you have all our options

name: Familia con niños en Costa Brava.
description:
Amplio apartamento situado a 300 m de la playa. Con una bonita y tranquila zona comunitaria donde se encuentran dos piscinas, una de ellas ideal para niños pequeños. El apartamento esta en la cuarta planta y dispone de una terraza solárium de uso privado.
La cocina està totalmente equipada y comunica con la terraza y el gran salón.
Hay pàrquing en la finca de acceso directo al apartamento.

The space
Situado a 300m de la playa dispone de un espacio interior comunitario único en la zona. Se encuentra situado a 5 minutos de supermercados, de dos farmacias, de la parada del autobús de la costa y de la oficina de turismo.

Guest access
Pàrquing, jardin comunitario y piscinas.

Other things to note
Somos residentes en la zona desde hace más de 40 años, podremos facilitar cualquier tipo de información en cuanto donde comer, excursiones, playas etc.. Posibilidad de ofrecer bicicletas en función de edades y núm. de pe
neighborhood_overview: Disponemos de persona responsable de la zona comunitaria que se encarga de garantizar un uso cívico de las instalaciones. Los niños bajan al jardín a primera hora y no quieren subir a casa hasta entrada la noche.

It has a shared swimming-pool and a garden with lovely view on the mountains. Functional, comfortable new apartment.

Baby equipment at your disposal: a travel bed with comfortable mattress (from 0 to 3 years old), and a portable booster to be attached to a dining chair with straps for kids under 15 kg.

neighborhood_overview: L'Escala has a strategic location - everything is close. description:
Casa de piedra situada a 5 minutos del pueblo andando.
Espectaculares vistas desde cualquier lugar de la vivienda.
Un magnífico porche donde poder relajarte,comer y disfrutar del silencio. Totalmente equipada.
Parking privado en el interior de la casa.

The space
En la primera planta se encuentra comedor cocina y sala de estar en un espacio abierto una suite y un pequeño aseo.
En la segunda dos habitaciones individuales una de matrimonio y un baño.
Todos los espacios tienen vista al mar.
Información en relación al COVID-19
La casa dispone de 230 m² situada en una parcela de 1000 m² totalmente vallada y con acceso únicamente disponible para los huéspedes.
El tiempo entre las reservas será de 72 h para asegurar una correcta desinfección del espacio que garantice la seguridad de los huéspedes.

neighborhood_overview: Se trata de una pequeña urbanización formada por casas unifamiliares dónde se respeta la tranquilidad de los vecinos.
host_about:
Hello! my name is Laura.I came to this place thirty years ago to spend a summer vacation and i loved it the architectual harmony,the transparency of the sea,Portlligat,the lunar landscape of Cap de Creus,so i decided to settle here.
I built this house respecting tre environement and giving prominence in all its spaces to this beautiful bay.
You can see the sea from everywhere in the house.
An ideal place to relax and disconnect.

All areas of the house and services are available

name: House with garden in front of Sea
description:
Beautifull and sunny house with garden in Cadaques in the Caials área, in front of the beach in "Caials" and 20 min walking from Cadaques centre. Close to Hotel Sol i Xent.
Perfect for families !!!

The space
Perfect house for a family with kids.
Completely newly equipped, very luminous and comfortable.

The house has two floors; on the ground floor there is the living room with access to the garden , the kitchen also with access to the garden and a big bathroom.

On the first floor there are three double bedrooms with two bathrooms.

There is one parking space in a covered parking.

The neighbourhood is very nice and quite, perfect for a relaxing holiday.

The Caials beach is underneath the house and it is at 7 minutes walking distance from El Ros beach, and 20 minutes from the centre village.

Guest access
We have 4 bikes for the guests.

name: close the beach - medieval village Pertallada
description:
This charming, stylishly renovated 1st floor apartment is in a typical beautiful 100 year old building.
It has a very pretty patio with beautiful views,
great for a wonderful bottle of wine or dinner.

The space
Spacious, bright 1st floor apartment built in 18th century stone and set in glorious surroundings. Consisting of an open-plan kitchen and living area leading to a charming outdoor patio.
The property is in the quieter part of a small but famous, medieval village offering plenty of restaurants & bars all within walking distance
.
The apartment consists of one big double bedroom ensuite, bathroom with shower and washbasin and a separate WC. There is a double sofabed in the lounge area.
Outdoor breakfast/dining on patio is possible. There are comfortable deck chairs, parasol and candle lanterns.
Central heating for the colder months is available and charged separately at cost price.
The kitchen is equipped with hob/
neighborhood_overview:
Peratallada is one of Catalonia's most prized and charming villages.
Beautiful to walk through, lots of restaurants to choose from and a number of festivals during the holiday season.
Free musical events are held in the castle square in August celebrating the Catalan culture.

Many wonderful beaches can be reached within 10-20 mins depending on your choice.
4 golf courses within easy reach. Definitely a great choice.

Other Activities: Music festivals, local markets, wonderful beaches near by.
host_about:
I am from Austria and have lived in various different countries.
My first home is switzerland and my second home is in Spain in Peratallada, near the beach.
I love cooking , reading, sports, walking with my lovely labrador dog, my home, family and friends.
I enjoy meeting people of all nationalities and I love to share a glass of wine with them whilst telling them about  this lovely area.

name: Private villa with pool & sea view for families
description:
Villa with great sea views overlooking the valley of Palamos and St Antoni de Calonge. We accept families and guests 30+.
Top floor: kitchen, living room, WC, roof terrace and small balcony.
Lower floor: 4 bedrooms w/ double beds - two new bathrooms.
Large terraced garden with pergola and generous pool area.

Quote from previous guest: "French riviera meets vintage Hollywood Hills."

The space
Villa Mariposa is very private - set on the end of the street Carrer Om in the urbanization of Rio de Oro - located on the hillside of Calonge. The house offers a spectacular view over the valley of Calonge and bay of St Antoni de Calonge/Palamos.

The house have a large landscaped garden with pergola for comfortable shade and a pool area with space for 8 pool beds.
The partly refurbished (2013) terraced house is 190+ sqm over two floors. Upper floor with a brand new kitchen, a large roof terrace, spacious living room area with
neighborhood_overview:
The house is located in the quiet urbanization Eio de Oro - only 10 minutes with car from the ocean front. Two good supermercados in the village of Calonge - only five minutes with car. Eurospar the closest one and Suma by the entrance to the village.
There is a great restaurant in the urbanization - Restaurant Rio de Oro.
host_about:
Villa Mariposa is our dream project. After searching for both the right area and then the right house - we found Villa Mariposa in febuary 2013. The house was in bad shape but we saw the potential.

We planned the renovation with an architect from Barcelona and finished the first renovation phase for the summer of 2013 - and we will continue with more renovation projects along with time.

We travel a lot - New York, Sydney, Europe, Asia - and over the years we have come to places where we have found special details or fantastic ambience or great views. These "moments" have been the inspiration for Villa Mariposa. Spacious, not to much furniture, a garden garden that tells a story over the year - and a view that takes the breath away.

name: CS01 Luxury villa, 500 m Sant Pol beach, S´Agaró
description:
Fully renovated luxury villa, located in one of the most prestigious areas of the Costa Brava - S'Agaró, just 500 meters from the unique and beautiful beach of Sant Pol. The villa is fully equipped with everything you need for holidays in family and is within walking distance of all services.

The space
The house has a total area of ​​about 250 m2 and is divided into 3 floors:

1st floor: entrance hall, through which you can go directly to the kitchen or living room, living room with dining room and access to a large sunny terrace with direct access to the pool, fully equipped modern kitchen, 3 spacious double bedrooms (one of them with own dressing room), a large bathroom with bathtub and shower and a guest toilet.

2nd floor: large master bedroom with built-in wardrobe and desk, bathroom with shower, large solarium overlooking S´agaró.

Basement: study with its own bathroom and a small equipped kitchen, games room, laundry, addition
neighborhood_overview:
S’Agaró is a luxury residential area located in the heart of laqa Costa Brava, between the towns of Sant Feliu de Guíxols and Playa de Aro.

S’Agaró has two main beaches: Sa Conca and San Pol, one of the most beautiful on the Costa Brava. Sa Conca is even officially considered one of the best beaches in Europe, surrounded by beautiful houses between pines and rocks.

The beach has all the services: bathrooms, showers, Red Cross, bars, sun beds and umbrellas for rent, playgrounds, adaptation for people with disabilities. Cafes and restaurants serving Mediterranean cuisine are located on the beach promenade of Sant Pol.

Guests of S’Agaró should definitely visit the promenade of Cami de Ronda. The 1.8 km long route is immersed in vegetation and has several viewpoints with spectacular views of the sea and the landscape of the Costa Brava.

I am dedicated to vacation rentals in Lloret de Mar, Playa de Aro and Sagaro. Since 2009 we have hosted travelers from all over the world in our accommodations and we love our work. We will be happy to welcome new travelers on the Costa Brava and provide them with the best conditions and advice for an unforgettable stay.

name: BAIX EMPORDÀ Rustic house rental
description:
This is your ideal home if you are looking for a quiet and wonderful landscape of Empordà without wanting to skip the easy access to the beaches of the Costa Brava. St Martí d'Empuries is 15 min. away and the Medes Islands not more than 20 min.

The space
It is an ideal house to enjoy with the family. It allows you to host very comfortably up to 7 people. Personally, I consider it important to note that one of the bedrooms, and a bathroom with shower, are located on the ground floor of the house (see the plans!)
On the other hand, from the garden and the lounge you have direct access to the porch leading to the garden.

In connection with its geographical location, it’s the perfect place if you want to enjoy a holiday in a quiet, rural location without giving up your daily swim on the beaches of the Costa Brava.

Furthermore! If you practice the golf, Golf or Pitch & Putt Golf Empordà and Pitch & Putt Gualta are just 15 minutes away.
neighborhood_overview: The neighborhood is a very quiet and perfectly located place near the beaches of St. Martí d'Empuries, L'Escala and Estartit. It's also a spot with easy and convenient access.
host_about:
Soy nacido en el Empordà, en la población de Palafrugell, y actualmente tengo 42 años.

Vivo en La Bisbal d'Empordà, con Silvia, mi compañera y con Mel, Maui y Bruno, nuestras mascotas.

Me licencié en Derecho en el año 2000 pero nunca he ejercido la profesión; seguramente, porqué prefiero la tranquilidad de la vida en mi tierra que teñir mi existencia con las tensiones de los Tribunales ( no estoy hecho para esto ).

En Airbnb anunciamos casas de la familia ( 2 casas en Canet de La Tallada y dos apartamentos en Palau-Sator ) y también otra casa cuyos derechos de explotación he adquirido ( Sant Iscle d'Empordà ).

El proyecto inicial de las casas de Canet de la Tallada era la venta pero la depresión del sector inmobiliario hizo a la familia cambiar de opinión y decidimos su explotación en modo de arrendamiento. Además, cuando no están alquiladas las usamos la familia ( somos 5 hermanos ).

En Palau-Sator, los apartamentos que tienen origen en la rehabilitación de la casa de mis abuelos paternos. Era una casa muy grande y hace ya más de 15 años la familia tomó la decisión de restaurara en este sentido.

Después de 3 años en la plataforma, mi experiencia como anfitrión con Airbnb es francamente buena. Salvo pequeños detalles y algún caso aislado estamos muy contentos con los huéspedes que nos han llegado.

Recomiendo el Empordà de forma enérgica, cualquiera de sus rincones, espacios, paisajes o playas...Esta región, es muchísimo más que el conocido Triángulo de Oro. Os lo aseguro!! 

Aquí, puedes relajarte, divertirte, ir de fiesta, en globo, practicar equitación, bajar en canoa por el río Ter, alquilar un velero, ir en bici, jugar a Golf o Picht&Putt, practicar nudismo, bañarte en calas preciosas o, si lo prefieres, en playas kilométricas, perderte en largos paseos al atarceder y comerte un buen arroz!!
neighbourhood: Canet de la Tallada, Catalonia, Spain

description:
Great apartment in the urban centre with community pool.

The space
This great duplex has two bedrooms (one with a double bed and one with two single beds), a dining room with a sofa bed and a terrace, an independent kitchen, two bathrooms (one with shower and another one with bath), a great terrace in the principal bedroom, an a little balcony in the other bedroom and a large community zone with pool. Pets accepted.
This fantastic apartment it’s in the urban centre near the Port's beach, the promenade and the Port, close to the principal restaurants and shops, and a few steps to Farella beach.
Llançà is a coast and familiar village, where you can do a lot of aquatic activities (Kayak, snorkel, sailing, fishing, windsurf, etc.) And mountain activities (hiking, the GR9, the Sant Jaume path, discover dolmens in the zone, visit the great monastery of Sant Pere de Rodes...)This little village it’s between the Cap de Creus and the Albera, near to the fishing
neighborhood_overview:
This cosy apartment is located at the urban zone of the Port, of the coast and familiar village of Llançà, where you can do a lot of aquatic activities (Kayak, snorkel, sailing, fishing, windsurf, etc.) And mountain activities (hiking, the GR9, the Sant Jaume path, discover dolmens in the zone, visit the great monastery of Sant Pere de Rodes...)

This little village it's between the Cap de Creus and the Albera, near to the fishing villages of Port de la Selva, Cadaquès and Colera, where you can discover their history and culture, their gastronomy and their magnificent landscapes of the Costa Brava.

Llançà it's near Figueres too, where you will find restaurants, shops and the incredible Dali's museum. Also you can visit the rustic village of Perelada and they amazing Casino, and the little villages of the Alt Empordà whit their famous vineyards with D.O Empordà.

name: Country House⭐Can Soler Rocabruna⭐CAMPRODON
description:
Country House in Rocabruna, Camprodon, Catalan Pyrenees. Quiet and lots of light. Incredible views of the Alta Garrotxa. Nature, landscapes and fresh air. Country house with absolute quietness, outdoor spaces, ideal for different types of activities: resting, sun, games, barbecues... And much more! We offer many indoor spaces. Our purpose is to look for comfort and quality respecting the environment and the characteristics of the old "Masia Catalana"

The space
The house has for your exclusive use, a living-dining room with a built-in kitchen. The kitchen is fully equipped (cooking and eating utensils. Appliances: Fridge-freezer, oven, microwave, toaster, blender, juicer, dishwasher, Italian coffee Nespresso, washing machine and dryer).

These spaces are complemented by 3 rooms with bathroom in each room (1 room has a double bed and the other 2 rooms have two single beds with a complementary bed).
We can accommodate up to 7 + 2 people.
There is
neighborhood_overview: Rocabruna is a small entity in the municipality of Camprodon, located in the Alta Garrotxa, a space of Natural interest. The village of Rocabruna has two high quality restaurants, the Romanesque church of Sant Feliu de Rocabruna from the 12TH century and the ruins of Rocabruna Castle. It is also an ideal place for mountain routes, horseback riding, BTT, 4x4, trekking, trail-running or enjoy pleasant rural views and fantastic nature.
host_about: Soc l'espòs de la Concepció, propietaria dels allotjaments. name: LUXURY RUSTIC HOUSE with POOL in TOSSA DE MAR
description:
Spectacular house from XIV century, inside the walled neighborhood of Vila Vella, fully restored, keeping details from back then and decorated with beautiful old furniture.
Located at the entrance, just 1 minute from the beach and 2 from downtown

The space
Rustic house with wifi included in the price, with 6 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, toiliete, dinning room, big fully equipped kitchen and a huge and beautiful terrace with BBQ and a covered part with furniture for you to enjoy excelent moments relaxing outdoors, dinners, fresh nights and more.

IDEAL FOR 2 FAMILIES, since it has 2 floors with 3 bedrooms with 1 bathroom on each floor.

Private parking for 1 car, 5 minutes walking from the house. Possibility of a second parking space with additional cost.

There is room for 12 people, with the following distribution:

Bedroom with 1 double bed

Bedroom with 1 double bed

Bedroom with 2 single bed
neighborhood_overview:
The house is located inside the emblematic walled neighborhood of “Vila Vella”, declared historic-artistic national monument, with lovely narrow streets. An area full of magic where is a privilege to stay.
One minute walking, you have the beach, restaurants next to the wall and 4 minutes away there is the commercial area, where is hard not to stop and see the beautiful shops.

The house is located inside Vila Vella, therefore, it is not possible to reach the door of the house with the car.

Tossa is a beautiful and quiet town, with a lot of charm. Ideal to travel with your couple, family or with the kids.
It is one of the most beautiful town in all Costa Brava, where you can steel feel the little old town atmosphere and where is not allowed to build tall buildings.
Besides enjoying the beaches, there are a lot other things to do. For example: walk around the old and narrow streets from the walled town "Vila Vella", go the the lighthouse and relax at
host_about:
We are Ana and Kristjàn and we’ve been offering accommodation in Tossa de Mar for over thirty years. Seven years ago, we were very happy to found Let’s Holidays.

The passion with which we’ve been working these past years has made us grow, and we now have a vast team of professionals working with us. 
With them, we will make sure to find the best option for you and to get you everything you will need during your stay :)

If there is something that we have learnt this past years is that we like to be treated the same way that we treat you. 
That’s where our philosophy comes from. We like to chat and we will try to get you anything that you need and find solutions to anything that you propose.

At the end, holidays should be exactly the way we want them, right?

We present some of our services :)

The Home Selector is the person who will help you choose the option most appropriate to your tastes. You will save time in searching and finding the best choice.

The Host is the person who will take care of you during the whole stay and try to find anything that you need with the help of the other hosts.

Let’s Holidays Home will be your second holiday home. A place where you will be able to meet with our Hosts, chat, have a glass of wine and listen to some live music.

We’ll love to meet you!

See you soon ;) 

Here you have all our options

name: Casa Rural⭐Cal Masover Rocabruna⭐CAMPRODON
description:
Casa en Rocabruna, Camprodon, Pirineo Catalán. Tranquila y luminosa. Increíbles vistas de la Alta Garrotxa. Naturaleza, paisaje y aire puro. Casa Rural con gran tranquilidad, grandes espacios exteriores, adecuados para multitud de actividades: Descanso, Sol, Juegos Infantiles, Barbacoas...
Ofrecemos amplitud en los espacios interiores, bañados de luz y paisaje. Nuestro propósito es buscar la comodidad y la calidad respetando el medio ambiente y las características de la antigua “Masia Catalana”

The space
La casa tiene para vuestro uso exclusivo, una sala de estar-comedor con cocina incorporada. La cocina esta totalmente equipada (Utensilios para cocinar y comer. Electrodomésticos: Nevera-congelador, horno, microondas, tostadora, batidora, exprimidor, lavavajillas, cafetera italiana,lavadora)
Estos espacios se complementan con 2 habitaciones con baño.
Podemos alojar hasta 6+2 plazas.
Tiene un espacio exterior de uso exclusivo.
neighborhood_overview: Rocabruna es una pequeña aldea del municipio de Camprodon, situada en  la Alta Garrotxa, espacio de Interés Natural. El pueblo de Rocabruna dispone de dos restaurantes de gran calidad, la iglesia románica de Sant Feliu de Rocabruna del s. XII y las ruinas del castillo de Rocabruna, además de multiples rutas de montaña. Perfecto para salidas en caballo, BTT, 4x4, trecking, trail running o asequibles paseos por la más rural o salvaje y apacible naturaleza.
host_about: Soc l'espòs de la Concepció, propietaria dels allotjaments. Filla del veïnat de Rocabruna on els seus pares van viure la major part de les seves vides i dels qui va heretar el patrimoni familiar que avui és Rourevell. Actualment es dedica a l'ensenyament infantil a Ripoll on resideix i treballa.

neighborhood_overview: Rocabruna is a small entity in the municipality of Camprodon, located in the Alta Garrotxa, a space of Natural interest. It is also an ideal place for mountain routes, horseback riding, BTT, 4x4, trekking, trail-running or enjoy pleasant rural views and fantastic nature.

keinerlei Einschränkungen.

frei

name: Magnificent villa near the sea
description:
Gorgeous cosy villa in the prestigious picturesque urbanization, situated in a quiet fishing cove Cala Margarita, 5 min. walk from the famous beach of La Fosca and Palamos. With garden and private pool. The combination of seclusion and civilization.

The space
Стильное размещение до 11 человек в 5 минутах ходьбы от пляжа La Fosca.
Площадь дома 320кв.м. На первом этаже расположены большая полностью оснащенная кухня, отдельная столовая, гостиная с камином, комната отдыха с выходом к бассейну, 1-местная спальня с собственным туалетом и душем, туалет. Все окна первого этажа являются панорамными и предоставляют выход на террасу и в сад (800 кв.м.). На террасе имеется большой обеденный стол и уютный диван, что позволит с комфортом проводить время на свежем воздухе. Имеется барбекю, теннисный стол, шезлонги для отдыха. Терраса оснащена раскладными маркизами для создания тени.
Также на первом этаже расположен гараж и прачечная, оснащенная стиральной и суш
neighborhood_overview:
Бухта Ла Фоска в окрестностях Паламоса — хорошее место для пляжного отдыха. В переводе с испанского «La Fosca» означает «темная скала», которую можно увидеть около берега, напротив руин старинного замка Сант-Эстева. На берегу имеется прокат каяков, площадка для игры в пляжный волейбол, душевые, кафе и магазин.
В часы солнцепека прогуляйтесь по дорожкам вдоль берега: одна из них ведет к иберийским раскопкам, а другая — в сосновый бор, где можно устроить пикник или просто подышать целебным воздухом. Пляж неоднократно получал Голубой флаг за чистоту прибрежных вод и развитую инфраструктуру.

Looking for a vacation house for 5 people where you can relax and just let go? Stop looking, THIS is the one!
Located in a quiet residential area in L'Escala but at only 15min walking from the beach it has 2 bedrooms, Studio with sofa bed and 3 bathrooms.

The space
Beautifull vacation house for 5 in L'Escala 1500 m from the beach and 400 m from the next pine forest. Ideal for vacations with the family or friends where you can do a lot of diffent things depending on your mood of the day: taking the bikes to go to the beach or just be lazy and walk 10 m to the pool area or sit in the veranda and relax taking a sunbath. The house is fully equiped with all the stuff you can probably need: Washing machine, Dischwasher, Microoven, Nespresso, and also TV and docking stations for your iPhones.
There is a Master bedroom with King Size be and en-suite bathroom, a guestroom with 2 single beds and a studio with a sofa bed (135 wide). There is also a small bed for a
neighborhood_overview: I don't think I have to talk about the Costa Brava, we just love being here. From this place you can obviously enjoy L'Escala but you're also near to L'Estartit and the 'Parc Natural de les Illes Medes' for the divers. The there is the bay of Roses, Figueres, Girona and a lot of tiny beautiful beaches that a waiting to be discovered by you.

name: Casa Rural Ca l'Avet Camprodon
description:
¡Bienvenidos a nuestra casa rural Ca l’Avet!

Si estás buscando un lugar para escapar del ajetreo y el bullicio de la ciudad, nuestra casa rural es el lugar perfecto para ti. Muy cerca de Camprodon, situada en un entorno natural espectacular rodeada de montañas y ríos, ofrece privacidad y la tranquilidad y relajación que necesitas. Además, nuestra casa rural está diseñada para aprovechar al máximo la luz natural, lo que crea una atmósfera cálida y acogedora en todo momento.

The space
Nuestra casa rural cuenta con una gran variedad de comodidades para que puedas disfrutar al máximo de tu estancia. Disponéis de calefacción en toda la casa, conexión Wi-Fi, Smart TV, barbacoa, mesa de ping-pong, lavadora, secadora y parking entre otros.

El jardín es perfecto si lo que prefieres es estar al aire libre. Nuestros amplios porches disponen de un sofá exterior y una mesa para disfrutar de una deliciosa barbacoa con tus familiares y amigos. El jardín e
neighborhood_overview: Font Rubí es una urbanización muy tranquila y relajante con ambiente familiar, a 4 km de Camprodon. Posibilidad de realizar actividades de montaña, equitación, golf y piscina en Camprodon y alrededores. Cerca de la estación de esquí Vallter 2000.
host_about: El amor a la vida, disfrutar de la luz, de la naturaleza, en paz y armonia, y con alegría compartirlo con tu familia,  amigos y seres queridos. Siempre con respeto y agradecimiento a lo que te ofrece la vida.

150 m2 apartment with sea views, 11 meters from La Fosca beach. Living room with 2 sofa beds, TV, dining room for 8 and terrace with table, chairs and sun loungers. name: Cottage 2 people, pool view
description:
Catalonia. Beach Costa Brava 17 km. All kind of services at 2 km. Pool. Garden. Games room, WIFI, parking.

The space
Small terraced house of 33 m2, all on the ground floor with views overlooking the pool and the countryside. There is a door with access to the ‘Pallissa’. Kitchen/dining room/living room form a single, open plan space of 15 m2. TV SAT. One bedroom with double bed. A bathroom with WC. Our opinion: This property is ideal for 2 adults and a baby. WI-FI.

Can Gat Vell is very well communicated, at only 2 km from motorway AP7. Best beaches of the Costa Brava at 17 km. At less than 30 km, we have Girona, Figueres. The volcans region of La Garrotxa is at only 46 km. Border with France at 35 mn. Airport Barcelona, at 1h30. Airport Girona, at 30 mn. Train station AVE / TGV in Vilafant, at 25 mn. Ski slopes at 1h50 in La Molina (Pyrenees).

neighborhood_overview: The small community of Llampaies is situated towards the east of the region, not far from Camallera (2 km), where all kinds of amenities are available. The surrounding countryside boasts gentle rolling hills, farmland and coniferous woodlands. The tiny center of Llampaies is formed of typical local houses. The quarter around the church is the oldest part of the village. Around 100 meters to the north, is the smaller Vecindario del Puig, a group of houses, built in the 17th and 18th centuries. 200 meters from Vecindario del Puig is the Vecindario de los Masos. Some of the houses here date from the end of the 18th century, although the majority were built in the 19th century. There are around 100 people living in the center.
host_name: Turisme Rural Can Gat Vell SCP
host_about:
Hola a tod@s,
Fue en Mayo del 2013 que decidimos venir a vivir aquí en la provincia de Girona ... y hacer un cambio radical de vida. Necesitábamos alejarnos de la ciudad, de la falta de respeto, de una convivencia que se hacía cada vez más insoportable, del egoísmo y anonimato que conocíamos en Barcelona. Ahora disfrutamos de estos pequeños detalles de cada día, en Llampaies, un núcleo de muy pocos habitantes: el cielo, sus amaneceres y puestas de sol, el ambiente rural al 100%. la naturaleza con nuestros insectos, plantas y árboles, nuestros animales con las gallinas y conejos, nuestro gato Llamp y sobre todo disfrutar cada momento con nuestros hijos, Roger y Oriol.
Estamos muy felices de poderos recibir en nuestra casa y haceros descubrir nuestra comarca tan bonita. 
Hasta pronto.
Eduard, Isabelle, Roger y Oriol

name: Lovely house in the Emporda
description:
Special and peaceful village house, restored respecting the traditional architecture of the area, in the heart of the village of Vilafant.
Situated at 1 km distance of the AVE train station and 3 km away from Figueras and the Dalí Museum

The space
An old village house with vaulted ceilings in the traditional style of the volta catalana, carefully restored with ecological materials, maintaining and respecting the original architecture of the house and giving it a special charm.

Guest access
There is a balcony where you can enjoy the fresh air in the summer, and even enjoy your meals, at night and during the day if you're three people or less.

Other things to note
There is a balcony where you can enjoy the fresh air in the summer, and even enjoy your meals, at night and during the day if you're three people or less.
neighborhood_overview:
The AVE (a specially fast train) station is 1 km outside the village and the AP7 highway is at a 2 km distance.
You can reach Barcelona in 55 minutes in the AVE train and in 1.5 hours by car.
The house is situated in an ideal spot, both to go to the beach and to explore the mountains. It is at a distance of 3 km from Figueras and the Dali Museum. Llança, Sant Pere Pescador, Rosas and the natural park of Alvera are also great places to visit. The nearest beaches are at only 20 km.
You can make great excursions to places with excellent gastronomy such as the natural parks of Cap de Creus and Alvera, the lake of Banyoles, Besalú, Sant Llorenç de la Muga, Port de la Selva, Empuriabrava and the city of Gerona, as well as architectonic Romanic and Gothic highlights...
host_about: La casa situada en el L´Alt Empordà, una zona bella,  con lagos, bosques, parques naturales,  cerca del mar y la montaña a su vez,  localizada en el casco antiguo del pueblo, ha sido restaurada pensando en el respeto al medio ambiente y con la intención de conectar con lo esencial  y grato de la convivencia.

name: Charming Seaside Family Home, 2 Min Walk to Beach
description:
Our eclectic, charming family home is located in a picturesque vibrant seaside village, just a couple of minute's walk from the fabulous local beaches. Situated in the "old-town" centre, our townhouse retains original features e.g. patterned ceramic floor tiles, vaulted ceilings & characteristic window shutters. You'll benefit from the "home from home" (as in family home/not a hotel!) atmosphere while immersing yourself in village life, with an array of cafes & bars on your doorstep. Enjoy :)

The space
Our home is located in the "old town" of L'Escala, a former fishing village, on the beautiful Costa Brava. This is not a hotel style rental but rather it is our family home.

The accommodation is situated over three floors, with kitchen and dining room on the ground floor. The 4 bedrooms (one with kingsize bed and 3 with single beds) and the WC and bathroom are found on the middle floor. The sitting room is located on the top floor and leads onto
neighborhood_overview:
The house is situated in a peaceful residential area in the "old town" of L'Escala, close to several beaches. The sandy family beach, surrounded by a variety of cafes and restaurants, is located just beyond the bottom of our road. A short stroll away are a number of independent boutiques, jewellery and craft shops, also shops selling local Anchovies of L'Escala. Creu Cove, a minute's walk away (to the left of our house), is great for snorkelling. The larger, sandy crescent beaches of Empúries are a short walk away, and if you want a bit of culture you can visit the nearby Greco-Roman ruins of Empúries. Also within walking distance (a bit of a hike, but worth the walk!), along the beautiful scenic coastal path, is Sant Marti d'Empúries, a charming hill top hamlet with a selection of fabulous restaurants, overlooking the Golf of Roses.

If you drive, there is free parking in our street but the residents use the spaces so you will most likely have to park your car at the to
host_about:
Hello from Seeta and John!

I'm an editor and John is an architect who undertook the renovations on our house which hadn't been lived in for 40 years.  We hope you will enjoy our home as much as we do :)

name: Masoveria de LLadó, Casa rural muy acogedora
description:
Casa rural totalmente restaurada y nueva, es todo confort. Situada en el Alt Ampurdán, a 10min de Figueras, a 30min d diferentes playas de la Costa Brava, a 40min de las montanyas nevadas de los Pirineos. Sintoniza con la naturaleza,verás como funciona una casa totalmente con energias renovables, conocerás nuestro entorno: un bonito bosque, rutas a pie al rio, las vacas que pasturan por nuestra finca y nuestro modo de vida autosuficiente.

The space
Diseñada para la comodidad y disfrutar de vacaciones en familia. Terraza con barbacoa y vistas panorámicas.
La casa es cálida en invierno, con fuego de leña y fresca en verano.

Guest access
La casa tiene unas vistas fantásticas, relajaran tus sentidos, escucharás nuestras vacas pastar por los campos. Solo alquilamos una casa por lo que no tendrás que compartir espacios con ningun otro viagero.

name: Begur Villa with pool and sea view
description:
This single-storey villa in Begur has a large sunny and private garden with pool, sea view and Wifi Internet. Three bedrooms, two bathrooms, private parking and a beautiful and quiet location.

The space
This single-storey villa has a large sunny and private garden - great for the kids to run around in with plenty of room for games and the pool - which has a special Baby-Secure safety fence. All the bedrooms have french doors opening out onto the garden and with great views across the valley of Sa Riera and the Mediterranean Sea. There is a large garden table and chairs for dining on the shady terrace and 6 pool chairs for comfortable sunbathing as well as a barbecue.

The kitchen is equipped with the necessary modern appliances: fridge-freezer, dish washer, gas stove with extractor hood, electric oven and microwave. The kitchen opens out onto the terrace making it ideal for alfresco meals.

The space
Se trata un apartamento planta baja en Llafranc, en el corazón de la costa brava, a tan solo 3 minutos de la playa, haciendo un magnífico paseo. Cuenta con un amplio salón, dos baños (uno con bañera), una cocina office con lavadero, y con 4 dormitorios donde caben 6 personas. El parking es grande y el jardín es el más amplio de toda la comunidad (140 m2) y el único con acceso directo a la piscina.

El apartamento se encuetra en una comunidad de pocos vecinos, y la piscina es amplia, en zona ajardinada

name: Cozy house near the sea
description:
Casa adosada para 6 personas, con jardín, A/A y piscina a 10 minutos a pie de la playa y el centro.

The space
Наш дом - это прекрасное место для семейного отдыха с детьми!
Таунхаус угловой, выходит одной стороной в лес, двухэтажный.
Около дома расположен бассейн 15 метров (общий на урбанизацию), ухоженный газон.
На первом этаже расположены
гостиная, кухня, туалет, терраса, два ухоженных участка спереди со стороны входа и сзади дома, площадью 150 и 30 кв.м. соответственно.
На втором этаже находятся 3 спальни и 2 ванных.
Все спальни кондиционированны.
Кухня оборудована всем необходимым.
Плита, холодильник, посудомоечная и стиральная машины, кофеварка, микроволновая печь, мелкая бытовая техника (соковыжималка, тостер, измельчитель, блендер)
Есть места, где можно полежать, позагорать в шезлонге, или, наоборот, посидеть почитать книжку в тени деревьев. Самое волшебное время - завтрак на террасе! На участке растет
neighborhood_overview:
Тихое, уютное и зеленое место в пешей досягаемости от моря и от фешенебельного курортного города с развитой инфрастуктурой для отдыха и шопинга (магазины, рестораны, аквапарк, детский парк аттракционов).
Расстояние до пляжа - 10мин пешком, расстояние до центра города Platja d'Aro около 15 минут (на машине 2 мин).
Развлечения для детей:
- аквапарк 10 мин пешком;
- детский парк аттракционов 15-20 мин пешком;
- детские площадки вдоль всего пляжа;
- теплоходные экскурсии;
- 2 больших гипермаркета с игрушками, в одном из них есть большая детская комната;
- русский летний лагерь и детский сад дневного пребывания.
Развлечения для взрослых (непосредственно в городе):
- рестораны, кафе, пляжи;
- аквапарк;
- дискотеки в пешей доступности;
- город Lloret de Mar с его дискотеками и казино. Расстояние 40 мин. на машине
- теплоходные экскурсии в Tossa de Mar, Sant Feliu, Lloret de Mar.
host_about:
Мы с мужем живем в Испании. У нас двое детей.  Мы очень любим эту страну, можем рассказать  и познакомить вас с самыми интересными и необычными местами Испании и Франции.  Тем более, что наше общее хобби это  путешествие,  планирование и « разведка» новых мест, которое постепенно перерастает в профессиональное занятие.  У нас много друзей и мы любим принимать гостей у себя дома.  Мое хобби – изготовление десертов и фотография!

I'm native russian, living now in Barcelona with my family. We enjoy traveling and sightseeing. My favorite thing to do is to discover new beautiful places, this brings me fun and inspiration.
I have got 2 children and one hampster :) I like cooking, dancing, swimming and trekking. Currently I study spanish.

neighborhood_overview:
S'Agaró es una de las zonas más exclusivas y demandadas de la Costa Brava, con una excelente y variada zona de ocio y restauración.
La playa más cercana está a 200 metros: Sant Pol. En ella podéis practicar multitud de actividades como kayak y vela.
Personalmente recomiendo mucho la playa Sa Conca a tan solo 10 minutos a pie del apartamento (400m). Tiene una arena y agua de gran calidad. Se puede llegar a través del Camí de Ronda que sigue toda la Costa Brava y durante el cual se encontrarán con distintas calas donde se puede pescar o practicar snorkel.
A Platja d'Aro se puede llegar andando (40 minutos), en coche o autobús (10 minutos). En la zona del puerto de Platja d'Aro (20 minutos a pie) hay una zona de ocio con cines, bolera, restaurantes y discotecas. Platja d’Aro ofrece una amplia zona comercial con las mejores marcas y las últimas tendencias en moda.
Desde S'Agaró se recomienda visitar toda la zona de la Costa Brava: Roses, Cadaqués, Pals, Calella de

name: Casa Rural en la Costa Brava - 6/8 Pax
description:
The space
RURAL HOUSE IN CCan Ginesta (Tramuntana) is a rural house that offers all the comforts to rest and to know the region.
The house is distributed on two floors. On the first floor there is the kitchen, fully equipped, the dining room, the living room, a room with a double bed and a bathroom.
This room communicates with an ample porch for exclusive use.
On the upper floor there are the other two bedrooms, one with a double bed that has a large sun terrace, and another with two single beds, to which two extra beds can be added. All rooms have their own bathroom.

Sant Feliu de Boada, has a privileged situation, since it offers the tranquility of a small rural town, and at the same time allows in 10 minutes to be located in any of the most beautiful coves and beaches of the Costa Brava, as well as the main towns of the region as La Bisbal, Palamós, Torroella de Montgrí, Palafrugell, Begur, Pals, Peratallada ...

name: House with sea view
description:
House: 2 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, kitchen, living room with a terrace with beautiful views of the Mediterranean Sea , communal swimming pool, parking.
There is also a possibility to charter a yacht for an additional fee.

The space
The house is located in a small bay Canyelles Petites in Roses. From the terrace there is a very beautiful view of the bay. Easy access to all the attractions. In the area there are numerous cafes, restaurants, clubs.
The house can accommodate up to 6 people.
It is possible, for an extra fee, to take a cruise by boat and see Costa Brava from the sea. I suggest trips to the surrounding bays or to Cadaques (with a break to visit the house of Salvador Dali). Guests can choose the direction of the cruise.

Guest access

host_about: Hi my name is Ryszard, I live in a beautiful Roses. I am helpful, cheerful. You can rely on me. I will help you with your stay the best I can, sharing the local know-how and providing with everything you need to know.

name: Beautiful old farmhouse with pool II  (PG-502)
description:
Mas Vinyoles is at the same time away from it all and close to everything: Beach, mountains, beautiful cities like Girona, Barcelona, Figueres.... After a full and busy day it is wonderfull to retire to it's unique quietness.

The space
Mas Vinyoles is a Catalan countryside house that is partly converted to offer a pleasant space to spend your holidays: 2 fully equipped apartments, for 4 and 6 people.
There is a garden with a swimming pool and bbq, a biological vegetable garden and an orchard.
We are in the heart of the protected area ″Les Gavarres ″, a series of hills of Mediterranean forest between Girona and Costa Brava.
This is a place to spend some quiet days of rest, exploring the surroundings by foot or on bicycle.

Guest access
Guests will have access to the swimming pool (sea salt water), a beautiful garden surrounding the house, tons of hills with cork trees, silence, bird songs and clean sky with outstanding stars.
neighborhood_overview: We are 33 neighbours in the middle of a protected wooden area.
host_about: I live in "Les Gavarres" since 1985 and I love it. To take care of the forest and the wild life has become an important project of my life. I am happy to realise that every year a new variety of birds discover that this is a good place for them to spend at least part of the year.
neighbourhood: Sant Mateu de Montnegre, Catalunya, Spain

name: Charming Apartment. Sea views. Pool. Pkg. 6 people
description:
Cozy and cute apartment with fireplace. 3 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, fits 6 people. Very sunny, with a balcony overlooking at sea views and pine trees. 20 m to big swimming pool. Parking included. Situated at 800m of el Golfet, one of the most beautiful beaches of Costa Brava with amazing crystal water. The area is very quiet and relaxing area through an exceptionally beautiful path along the coastline that will take you to the centre of Calella in 25-30 min walk. Going by car is less than 3 minutes

The space
Ideal place for families with children that want to enjoy the beauty of Costa Brava but want a quite and relaxing place.

Surrounded by truly Mediterranean vegetation, all rooms overlook at pine trees, cypress and other trees, with views of the sea from the balcony. This community was awarded with the well-known architectural design FAD awards, with a very good distribution that allows space for six people for a medium-size apartment. Beautiful kitche
neighborhood_overview: The area is very quite with beautiful houses and their swimming pools. The type of vacationers are mostly families with children. The closer beach is el Golfet, 800m away, 2 minutes by car, quite easily to park or 10 minutes walking. This is considered one of the most beautiful beaches in Costa Brava.
host_about:
I live close to Barcelona and spend my weekends in this apartment. During summer I love travelling with my family and this is why I rent it. I always go to apartments and love to have advices from places to visit or recommendations on restaurants so I am very pleased to do the same with my guests. 

I love travelling with my family and showing my kids the beauty of learning different cultures, learning few words from new languages and making friends from other cultures. Few years ago I lived in London for a couple of years and I have great memories of that time. 

I also love painting, and the apartment has some of my collection on the walls. I also love dancing salsa and all type of music too. Recently I've just started Kundalini yoga which I love too. Next to the apartment there is a beach, el Golfet, which is an amazing place to meditate in the morning with the rising sun. That's unbeliveable!

I love sharing my apartment with my guests and feel extremely happy when they are experiencing the 'good vibes' it transmits.
