name: Costabravaforrent Masramon, house with pool,
description:
Costabravaforrent Masramon is a beautiful villa with its own private swimming pool of 6x3, with views of the Montgrí Park and 900 metres from the beach.

The space
Costabravaforrent Masramon is a beautiful villa with its own private swimming pool of 6x3, with views of the Montgrí Park and 900 metres from the beach.

It consists of a suite and four double bedrooms, two with double beds, one with two single beds and one with two bunk beds. The living room and dining room look out on and have access to the terrace and garden. In the living room there are two sofas, two armchairs and a fireplace. The dining room has space for up to twelve people. There are three complete bathrooms, one in the suite with a bath and the other two with showers. The kitchen is fully equipped.

The house has a terrace with a dining table for up to twelve people and an area for sunbathing with sun beds. The garden has grass lawns and native plants and trees. There is als
neighborhood_overview:
GPS Coordenades: 42.1118355, 3.1600591

Costabravaforrent Masramon is situated in the neighbourhood of Montgó, 900 metres from the beach of Cala Montgó and 3 km from the centre of L’Escala. This is a quiet residential zone surrounded by nature. The house faces south-east with views of the Montgri Park. To the north is a woodland nature area protected by the local council of L’Escala. Here you can find a path which leads from Mateua Island to the port in L’Escala.

Cala Montgó has supermarkets, bakeries, bars, restaurants and shops.

name: CAP RAS 8 Magnificent apartment with community Pool
description:
Magnificent apartment with community Pool.

The space
The apartment has four rooms with two single beds each one, a kitchen, a dining room, a garden with pool, a barbecue, two bathrooms with shower and a toilet. Pets accepted.
This cosy apartment is in the middle of Cap Ras, in Llançà, near to the natural park, the beaches ant the seaside paths and a 10 minutes of the Port's urban centre, where you will find the principal shops and restaurant, the Port and Gola beaches, the marina port and other important see sights.
Llançà is a coast and familiar village, where you can do a lot of aquatic activities (Kayak, snorkel, sailing, fishing, windsurf, etc.) And mountain activities (hiking, the GR9, the Sant Jaume path, discover dolmens in the zone, visit the great monastery of Sant Pere de Rodes...)This little village it’s between the Cap de Creus and the Albera, near to the fishing villages of Port de la Selva, Cadaqués and Colera, where you can discover their
neighborhood_overview:
Incredible seafront apartment in the quiet zone of Cap Ras!

This magnificent apartment with fantastic sea views it’s located at Cap Ras zone in the familiar seaside village of Llançà, where you can do different sea activities (Kayack, sail, diving, windsurf, etc..) ant mountain activities ( GR92, mountain and sea routes, the Santiago path, dolmen, Sant Pere de Rodes monastery…)

This little village is between the Cap de Creus and the Albera, close to seaside villages like Port de la Selva, Cadaqués and Colera, where you can discover their history, their gastronomy and their beautiful and amazing natural landscapes.

Llançà is near Figueres town where you can visit the Dali’s museum and the Figueres shops. It is near to Perelada and its wonderful Casino.
host_about: Somos una agencia inmobiliaria con mas de 50 años de experiencia en el sector turístico y especializados en alquiler vacacional. Nuestro objetivo es claro: que cada cliente se sienta como en su propia casa! Ofrecemos una atención personalizada y profesional, capaz de gestionar cualquier incidencia en el menor tiempo posible. Lejos de las inmobiliarias totalmente impersonales, nuestro trato y proximidad son nuestras señas de identidad. Esperamos conocerte y poderte ayudar en tus próximas vacaciones!

name: Costabravaforrent Carrió, with pool and garden
description:
Can Carrió is a beautiful villa, with its own private swimming pool of 10x5m, set in an outstanding area surrounded by nature. The property is formed of a main building and an annex of three big suites.

The space
Can Carrió is a beautiful villa, with its own private swimming pool of 10x5m, set in an outstanding area surrounded by nature. The property is formed of a main building and an annex of three big suites.

The main building consists of a suite complete with a bathroom with a shower, a living room with three sofas plus two armchairs and a fireplace, a lounge with two sofas and a fireplace, a dining room with seating for 14, a guests’ bathroom and a fully equipped kitchen. All with an exterior aspect affording lots of light and sun, plus views and access to the terraces and garden.

The annex contains three big suites, each suitable for up to 4 people. The suites all include a double bed and in one a single bed with guest bed underneath w
neighborhood_overview:
GPS Coordenades: 42.034452554751766, 2.9899871349334717

Can Carrió is located in the northern part of Foixà, in the neighbourhood of Cuells, in a residential zone surrounded by fields and pine and oak woodland which give a magical air of tranquillity.

4Km away is the Gala/Dali foundation in Púbol Castle, vertex of the Dali triangle with Figueres and Port- Lligat. 35km away is the town of Figueres and the Museo Dalí.

20 Km from Foixà are the beaches of Empúries, Escala, Estartit and Pals, and the Costa Brava stretching out before you. Estartit offers an important base for Scuba diving in the protected surroundings of the Medes Islands. Also 20km away is the historic city of Girona.

Around the village there are different cycle routes and footpaths which allow you to explore the local area.

name: Cosy Apart 2 Minutes Walk to Beach, + parking
description:
Sleeps 5. Bedrooms 3, bathrooms 2. Fully renovated in 2013. Large shared garden. Located in the center of the village, has fantastic facilities in the area (3-5 m walk): great range of, restaurants, shops, supermarkets.(HUTG-013170)

The space
The apartment, fully renovated and equipped in 2013, is on the first floor and all rooms are exterior. The fully equipped kitchen is very nice with the window overlooking the garden with beautiful twisted pines; near the window, there is a dining table for 6 people, which is very handy. Meals can also be enjoyed on the terrace. The living room has two sofas and a TV; during the warm season, it is possible to expand the space of the terrace opening the sliding glass doors. Two full bathrooms. A large private garden is good for children. Parking for one car is available in the basement of the building. Beach (2 minutes away) is one km long, with a very convenient sand (not too big to hurt your bare feet and not too thin to g
neighborhood_overview: The quietness of the place. The great beach that is very comfortable for its very convenient sand and clean water. Great range of bars, restaurants, shops, supermarkets, all only in 3-5 mins walk away. Barcelona and Girona towns are available by car, but also by bus  (the bus station is 5 minutes walk from the apartment) and so are many villages (see below).
host_about: Biólogo retirado, amante de las artes, letras y la ciencias. Me gusta particularmente las artes escénicas, tambien viajar. Para estancias largas prefiero las grandes ciudades. Vivo en Barcelona y me gusta mucho, y no me importaria vivir en Nueva York. Para estancias cortas tambien amo la naturaleza. Aunque frugal, me gusta la buena cocina i el buen vino. La familia y los amigos som de la maxima importancia. Politicamente soy liberal: vive y deja vivir

name: Paraiso en plena naturaleza
description:
Can Piferrer es una masía típica de la plana de La Selva construida en 1740 y restaurada en 2.007, situada en plena naturaleza. Ocupa una superfície de 600 m2 en cada una de las dos plantas y capacidad variable desde para 8 hasta 20 personas.

The space
Can Piferrer es una masía única tanto por su arquitectura como por su entorno.
Por su interés y valor arquitectónico está catalogada como Elemento de Interés Arquitectónico y no ha sufrido ningún tipo de transformación a lo largo de más de 260 años. Se ha restaurado (2007) a conciencia para mantener su carácter y su personalidad, adaptándola para el turismo rural con el máximo de lujo y comodidades en un lugar envidiable por el entorno que la rodea y la tranquilidad que se respira.

neighborhood_overview:
Entorno sin vecinos, sin vehículos que circulen cerca, muy tranquilo y en plena natualeza pero muy bien comunicado.
Máxima tranquilidad, ideal para relajarse y descansar

neighborhood_overview: The pictures of the beach do not correspond to the view from the house. They are of Cala Canyelles, the closest beach to the villa. name: Alemanys 5
description:
Exclusive rental property with garden and pool in the historical core of Girona

The space
Located in the heart of Girona's medieval quarter, inside the original city walls and overlooking Sant Domènec Square, is the property Alemanys 5, whose original building dates from the sixteenth century.
Its recent restoration integrates old and new, with sober, clean lines that celebrate essential elements such as space, light, shade, fire, stone, water and silence.

The house is available to be rented as a whole unit, but it also can be divided into two independent apartments that can be rented separately:

"El Badiu" (The Veranda) is a 180 m2 duplex comprising with a master suite and two children's suites, a fully equipped gourmet kitchen-dining space, spacious living room with fireplace and a spectacular sunny veranda terrace facing south, with exclusive views over the old quarter. It has capacity for is up to 6 people.

"El Jardí” (Th
neighborhood_overview: This historic property is located in the heart of Girona's medieval quarter, inside the original city walls and overlooking Sant Domènec Square. There's much to see just by wandering the streets, but there are also great restaurants and cafes nearby.

name: La maison de Casa de Campo, Begur
description:
Idéalement située sur les hauteurs entre Palafrugell et Begur, maison de famille à louer à la semaine ou longs week-ends, au dessus des plages de Tamariu, Llafranch et Calella.
Idéal pour deux couples et enfants ou trois couples.

The space
Maison de 160 m2 comprenant :
Une chambre grand lit (150) ouverte sur le jardin
Une chambre grand lit (150), lit enfant avec sa salle de douche, ouvrant sur le jardin (possibilité lit bébé)
Une chambre grand lit (150) et possibilité lit bébé
Une chambre enfants dite la tour (2 lits en 90)
Une salle de bain, baignoire, deux vasques, WC, lave-linge (+ sèche-cheveux, pèse-personne)
Un WC indépendant
Un salon avec grand canapé, TV écran plat (TNT française et chaines espagnoles), mini-chaîne station d'accueil Ipod..
Une salle à manger
Une cuisine bien équipée avec four, lave-vaisselle, deux plaques vitrocéramique, deux feux au gaz, micro-ondes, machine Nespresso et cafetière, grille
neighborhood_overview:
Notre villa, Tamarina, est située dans un ensemble résidentiel au calme et privilégié entre les villages de Palafrugell et Begur.
Possibilité d'aller à Tamariu à pieds à travers la campagne (denivellé) en 30 minutes
Supermarché Jodofi à 2 minutes en voiture ouvert toute l'année et à des prix très raisonnables.
host_about:
Passionnée d'Espagne depuis toujours, amoureuse de la Catalogne et plus particulièrement de l'Empurdan pour la diversité de ses paysages, sa culture, sa gastronomie, ses fêtes locales, les céramiques et antiquités de La Bisbal...
Tamarina est une maison de famille que nous entretenons avec soin et avec Airbnb nous essayons de faire découvrir ce superbe coin de la Costa Brava.
Nous sommes une famille avec deux adolescents et vivons à Nîmes.

name: House in Tossa de Mar, Costa Brava
description:
Áncora is a cosy house located in Sta. Maria de Llorell Beach, Tossa de Mar. It offers sea view, a terrace with BBQ area, a relaxing communal swimming pool and one of the best beaches of la Costa Brava. Free Wifi.

The space
Áncora is a 2 floor semi-detached house. The entrance is a big terrace with a barbecue area. Some steps further, you will be at the porch: a sheltered place to have dinner, read or just relax.
The ground floor is an open floor: living room and kitchen. There is a toilet and a fireplace as well.
On the first floor there are 2 double rooms (1 with a queen bed and 1 with 2 twin beds) and a bathroom with shower. There is also a balcony with sea views.

Guest access
Swimming pool (next to the house)
Beach (1km /15-20 minute walk)
Supermarket (5 minute walk)
Bus stop (5 minute walk)
Free parking on the street

Other things to note
*Pets are not allowed

*Kitchen f
neighborhood_overview:
Santa Maria de Llorell is a private estate located in one of the nicest beaches of La Costa Brava: Cala Llevado - Santa Maria de Llorell. It is a crystal clear water beach surrounded by cliffs and green valleys. It offers diverse water sports and there is a chiringuito and a restaurant.

Santa Maria de Llorell is 3 km away from Tossa de Mar. This beautiful town has plenty of restaurants, supermarkets and shops.

The bus stop to Tossa de Mar and Lloret de Mar is a 5 minute walk from the house.
host_about: Somos Rosa y Cinta (madre e hija) ponemos a disposición de los usuarios de Airbnb nuestra casa en la playa de cala Llevadó, Tossa de Mar. Haremos todo lo posible para que disfruteis de una agradable estancia en la casa.

The village is a few minutes from the Montseny Natural Park, where you can make many excursions.

En el comedor hay una mesa para 10 personas de madera maciza y unas vistas muy especiales.

En el salón hay un fuego a tierra que dejamos equipado con unos tronquitos para que podáis preparar un fuego y disfrutar de una película al lado del fuego.

description:

Comfortable and well equipped.
It has a community pool, WIFI, air conditioning and private garage.
Privileged location and magnificent views from its various terraces.

The space
Beautiful house, in a private residence with swimming pool.
Privileged location, on the seafront in Empuriabrava and on the canal.
House divided into 3 floors.
On the ground floor is a private garage with one bedroom and a large terrace with garden furniture and barbecue. This room is not air conditioned and is not recommended for young children, as it is independent from the rest of the house.
The first floor consists of a spacious living / dining room with terrace, a modern open-plan kitchen and a bathroom with shower.
Stairs give access to the second floor where you will find two double bedrooms with air conditioning, one bedroom with bunk beds and a second bathroom

name: Can Sici Masia
description:
Can Sici es una masía tradicional del SXVIII, con piscina, situada en un entorno rural y tranquilo, donde encontrareis hospitalidad y confort para disfrutar de vuestras reuniones familiares y encuentros con amigos, a menos de 10 km de Girona.
Capacidad para 12 adultos más niños hasta 22 personas.

The space
La masía se alquila entera y tiene una capacidad de hasta 22 personas (máximo 12 adultos) distribuidas en 6 habitaciones dobles, una habitación con 6 camas y un altillo con 4 colchones.

Dispone de amplios espacios donde poder compartir momentos en común: en la planta baja la Sala de la entrada y el magnífico Salón-comedor con una gran mesa de madera y una zona de estar con chimenea. En la primera planta la Sala central y la luminosa Sala del pajar (donde se encontraba el antiguo pajar).

A pocos metros de la fachada principal hay una pérgola con mesas sobre la balsa ajardinada que antiguamente proveía la casa de agua de lluvia. La cas
neighborhood_overview:
Can Sici está a menos de 10 km de Girona. Pertenece a la barriada de Sant Medir, en el término municipal de Sant Gregori.
Se sitúa dentro del territorio de la Vall de Llèmena, uno de los lugares naturales mejor conservados de las comarcas gironines, por donde se extienden pequeños pueblos, antiguos vecindarios y singulares masías en un marco de gran valor paisajístico. La combinación entre los campos de cultivo, los diferentes tipos de bosque, los riscos y la presencia del agua, conforman un paisaje armónico modelado por la naturaleza y los usos tradicionales de sus recursos.

The space
The house is located in a unique and beautiful location in the area of Empordanet, very close to small rural and medieval villages and easy access to the beautiful beaches of Costa Brava. The closest villages are Ullastret, Peratallada, Palau - Sator, Gualta, Pals, Torroella, La Bisbal.

The nearest beaches are Pals, La Gola de Ter, Estartit, Begur, Calella de Palafrugell, Llafranc, Tamariu...

You can go biking to the beach or to visit these medieval and Iberian villages, and enjoy the delicious traditional restaurants in the area!

neighborhood_overview:
Campelles is part of the Ripollès region, in the province of Girona.
It is a very well-preserved natural area with all kinds of fauna, ideal for short excursions along the river, with the option of bathing in its refreshing waters in summer. During the fall, it is a very good place to go looking for mushrooms, or in winter to ski on the nearby slopes of Vall de Núria, La Molina, Masella or Vallter 2000.The town also offers a great variety of local gastronomic products, they highlight its sausages and cheeses, honey or biscuits from Camprodon, near Campelles, are also highly appreciated.

neighborhood_overview: sin registro
host_about:
Hace 29 años que me dedico al mundo de Real Estate y tambien desde entonces he pasado mis vacaciones en Tossa de Mar , a mis hijas le gustaba tanto que finalmente me compre una casa en Santa Maria de LLorell ( Tossa de mar) Me encanta, no se si me gusta más en verano para disfrutar de la playa y de la maravillosa agua transparente  o en invierno de esos paseos tranquilos tanto por las playas como por las montañas cercanas, tienes mil cosas por hacer. 
Debido a mi profesión mis vecinos y amigos me dijeron que les ayudara a alquilar sus viviendas  para las vacaciones y desde entonces nos dedicamos hace ya quince años a preparar estos hogares para que personas de todo el mundo vengáis a conocer este maravilloso pueblo marinero. Estaré encantada de recibirte junto a tu familia y de poderte ayudar en buscar restaurantes , tiendas, excursiones  y que el apartamento o casa que hayas elegido se convierta en tu hogar durante tus vacaciones.

name: Confortable apartamento Llivia, La Cerdanya. WiFi
description:
La limpieza del apartamento se realiza según recomendaciones de las autoridades sanitarias.
Este confortable apartamento recientemente reformado, ubicado en la población pirenaica de Llivia, Valle de La Cerdanya y cerca de diferentes estaciones de esquí, españolas, francesas y andorranas.
Tiene tres habitaciones y dos baños con capacidad para 8 personas. El amplio salón comedor, con chimenea, está abierto a la cocina muy completa.

The space
Este amplio y luminoso apartamento está ubicado en un edificio, con zona común ajardinada y piscina, dentro de la pueblo de Llivia, en el Valle de La Cerdanya, cerca de diferentes estaciones de esquí, españolas, francesas y andorranas.
Es un lugar muy agradable para familias con niños que les gusta la tranquilidad de la montaña y la práctica de deportes al aire libre.
El apartamento ha sido recientemente reformado por completo. Tiene capacidad para 8 huéspedes. Al entrar a través del pasillo, encontramo
neighborhood_overview: El pueblo de Llivia está ubicado, en el valle de La Cerdanya, dentro del territorio francés, cerca de la antigua frontera entre España y Francia. Encontrará muchos de los servicios que precise tales como restaurantes, tiendas, la famosa farmacia de Llivia, etc. De todas formas, está a pocos kilómetros de Puigcerdá, la capital de la comarca.
host_about:
Soy ingeniero de profesión, lo que hace que sea muy meticuloso y perfeccionista. Soy extrovertido, me encanta conocer nuevas gentes y culturas de las que aprendo muchas cosas.
Una de mis pasiones es viajar, que comparto con mi mujer. Juntos hemos visitado muchas de las hermosas ciudades europeas. Me encanta conocer mundo, soy un enamorado del continente africano, he viajado por diferentes países de ese continente.
Practico varios deportes pero sobre todo que sean al aire libre: esquí, tenis y golf, pero mi gran pasión es la pesca a mosca.
Me encanta el cine, las obras maestras las veo varias veces para no perder los detalles, y la lectura de novelas.

name: Vistas al mar y piscina en Begur.
description:
Hay un COBRO ADICIONAL correspondiente a la TASA TURÍSTICA del gobierno local de Cataluña , 1,10 € POR PERSONA y NOCHE ADULTA MAYOR DE 18 AÑOS.

Es obligatorio presentar los documentos de DE IDENTIDAD DE CADA HUÉSPED A LA POLICÍA , deben enviarse previamente a su llegada por EMAIL: :

Urbanización privada en el Puig D'Aiguafreda, piscina comunitaria rebosante con vistas al mar, pádel y acceso directo a la playa de Aiguafreda por el camino de ronda, y a Satuna.

The space
La casa tiene vistas privilegiadas y se haya en una zona tranquila con un bosque colindante de pinos y con terraza súper amplia y protegida con toldos si se desea para refugiarse de sol.

La casa consta de:
- Habitación de matrimonio, con suite -
- 2 habitaciones dobles, -1º habitación, cama de matrimonio o separadas , 2º habitación, 2 camas individuales con baño a compartir-
-Salón comedor y cocina todo abierto con vistas al mar,
-coci
neighborhood_overview: La casa está ubicada en una pequeña comunidad de vecinos vacacionales. En lo alto del Puig D'Aiguafreda, las vistas son espectaculares. Para algo de animación, el pueblo de Begur queda a 10 min en coche.
host_about:
Persona activa ,positiva ,me gusta de disfrutar de la naturaleza y de las pequeñas cosa.
Soy muy organizada y super limpia , me guata tenerlo todo a punto para que cada persona disfrute de mi casa ,como si fuese la suya propia.
Soy super familiar y me gustan los amigos.
Hobbies : Fotografia, nadar , andar .skie de nieve y de agua , navegar , juego al bridge y al golf
Osea , que me gusta la vida en si.

name: La Bisbal d´Empordà. Casa S. XVII
description:
Casa restaurada del S. XVII en Sant Pol de la Bisbal d'Empordà. Situada en el espacio natural protegido de Les Gavarres. Entorno rural muy bello y tranquilo a 4 km de La Bisbal con todos los servicios y a 20 min de las playas de la Costa Brava. English & German.

The space
El encanto del espacio es que se trata una casa que unicamente se alquila 3 semanas y el resto del año es la vivienda habitual por lo que intento conseguir que el huésped se sienta como en su casa.

Número de permiso Turismo Rural HUTG-000889

Guest access
La casa se alquila entera y no se comparte con otros huespedes.

Other things to note
Cancelación: Estricta
Depósito de seguridad: 200€

License number
PG-000889
neighborhood_overview:
La casa está a 2 minutos de la Bisbal donde se encuentran todos los servicios y su importante mercado de los viernes. El entorno natural permite practicar trekking o mountain bike desde la puerta de casa y visitar los pueblos medievales cercanos, jugar a golf o pasar el día en las playas de Calella, Pals, Palamós, Llafranch, etc que se encuentran a 20 minutos en coche.

The house is 2 minutes driving from nearby La Bisbal, where you will find all amenities, shopping, a great Friday market, supermarkets, etc... perfectly located to discover the beaches and coves of Costa Brava, as well as its wonderful medieval villages like Peratallada, Pals, Monells...
host_about:
Después de muchos años viviendo en la zona sigo descubriendo paisajes y lugares maravillosos. Mi afición por la naturaleza me ha empujado a realizar excursiones en coche todo terrenos para dar a conocer bellos lugares de difícil acceso.
La cocina es otra de mi aficiones así  es que si lo deseas puedo aconsejarte que como o donde comer. Como decía el escritor catalán Josep Plá: "la cocina es el paisaje puesto en el plato".

name: Apartment in Regencos with garden and pool
description:
Stay in a typically Empordanese house located in the heart of the Costa Brava. This beautiful 18th century rectory has been transformed into four cozy apartments that preserve the historical essence of the establishment.

Our apartments are 50 m2, have 1 large bedroom with a double bed, 1 full bathroom and a living area with a fully equipped kitchen.

The rectory of regencos, where our apartments are located, has a beautiful garden with a swimming pool.

The space
Spacious and fully equipped apartment of 50 m2, overlooking our garden with pool. Perfect capacity for 2 adults and 1 child.

Apartment decorated by interior designer Anna Puig. Her vision has managed to turn our rooms into cozy and bright spaces, taking care of every detail accompanied by the practicality and comfort necessary to satisfy the needs of our clients.


Each apartment has:

• 50 m2
• 1 large master bedroom with comfortable double be
neighborhood_overview:
Our customers can park their car esaily, few meters from the apartment.

Place that stands out for the tranquility of the town of Regencos at the same time that it is perfectly located, between the towns of Pals and Begur, just 10 minutes from the places of interest and the best beaches on the Costa Brava.

The Rectoria de Regencós, as its name suggests, is located in the medieval town of Regencós, characterized by its tranquility. It is the perfect enclave for those who want to enjoy the typical village life of its people, its narrow and cobbled streets and surrounded by fields with views of the Quarlemany mountain.

We are in the small and cozy medieval town of Regencós, between the well-known towns of Begur and Pals. The perfect enclave for those who want to enjoy nature and the sea, in a dream environment.

It is located just 5 minutes by car from the best beaches such as Sa tuna, Sa Riera, Calella de Palafrugell, LLafranc, Pals and Platja
host_about:
Mi nombre es Alicia y soy de Barcelona. Llevo residiendo en Gerona 19 años y me he dedicado siempre a la hostelería y gestion de restauración y eventos.
Mi objetivo es hacer sentir a los huespedes como en casa y recomendarles todos aquellos preciosos y reconditos lugares que alberga la Costa Brava, para pasar unas inolvidables vacaciones.

name: CASA  EN CADAQUÉS CAIALS.
description:
Se alquila planta superior de una preciosa casa unifamiliar en zona residencial de Cadaqués con entrada independiente y jardín compartido . Disponemos de espacio para guardar material de buceo, cayacs, bicicletas...

The space
La casa dispone de 2 habitaciones dobles, 1 suite con baño, cocina independiente, Salón comedor con chimenea y salida a terraza privada con mesa y sillas , también pequeña buhardilla. 80 m2 total .
Precios a partir de 80 € ( 4-6 personas) Los precios son indicativos ,confirmar el precio total directamente con el propietario al realizar la reserva . Durante los meses de junio -septiembre la reserva minima es de una semana de sábado a sábado.
Ubicada a 1 min playa y a 10 min a pie del centro del pueblo. Muy cerca de los más importantes centros de buceo del pueblo.

Guest access
Dispone de todos los servicios : agua caliente, congelador, TV, Internet/Wifi, calefacción central y de todos los utensilios de
neighborhood_overview:
Situada en plena península del Cabo de Creus, Cadaqués es una de las localidades más emblemáticas de la Costa Brava gerundense.En la bahía de Cadaqués se eleva un angosto entramado de callejuelas empedradas y casas blancas que configura su casco histórico declarado bién de interés cultural. Sobre el perfil de la villa destaca la imagen de la iglesia de Santa María, templo de blanca fachada y cuidadosamente restaurado que alberga un magnífico retablo de estilo barroco. Por su parte, la arquitectura modernista ha dejado su peculiar impronta en algunas de los edificios más notables del puebo, como la Casa Serinyana.

Esta bella población de raíces marineras cuenta con excelentes playas y tranquilas calas de aguas transparentes que, unidas a una inmejorable infraestructura turística, atraen a todos aquellos que buscan un lugar para disfrutar del sol y del mar.
Su condición de puerto natural y la calidad de sus fondos marinos ofrecen las mejores condiciones para practicar

name: Apartment overlooking the sea
description:
Our high standing apartment has beautiful views over the Bay of Roses. The apartment has 3 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms a large living room, and a terrace overlooking the Mediterranean.
The kitchen has all modern comforts. A garage for 2 cars is available

The space
The apartment has been recently renovated and has a high quality finish. It is situated on the 2nd floor of a small apartment block with swimming pool. Six people can easily be accommodated and we can provide a cot for small children and high chair. The views across the bay never gets boring. The terrace is large and has a dining corner and lounge chairs.
The apartment is airconditioned and heated in the colder months. A garage for 2 cars is available on the ground floor. A separate space for a washing machine is in the apartment.

Guest access
Guests have access to all rooms, however there
may be some cupboards locked in the living room. They can use the swimming pool an
neighborhood_overview:
What do we love about Roses. I suppose the beautiful sea, the fishing fleet, which leaves port everyday to return in the late afternoon, which is a lovely sight from our terrace. The sunsets. The restaurants and the nice boulevard of Roses.
The nice villages to visit near Roses, such as Cadaques, Figueres with its Dali museum, the National Parks of Cap de Creus and Aiguamolls.
host_about:
Twenty five years ago we wanted to buy a house in France for our holidays and we found Le Coustal. We restored first the old farmhouse dated 1870 and this is the place we used to live in ourselves. Now this beautiful  farmhouse is also for rent and we named it La Ferme.  We ourselves moved to Château Preyssac in Thenon,  which we are renovating right now.  We started to restore all the other buildings on the domaine. Many years later we could buy the land of our neighbors and we were able to completely renovate the Maison de Maitre and opening it for guests six years ago. 
We are originally from the Netherlands, however 16 years ago we moved from Holland to the United Arab Emirates with our daughter Sanne. 
Nowadays I spend my time between France and the Emirates and together with my daughter Sanne and a dedicated team we take care of our guests in France and Spain, where we also have a family property ( las Rocas) hosted by my cousin Gijb.
Apart from las Rocas we now manage 3 more properties in Rosas: 
Belleza del Mar, Casa Diaz, and Casa Flamenco. 
in the future we hope to add some more treehouses at the domaine Lalande-Laborie. At the moment there are two and maybe in the future in the forests of Preyssac !!

description:
Wonderful rustic house, recently renovated in Monells the best spot of Emporda with capacity up to 7 people. Idilic sorroundings, relaxing bycicle strolls, and only at 20 minutos of the best Costa Brava beaches and the amazing city of Girona.

The space
Beautiful stone built house, decorated with taste and care in a unique medieval town. With 2 independent living rooms including fire place, 3 cozy and large bedrooms, 2 complete bathrooms, a terrace with spectacular views and and a comfortable chill-out corner in the garden ideal for reading, or enjoy a relaxing cocktail at the end of the day

Guest access
Fully equipped including bycicles, bbq and wifi

name: Meer(-blick) erleben - Ferienhaus mit Pool
description:
In unserem 2014 renoviertem Haus fühlt man sich gleich wohl. Modern und hell eingerichtetes Haus im typischen Cadaques Style mit atemberaubenden Blick auf das Cap Creus und das wilde Mittelmeer. Umgeben von einem schönen Garten mit privatem Pool.Die großzügige Fensterfronten mit Schiebelementen, garantieren bei jedem Wetter einen herrlichen Blick auf das Mittelmeer.
Große überdachte Terrasse mit Meer Blick.

The space
Neu renovierte Zimmer. Zwei Schlafzimmer und zwei Bäder bieten reichlich Platz für 4 Personen. Ein großes stielvoll eingerichtetes Wohnzimmer in offener Bauweise und übergehender Küche bieten viel Raum. Eine große Terrasse mit Meerblick rundes den Flair vom Haus am Meer ab. Über eine offene Treppe im Wohnraum gelangt man auf eine Empore, die weiteren Raum für 1 Gast ermöglichen.

Guest access
Ihnen steht die komplette obere Wohnung des alleinstehenden Hauses inkl. tollen Garten und privatem Pool zur verfügung.
neighborhood_overview: Sehr ruhig gelegen, direkt an der legendären Hippieinsel. Hier kann man die Natur geniessen, herrliche Spaziergänge unternehmen, tauchen, schwimmen…..15 min zu Fuß ist man in Port Lligat wo sich das berühmte Dali Museum befindet.

name: SANT CARLES 7 Fantastic apartment in the seafront
description:
Fantastic apartment in the seafront.

The space
This cosy apartment is located at the urban zone of the Sant Carles, of the coast and familiar village of Llançà, where you can do a lot of aquatic activities (Kayak, snorkel, sailing, fishing, windsurf, etc.) And mountain activities (hiking, the GR9, the Sant Jaume path, discover dolmens in the zone, visit the great monastery of Sant Pere de Rodes...)
This little village it’s between the Cap de Creus and the Albera, near to the fishing villages of Port de la Selva, Cadaqués and Colera, where you can discover their history and culture, their gastronomy and their magnificent landscapes of the Costa Brava.
Llançà it’s near Figueres too, where you will find restaurants, shops and the incredible Dali’s museum. Also you can visit the rustic village of Perelada and they amazing Casino, and the little villages of the Alt Empordà whit their famous vineyards with D.O Empordà.
This ground floor is in the Port zo
neighborhood_overview:
This fabulous apartment with sea views it’s located at the calm zone of Sant Carles in the familiar seaside village of Llançà, where you can do different sea activities (Kayack, sail, diving, windsurf, etc..) and mountain activities ( GR92, mountain and sea routes, the Santiago path, dolmen, Sant Pere de Rodes monastery…)

This little village is between the Cap de Creus and the Albera, close to seaside villages like Port de la Selva, Cadaqués and Colera, where you can discover their history, their gastronomy and their beautiful and amazing natural landscapes.

Llançà is near Figueres town where you can visit the Dali’s museum and the Figueres’ shops. It is near to Perelada and its wonderful Casino.
host_about: Somos una agencia inmobiliaria con mas de 50 años de experiencia en el sector turístico y especializados en alquiler vacacional. Nuestro objetivo es claro: que cada cliente se sienta como en su propia casa! Ofrecemos una atención personalizada y profesional, capaz de gestionar cualquier incidencia en el menor tiempo posible. Lejos de las inmobiliarias totalmente impersonales, nuestro trato y proximidad son nuestras señas de identidad. Esperamos conocerte y poderte ayudar en tus próximas vacaciones!

name: Las flores 3B, Begur, Costa Brava
description:
Semi-detached house located in 'les flors'-urb. Residential Begur-Costa brava. The complex is made up of 16 cases combined with a community pool

The space
In the heart of the Empordà region, the town of Begur and its municipality form one of the most wonderful places on the Costa Brava. Bounded by the Gavarres massif and the sea, with an area that extends inland to the foot of the mountain and the other open to the most beautiful seafront of the coast, the municipality of Begur, along with the small town of Esclanyà and the coves that make it up, form a set and a unique landscape environment.
Holiday home for up to 8 people. Located in the Urb. 'Residencial Begur' in a small community of bungalows, called 'les flores', with communal garden and pool for 17 homes, all homes have in addition to their private garden with direct access to the community area. Quiet location.
Twin house located in the complex 'les flors'-urb. Residencial Begur-Costa brava cons
neighborhood_overview: the Residencial Begur urbanization begins near the village extending between large tracts of pine forests. It is a very quiet both in winter and in summer while in summer you can enjoy the coolness produced by the trees that surround it. In the same area there are public swimming pool and tennis (extra) can also enjoy a tasty meal at the restaurant located at the entrance " La Galena".

Community of apartments with three swimming-pools and fantastic sea view. 2 km from Aiguablava beach and the centre of Begur.

name: Ca la Mula, Cap de Creus
description:
Pide tu oferta a partir de la tercera noche, Casa en entorno rural, con calefacción, 3 dormitorios, 2 baños (bañera para dos personas, no jacuzzi), jardín con barbacoa, vistas al monasterio de Sant Pere de Rodes.
Ideal para desconectar, pueblo tranquilo a 2 km de la playa. Perfecto para 1 o 2 parejas o familia con niños.

The space
La casa se reformo en 2013, con calefacción mediante bomba de calor, instalada en enero de 2016, dispone de un comedor-cocina con chimenea (35 m2), en la planta primera, con vista a la montaña y al monasterio de Sant Pere de Roda y de Sant Salvador, dispone de 3 dormitorios, 1 doble (15 m2) y 2 individuales (6 m2), con dos camas de matrimonio y una litera, 2 baños completos, uno de los baños dispone de bañera para 2 personas, no es un jacuzzi, los chorros de agua y las burbujas estan desconectados, con las paredes de piedra y iluminación led de colores, perfecto para descansar después de una ruta a pie por los caminos que recorren
neighborhood_overview:
El pueblo de La Vall de la Santa Creu, data del siglo XVI, ubicado a 17 km de Cadaqués, se trata de un entorno rural, protegido por el departamento de patrimonio de la Generalitat, dentro del parque natural del Cap de Creus, con vista al monasterio de Sant Pere de Rodes. Se ubica a unos 2,5 km de la playa.
El pueblo dispone de un restaurante, abierto en verano, especializado en arroz con bogavante y paellas.

name: A house with pool and a view on the sea
description:
A house facing the sea with a large private garden and swimming pool. Two bedrooms with a private solarium terrace, a large bedroom with view to the sea and a kids bedroom.
Perfect for families and friends on vacation. 200m from the sea, ideal temperature and a gentle breeze for pleasant nights. Next to many restaurants, a pine forest, golf course and tennis court, 5 minutes from the center of Palamos.

The space
The house is clean, bright and in summer colors. Numerous cupboards and storage spaces at your disposal, an equipped kitchen, a gas BBQ, a balcony dining room with a view. The garden is partially shaded to take a nap under the trees. The pool, 3m deep, has sun most of the day to sunbathe on the sun loungers, with a computer-managed salt chlorination system for softer water for the skin. The residence is isolated with a green curtain of 28 poplars that hide the neighbors. You quickly feel at home.

Guest access

+ Outdoor kitchen with BBQ 🍽🐟🥗

Villa with 5 double bedrooms, 3 bathrooms, 2 kitchens + a fully equipped outdoor kitchen, jacuzzi, covered terrace, BBQ and outdoor shower within walking distance of Sa Riera, one of the most beautiful beaches of the Costa Brava.

What makes our house unique is that it is surrounded by terraces. Everything is equipped for outdoor living: the outdoor kitchen even has a dishwasher!

neighborhood_overview:
The villa is built against the hills adjoining the sea. The terraces surrounding the house offer sea views. From the house is a staircase to the bottom of the village, allowing guests to walk down to the beach in a straight line.

Just before arriving at the beach one passes a row of terraces, of which our favorite, the red restaurant, offers great food for a very reasonable price. Try one of the dishes with fresh fish or "arròs" (the Catalan variant of the Spanish 'paella', prepared with rice from Pals, the next village) de marisc (with seafood).

description:
The Riells blau apartments are located around 700m to the beach of Riells. The apartment complex has a large communal pool located in beautiful gardens with both plenty of sun and shade. The apartment complex is ideal for children as there is a childrens play area.
Our apartment is on the first floor and overlooks the pool. It consists of two bedrooms with double beds, and one bedroom with twin beds. A fully fitted open style kitchen with oven, electric hob, fridge/freezer, dishwasher and microwave. There is a separate shower room and utility room with washing machine.
The lounge and diner are combined and have a set of patio doors which open onto a large terrace/balcony which overlooks the communal gardens and to sit and watch the kids in the pool while enjoying a glass of wine in the shade! There is communal WiFi and Local TV and CD player, In the lounge there is a big sofa and easy chair to comfortably sit 6 people.
This is a large roomy apartment that sleeps 6

neighborhood_overview: Es el animado barrio de Riells. Cerca del puerto deportivo, del puerto y de la playa. Ideal para callejar e ir de compras en las tiendecitas que ofrecen de todo o tomar algo en uno de los bares.
host_about:
LLevo dedicandome 25 años al alquiler turístico. Me importa la buena relación con propietarios y huéspedes. Mi experiencia y empatía hace que tanto unos cómo otros quedan contenos y vuelven cada año a alquilar conmigo por que hay buena relación! 

Ac ceso a mi despacho El Tura: 

Llegando a Barcelona & Girona, si toman la NII, a la altura de Orriols, hay el cruce de l’Escala -  Empuries ( a la derecha) si toman la Autopista AP7/E15, por favor salen por la Salida 5 “L’Escala – Empuries”.  Llegando a la L’Escala por la Gi 623, encontrarán lo puntos giratorios de St. Martí d’Empuries  y del Camp dels Pilans, siempre tendrán que tomar la dirección Riells – Montgó. A la llegada de la población, como referencia encontrarán un puesta de la Cruz Roja, el supermercado Champion y una torreta de los bomberos. La dirección de la agencia el Tura es Avda. Montgó, nº 21ª.

Acces a mon agence el Tura

En arrivant de France, par l’Autoroute AP7/E15, vous prennez la sortie 5: L’Escala – Empúries. Si vous prennez la Route Nationale II (aprés Figueres) il ya la sortie ver l’Escala, pour la route C252. En arrivant a l’Escala, il y a les ronds  points de St. Martí d’Empuries et del Camp dels Pilans, il faut prendre toujours direction  Riells – Montgó. En arrivant, vous aurez comme points de reference la Croix Rouge, le supermarché Champion et une tour de sourveillance des Pompiers. L’adress de mon agence El Tura c’est Avda. Montgó, nº 21ª.

name: Fisherman's house Els pescadors, Begur
description:
House situated in the second sea line in Sa Tuna beach, 50mts to the beach. Fantastic sea view.

The space
In the heart of the Empordà region, the town of Begur ,one of the most wonderful places on the Costa Brava. Bounded by the massif of Les Gavarres and the sea, with an area that extends inland, to the foot of the mountain and the other open to the most beautiful seafront of the coast, Begur, with the small town of Esclanyà and the coves that make it up, form a set and a unique landscape environment.
House located on the 2nd line of the sea, 50 m from SA TUNA beach. Splendid sea views.
CASA 8 PAX House on three floors:
Grown floor: entrance hall,
1 bathroom with polybanon / WC / bidet.
1 bedroom with double bed with direct access to the bathroom, sea views.
1 bedroom with 2 single beds overlooking the sea.
Upper floor: very simple rustic kitchen (microwave, fridge, small oven).
Spacious dining-living room with firepla
neighborhood_overview: The Sa Tuna is characteristic for its sheltered location, access and tortuous. This beach offers a nice bath in clean and transparent waters, and nice walks along the coastal path.

Llegando a la L’Escala por la Gi 623, encontrarán lo puntos giratorios de St. Martí d’Empuries  y del Camp dels Pilans, siempre tendrán que tomar la dirección Riells – Montgó. A la llegada de la población, como referencia encontrarán un puesta de la Cruz Roja, el supermercado Champion y una torreta de los bomberos. La dirección de la agencia el Tura es Avda. Montgó, nº 21ª.

Acces a mon agence el Tura

En arrivant de France, par l’Autoroute AP7/E15, vous prennez la sortie 5: L’Escala – Empúries. Si vous prennez la Route Nationale II (aprés Figueres) il ya la sortie ver l’Escala, pour la route C252. En arrivant a l’Escala, il y a les ronds  points de St. Martí d’Empuries et del Camp dels Pilans, il faut prendre toujours direction  Riells – Montgó. En arrivant, vous aurez comme points de reference la Croix Rouge, le supermarché Champion et une tour de sourveillance des Pompiers. L’adress de mon agence El Tura c’est Avda. Montgó, nº 21ª.

name: Casa Chifranca, Begur, Costa Brava
description:
Beautiful house for 8 people located in Residencial Begur, with garden and private pool.

The space
In the heart of the Empordà region, the town of Begur and its municipality form one of the most wonderful places on the Costa Brava. Bounded by the massif of Les Gavarres and the sea, with an area that extends inland to the foot of the mountain and the other open to the most beautiful seafront of the coast, the municipality of Begur, along with the small town of Esclanyà and the coves that make it up, form a set and a unique landscape environment.
Casa Chifranca is located in the Begur residential area, 2 km from the village and 3 km from Aiguablava cove and a supermarket 400m away. Very quiet, sunny location, 1000m2 garden with private pool.
The house is composed of:Living-dining room with TV and exit to the terrace
Fully equipped kitchen with dishwasher, microwave, washing machine, fridge and oven.
4 bedrooms

Cálida y acogedora casa de pueblo, de piedra vista y la arquitectura típica del Empordà.

name: f21.DUPLEX II - Old Town of Girona
description:
We offer you a very special place, the building is located in the Força street, in the middle of the old jewish quarter of Girona and it was totally renewed in 2006. An eclectic mix that you will enjoy during your stay.

The space
The Força street is the most special street of Girona’s old quarter. It was the neuralgic center of the old Jewish Quarter and during the Roman period this street was part of the Via Augusta. Nowadays it is a beautiful pedestrian street located and it connects the Cathedral square with the center of the city. From this street we can visit the monumental Girona, the most important museums, eat in the best restaurants and have a drink while we enjoy a live jazz concert.

The space
Amazing apartment, at only 100m from Tamariu's wonderful beach. Tamariu, one of the most beautiful villages in the Costa Brava, retains its village charm with its white houses of the ancient fishermen.Completely new and fully equipped, with heating and duvets for the winter, from 1 to 4 people. 1 bedroom with double bed and 1 with 2 beds, living room with a large kitchen fully equipped, 2 complete bathrooms. The lovely terrace gets the sun all day and is perfect for slow mornings before hitting the beach. Great views. WIFI available.

Guest access
The best area of the Costa Brava.Tamariu is very relaxed, with only some excellent small restaurants animating the small bay.

Other things t
neighborhood_overview:
The best area of the Costa Brava. Tamariu is very relaxed, with only some excellent small restaurants animating the small bay.

People come from far away to taste the delicious paellas, fresh fish and seafood in front of the sea. A unique experience.

Tamariu has 2 small supermarkets, both selling fresh products: fruits, vegetables and meat, 2 bakeries, hairdressing, international press, shops and bars (some of them with free wifi).The region where Tamariu is situated is simply amazing. You have the best virgin beaches of the Costa Brava around, and if you go inland, most of the villages are medieval, declared historic-artistic monument. The walks around the coastal paths are also highly recommended, with secluded coves to be discovered.

description:

Another nice detail is the swimming pool
Nice apartment with pool and communal area.

2 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, large kitchen and equipped,

The space
The apartment has 2 bedrooms, 2 family bathrooms, living room, fully equipped kitchen with washing machine. The terrace has furniture so you can enjoy meals outdoors..
It also has a private parking lot in the same building.
There is room for 6 people with the following distribution:
-Bedroom with a double bed.
-Bedroom with bunk bed (2 people)
-Double sofa bed in the living room.
We have cribs for the babies and high chairs. Please, if needed, ask for it before your travel. It is 15€ for the hole stay.

Guest access

neighborhood_overview:
The apartment is located in a very quiet zone, less than 10 minutes away (walking) from the beach, with an easy and flat access, in the middle of the comercial street.
It is a new neighborhood, very spacious and bright with parks and green areas al around.
Just a 2 minutes walk away from a big supermarket and a restaurant.
Four minutes away, is the beautiful comercial zone, with all kind of shops.
Tossa is a beautiful and quiet town, with a lot of charm. Ideal to travel with your couple, family or with the kids.
It is one of the most beautiful town in all Costa Brava, where you can steel feel the little old town atmosphere and where is not allowed to build tall buildings.
Besides enjoying the beaches, there are a lot other things to do. For example: walk around the old and narrow streets from the walled town "Vila Vella", go the the lighthouse and relax at the "Bar del Far", while you enjoy the incredible views of the rugged coastline and the cliffs. Wal
host_about:
We are Ana and Kristjàn and we’ve been offering accommodation in Tossa de Mar for over thirty years. Seven years ago, we were very happy to found Let’s Holidays.

The passion with which we’ve been working these past years has made us grow, and we now have a vast team of professionals working with us. 
With them, we will make sure to find the best option for you and to get you everything you will need during your stay :)

If there is something that we have learnt this past years is that we like to be treated the same way that we treat you. 
That’s where our philosophy comes from. We like to chat and we will try to get you anything that you need and find solutions to anything that you propose.

At the end, holidays should be exactly the way we want them, right?

We present some of our services :)

The Home Selector is the person who will help you choose the option most appropriate to your tastes. You will save time in searching and finding the best choice.

The Host is the person who will take care of you during the whole stay and try to find anything that you need with the help of the other hosts.

Let’s Holidays Home will be your second holiday home. A place where you will be able to meet with our Hosts, chat, have a glass of wine and listen to some live music.

We’ll love to meet you!

See you soon ;) 

Here you have all our options

host_about:
Llançà és una petita vila mediterrània situada enmig d’un paisatge únic. Està envoltada per dos espais naturals protegits, el Parc Natural del Cap de Creus i el de l'Albera.
L’excel·lent oferta de petites platges i tranquil·les cales que ofereix Llançà, i la riquesa d’elements significatius de patrimoni cultural, des del megalític (amb dòlmens i restes prehistòriques) a restes significatives de l'arquitectura pre-romànica, fan de Llançà un destí ideal per unes vacances familiars plenes d’activitats. 
Us convidem a descobrir aquest meravellós poble de la costa brava i la  bellesa de les seves platges !!!

name: IN FRONT OF THE BEACH! Large and very comfortable
description:
Only 100m from the beach, our large comfortable apartment sleeps up to 8 people, in 4 bedrooms (check out the bed distribution). New kitchen, large living room, rear patio and front balcony, WI-FI, TV, free parking near-by - check out our reviews!

The space
Our apartment is very cosy, quiet, great for family or group holidays, and very close to the beach and town centre.

Guest access
There is a large rear patio, exclusive to guests, great for small kids to play in complete safety, it also has a table and chairs for eating out in the fresh air.

License number
HUTG-004399
neighborhood_overview:
Sant Feliu is a lovely town, dating back hundreds of years, dedicated to fishing and farming, and nowadays, tourism of course. There is still a substantial fishing fleet based in it's harbour (which also has has a large number of recreational boats, fron basic inflatables to mega-yachts). The daily market is full of wonderful locally grown produce, and delicious fresh fish. The harbour is 3 minutes walk from the apartment, the market 10 mins (walking slowly!). The town has 20,000 regular inhabitants, holding lots of it's original charm. It is not overly touristy, like other places nearby (Playa de Aro being the worst example - best to go there just for the night-life and the shopping!).
There are many great places close-by to go to for beautiful beaches, excursions, cycling, scuba-diving, cliff-walking, etc. etc.

name: Pretty Villa in Spectacular Setting with pool
description:
A countryside haven with in easy reach of the shimmering Costa Brava. Situated within the national park of Les Gavarres, aside a picturesque, medieval village, the villa has breathtaking views and spectacular walks. Enjoy traditional features with modern comforts, pool, garden & donkey.

The space
The situation is idyllic and unique. I don't think there is any other property in the area that can boast such a tranquil setting and be in walking distance of 2 of the best and affordable countryside restaurants in the area. To be by such a pretty but quite medieval village while in a national park is pretty amazing. The house is not "Ikead" it has taste, character and charm. The garden in beautifully planted and the pool at 11m, a perfect size. It really is a fantastic base to explore the medieval villages of Emporda, the beaches of the Costa Brava and the whole of Catalonia in general with the mountains, Girona, France and Barcelona also just a day trip away.
neighborhood_overview:
This area is known for its beaches, its food, stunning countryside, medieval villages, cycling, mountains and art.

A Gastronomic Extravaganza
There are various Michelin starred restaurants and many wonderful off the beaten track, local, authentic, affordable eateries. We owned a restaurant ourselves and can advise you on the best places to eat. There are 2 wonderful local restaurants just within walking distance.

Surreal Art
The area has been known for its ceramics since roman times and one can visit the nearby town of La Bisbal for ceramic shopping and the Friday morning, outside food market is delightful.

We are in the centre of the Dali triangle, with his wife Gala's eccentric castle in neighbouring Le Pubol and Figueres and Cadaques an hour or so away by car.

Surrounded by beautiful medieval villages such as Pals and Peretallada, you can spend a lovely morning at markets and cafes or go back further in time and view the exce
host_about: We love travel, art, design and cooking. We love creating and hosting delicious feasts at home.

host_about:
LLevo dedicandome 25 años al alquiler turístico. Me importa la buena relación con propietarios y huéspedes. Mi experiencia y empatía hace que tanto unos cómo otros quedan contenos y vuelven cada año a alquilar conmigo por que hay buena relación! 

Ac ceso a mi despacho El Tura: 

Llegando a Barcelona & Girona, si toman la NII, a la altura de Orriols, hay el cruce de l’Escala -  Empuries ( a la derecha) si toman la Autopista AP7/E15, por favor salen por la Salida 5 “L’Escala – Empuries”.  Llegando a la L’Escala por la Gi 623, encontrarán lo puntos giratorios de St. Martí d’Empuries  y del Camp dels Pilans, siempre tendrán que tomar la dirección Riells – Montgó. A la llegada de la población, como referencia encontrarán un puesta de la Cruz Roja, el supermercado Champion y una torreta de los bomberos. La dirección de la agencia el Tura es Avda. Montgó, nº 21ª.

Acces a mon agence el Tura

En arrivant de France, par l’Autoroute AP7/E15, vous prennez la sortie 5: L’Escala – Empúries. Si vous prennez la Route Nationale II (aprés Figueres) il ya la sortie ver l’Escala, pour la route C252. En arrivant a l’Escala, il y a les ronds  points de St. Martí d’Empuries et del Camp dels Pilans, il faut prendre toujours direction  Riells – Montgó. En arrivant, vous aurez comme points de reference la Croix Rouge, le supermarché Champion et une tour de sourveillance des Pompiers. L’adress de mon agence El Tura c’est Avda. Montgó, nº 21ª.

The space

- the middle floor, where the entrance to the house is, has a kitchen with bar, dinner table and living room and a terrace with sea view and a build-in outside barbecue

- the top floor has the master bedroom, a bathroom with bath, a lounge area with “walk-in” closets and a separate terrace with sea view

- the lower floor has the “children’s-room” with bunk beds, a bathroom with bath and two bedrooms connected to the large lower terrace with lounge corner – perfect for children to play or having dinner with larger groups

neighborhood_overview:
L'Escala has a strategic location - everything is close. Girona, Roses, Cadaques - only 40-45 min; Figueres and Empuriabrava - 20min; Begur and Palamos - 30 min; Pals and Playa de Aro - 40 -50 min; Banyoles, Olot - 40 min - 1 hour. Overall, L'Escala is perfect for exploring the Costa Brava.
L´Escala offers various activities and areas which can be enjoyed with children. The beaches of L´Escala are characterised by their fine sand and shallow waters, which means that they are ideal for children. Also is a paradise for children, with children´s parks, go-karts and horse trip, as well as bicycle hire. What´s more, L´Escala offers a wide range of sports and adventure-based activities - discover new sensations!! Bicing in l´Escala is more than a simply renting bikes service. L'Escala Cycling is a public transport service. It is practical, sustainable and easy to use. Tour and enjoy the l'Escala region free from air and noise pollution. A walk along El Camí Forestal between l´Escala
host_about:
ES 
Apreciado Huésped:
Somos Aleksandra, Stela, Raquel y Judith (K3HOMES) y nos dedicamos a alquiler turístico.
Nosotras vamos a ayudarle a pasar sus mejores vacaciones con nuestra agencia.  Nuestra empresa se ha construido alrededor de las necesidades de nuestros clientes. UN HOTEL SINGULAR EN UN PARQUE NATURAL ENTRE VOLCANES y algo más...

Situado en una finca de 400 ha, forestal y ganadera, enclavada dentro del ámbito protegido del Parque Natural de la Zona Volcánica de La Garrotxa (Girona), a 840 m sobre el nivel del mar, con excepcionales vistas hacia el Pirineo, las singulares montañas del Collsacabra y la costa del Mediterráneo.

neighborhood_overview: sin registro
host_about:
FINCA EL VENTÓS, UN HOTEL SINGULAR

Enclavado dentro de una impresionante finca forestal y ganadera de 400 hectáreas y dentro del ámbito protegido del Parque Natural de la Zona Volcánica de La Garrotxa, se alza este incomparable lugar.

Las vistas excepcionales desde 840 metros por encima del nivel del mar permiten contemplar desde la Vall de Núria y el Puigmal hasta la costa mediterránea, unos elementos (Website hidden by Airbnb) de un valor incalculable el entorno de esta finca donde los clientes tienen la posibilidad de realizar actividades relacionadas con la naturaleza y el turismo activo.

Salones con chimenea, zonas de relax y una magnífica piscina son algunos de los muchos ingredientes que todo el que se acerque encontrará en este lugar. La Finca el Ventós cuenta también con un excelente restaurante especializado en cocina selecta y cocina de montaña, además de una amplia selección de vinos en una bodega exclusiva. *El restaurante del Hotel el Ventós es uno de los establecimientos gastronómicos recomendados por la Guia Michelin 2015.

La Finca el Ventós compta amb 10 habitaciones que ofrecen a los clientes todas las comodidades para hacerles disfrutar de una estancia inolvidable. Entre otros elementos, pone a su disposición dispositivos tecnológicos de última generación, como una sala de home cinema, iPads i iPods, así como una sala de reuniones para empresas completamente equipada.

*Hotel no recomendado a menores de 10 años.

Bienvenidos a nuestra casa!

name: Costa Brava, 50 m beach - B2
description:
Apartment in a quiet street in the center of Sant Antoni de Calonge, 50 meters from beach

100 m2 arranged to accommodate up to 8 people (5 beds and a double sofa bed)

Suitable for persons on wheelchair: on street level, with wide corridors and doorways

3 bedrooms (2 double, 1 with bunk bed)
2 bathrooms with shower
Living room with 1 double sofa bed
Satellite TV, Internet WiFi
Private parking for 1 car

The space
Sant Antoni combines a rich medieval history with modern day facilities, offering an ideal place to relax, either on the beach or in the mountains. It lies 2 km away from Palamós, along the seashore path, offering the visitor exceptional views of our coasts.

The beautiful winding path along the "Camino de Ronda", will also take you to Playa de Aro. During the walk, you will be able to sit down and rest on any of the terraces and enjoy the sunshine, even during the winter months.

In
neighborhood_overview:
Shops, supermarkets, restaurants, sea sports rentals, all within 10 minutes walk from the apartment.

Sant Antoni combines a rich medieval history with modern day facilities, offering an ideal place to relax, either on the beach or in the mountains. It lies 2 km away from Palamós, along the seashore path, offering the visitor exceptional views of our coasts.

The beautiful winding path along the "Camino de Ronda", will also take you to Playa de Aro. During the walk, you will be able to sit down and rest on any of the terraces and enjoy the sunshine, even during the winter months.
host_about:
Hello,

We are a family who own a number of apartments and houses
-  Costa Brava, Spain (town of Sant Antoni de Calonge and town of Palamos)

We speak fluent English, French, Danish, Spanish, Catalan, German and Mandarin Chinese.

My father is a diplomat, so we have lived and traveled extensively around the world. We enjoy meeting travelers and try our best to make your stay as enjoyable as possible.

We have contracted cleaning and maintenance staff, available to solve any issue that may come up during your stay, as soon as possible.

Generally Ana (in Spain) will be the ones to meet you at the property and provide tips about the area (she can advise on activities, restaurants, shops...). 

We enjoy good food and wine, sailing (and may be able to take you out on a boat trip locally depending on the dates of your visit), scuba diving, skiing, go-karting, adventure sports in general, entrepreneurial ventures, football, art and architecture, handicrafts etc.

Completely equiped apartment of 80 m2 aprox. with lot of space, fresh and very luminouse. View to the beach of S'Agaro, elevator, pool and garden on the buiding, private parking and only 3 min. by car to the shops and the beach. Cradle and chair o.d.

The space
The apartment has about 80 square meters and is fully equipped for an unforgettable stay on the Costa Brava. The kitchen is fully equipped with washing machine, dryer, dishwasher, oven, gas hob, microwave and fridge-freezer.
There is a Flat TV and DVD, and a PlayStation upon request.
There are two separate bedrooms, a room with double bed and the other one with two single beds. One bathroom is inside of a bedroom and one bathroom in the hallway.
There is a large dining area by the living room and a bright terrace with overlooking to the sea and the beach of S'Agaro, Playa de Aro and Sant Feliu de Guixols.

Guest access
The apartment has a community pool and garden and a
neighborhood_overview:
S'Agaró is situated between Playa de Aro and Sant Feliu de Guixols, two very idyllic and typical towns on the Costa Brava in the province of Girona. Playa de Aro is ideal for shopping and has a lot of brand shops, spend a day at the beach or go for drinks and dancing at night.
The apartment is located just 30 min. from Girona and 40 min. from Figueras, two capitals with a special charm and great cultural value.

Villa 12/14 pers. Indépendante, très spacieuse avec décoration moderne, située dans le quartier très calme de Sa Riera. Magnifique jardin plat (très rare) avec piscine sécurisée. Plage à 5mn à pied. 5 chambres et 4 SdB. Parking 2/3 voitures.

The space
Magnifique villa idéale pour les séjours en famille ou entre amis, au coeur d'un lieu très privilégié de la Costa Brava réputé pour ses calanques, ses plages et ses golfs, Elle comporte de nombreux couchages pour accueillir les visiteurs, au sein d'une décoration moderne et chaleureuse. Les pièces à vivre sont spacieuses et parfaitement équipées pour des vacances de rêve.
Au RDC on trouve un grand salon avec cheminée, une salle a manger, une cuisine américaine équipée et deux suites parentales avec leurs salles de bain privatives. Toutes les pièces ont vue sur mer et ouvrent sur une large terrasse en partie couverte qui vous permettra de vous protéger du soleil aux heures les plus chaudes de la journée dans u
neighborhood_overview:
La maison est à 2,5km de Begur, charmant village médiéval avec de nombreux bons restaurants / bars et petites boutiques chics et beaucoup d'ambiance en saison.
Begur dessert de nombreuses criques toutes plus belles les unes que les autres (Sa Tuna, Aiguablava, Tamariu, Aiguafreda, ...). La très longe plage de Pals située à 2km permet de nombreuses activités nautiques : planche à voile, kite-surf, catamaran, ski-nautique, etc.

La villa est située dans un quartier très calme à 5/10mn à pied de la plage de Sa Riera. Un escalier permet de descendre à pied à la plage de manière très sécurisée, en particulier pour les enfants qui peuvent être ainsi indépendants.

L'environnement est d'une grande beauté naturelle, avec de nombreuses activités possibles comme la plongée, le tennis et le golf (Golf International d'Emporda, Golf de Pals, etc). C’est aussi une destination très appréciée des randonneurs toute l’année.
Par ailleurs, la richesse culturelle et gastron

name: 13 Calle Santa Maria In the heart of old Cadaqués
description:
In the heart of old Cadaqués, between the sea, 100 meters away, and Santa Maria Church, with its baroque altarpiece 23 m high, this family house can accommodate up to 10 people. Built on two floors, it has a large patio where between sun and shade you can have lunch and take a nap. On the second floor, a bay window overlooking the Riba Pitxot with its famous arcade painted by Dali, Picasso and many other painters who made Cadaqués their place of inspiration.

The space
This is an old house bought by my family in the 1950s when fresh water arrived by tanker. The current kitchen is installed in the old cistern. We tried to maintain the house in its original appearance by equipping it with a kitchen and modern bathrooms.

Guest access
The house is entirely up to you.

Other things to note
It is not possible to reach the house directly by car.
We advise you to park at Port-Alguer while you carry your luggage inside.
neighborhood_overview: The house is located in the old Cadaqués next to the Santa Maria church to visit for its altarpiece, near the town hall where often floats the Catalan flag and offers a beautiful view of the whole bay. This area is full of craft shops and small restaurants. The beach of Port-Alguer is a hundred meters where Ribat Pixot is famous for its arch and its view of the church and its tapas bar.

name: GARDEN APARTMENT, 2 COURTYARDS & VEGETABLE GARDEN
description:
In the Costa Brava, 130 m2 with kitchen-diner, gallery, studio, 3 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms. Recently renovated, with modern appliances. Bright and ventilated. Interior courtyard, big yard and ecological vegetable garden. 0.5 km away from the river Fluvià, 2 km from the beach of St. Pere Pescador and near museums, natural parks, shopping malls and attractions.

The space
It has a kitchen-diner with a .bar facing the gallery. All the appliances are new: washing machine, fridge Liebherr 286 liters, dishwasher, oven, cooker... Complete dinner set and all kind of kitchenware and accessories: electric water heater, blender, mixer… It has a chimney with a fireplace. In summer it’s cool in the gallery because of the wood blinds and the shadow of a vine that partially covers the façade. The bathroom has a bathtub, bidet and an independent toilet. The studio or living room has a sofa, table or writing desk, an upright piano and a 36” TV. There are two bedrooms with big outward
neighborhood_overview:
The village of L’Armentera has approximately 800 inhabitants. It’s very quiet and just a small number of its homes are second/holiday residences. There are supermarkets with excellent fruit and vegetables, butcher’s with high quality products, a fish shop with very fresh fish, restaurants and bars, some of them with free wifi. Agriculture is predominant, especially fruit crops.

From l’Armentera you can walk along the river Fluvià which is 500 m away, with instructions about paths, to cycle or walk. All its routes are beautiful. Especially the one along the river Fluvià, with leafy trees on its banks, its meanders, the fluvial island of Caramany and the estuary, There ‘s a sailing school there and you can rent small sailboats and canoes. The beach of Sant Pere Pescador, with fine sand, is very extensive, there’s always room, and because of its gentle slope is very suitable for children. There’s a variety of sport activity on one side of it: windsurf, kitesurf, etc.

The Can Morè masía is located on the Pasteral plain, just 100 meters from the river Ter. name: Rustic "Mas" farmhouse Emporda/Costa Brava/Girona
description:
Our wonderful rustic "Mas" farmhouse full of character in the quiet and serene Gavarres Nature Park/Baix Emporda between Palamos and Mont Ras near Palafrugell and Calella... far from the maddening crowd but just a stone's throw away from the beaches of Castell, La Fosca, Cala Estreta, etc on the Costa Brava.
Fully furnished & equipped by default, for 13 GUESTS.
However there is room, if necessary, for 2 more guests for an extra guest fee.

License # HUTG-017243

The space
Mas Cabré is a typical Catalan "mas" (farmhouse) built in 1842, according to the date chiseled on the front stone archway. However, it's been documented that a building of some kind already stood there in the 15th century. That's not surprising, since human presence in the area dates from prehistoric times and several dolmens and other Megalithic carvings can be found on the property or close to it.

During our renovations of Mas Cabré, we've kept its rustic, simp
neighborhood_overview:
Mas Cabre is all about location, location, location! You feel like you are far away from everything, almost in the middle of nowhere.

It is situated in the Gavarres Nature Park which is included in the European Union's Natura 2000 Network of protected areas whose goal is to ensure the long term survival of Europe's species and habitats in a sustainable manner.
The nearest house is 1 km away.
However you can see the sea from the house and the town and beaches of the Costa Brava are only minutes away.

Located in the beautifully scenic Baix Empordà region, in Catalonia, Mas Cabré belongs to the municipalities of Vall-Llobrega and Forallac, an area rich with history, great food and sports activities.
From there, you can visit old medieval towns or go to the beach; you can indulge in lunch or dinner by the sea or surrounded by nature; or you can visit a local winery and experience a wine tour.
And let's not forget bicycle trips, sailing, fishing
host_about:
I am a native New Yorker but have lived more years in Barcelona than in New York.
Profession: Freelance photographer specialized in commercial architecture, interiors and portrait photography as well as documentary photography projects on forest related climate change issues.

neighborhood_overview: Originally a fishing village, Calella has become a small town where urban growth has been strictly controlled so that the original charm of the town has not been affected. The beach is very picturesque with several coves. Instead of high-rise apartment blocks, general emphasis is placed on small, well-planned spaces with gardens and trees. Calella has the characteristics of "the perfect place" for many people, large enough to have excellent facilities, including good restaurants, bars and shops, but small enough to avoid organized travel.

name: Beautiful house with sea views in Cadaqués.
description:
This house is four minutes by foot from the beach, in the center of Cadaqués, but away from noisy bars and restaurants. It is an independent house with a private parking, garden, two living-dining rooms (upper floor with sea views and ground floor in the garden) and 2 kitchens. There is also a BBQ area with tables and a pergola in the garden.

The space
The house is located in the center of the town, but away from the noise of music bars and restaurants. It is built in the typical cadaques style inspired in Lanfranco Bombelli’s architecture.
The house was completely rebuilt in 2009 with high quality materials, including double glass windows, doors, floors, heating, air conditioning (living-room), toilets and cuisine. We take care of the house so it always in a perfect state.

Guest access
There is a private parking for your car in the house. Also, there is extra parking space usually available near the house.

License numbe
neighborhood_overview: The house is located in the area of Es Poal, three minutes from the beach, four minutes from the town square and seven minutes from Portlligat (all on foot). It is located very centrally, but in a very quiet area with almost no noise.
host_about: Hello! I am Clara Mas, a girl from Barcelona that loves to travel around the world. I am an anthropologist but I have a long working-experience in Fashion. I appreciate places with 'charme' and enjoy meeting new people and experiences. I am a fan of outdoors sports like hicking, swimming, cycling, climbing, kayaking, horse-riding, etc. and gastroomy is also an important part of my life, in addition to Music, Nature and Literature. I have lived in Paris, London and New York, but Barcelona remains my favorite city! I need the sun and the sea!

name: ★ CoastalVillas - Villa Bella Vista ★stunning view
description:
A beautiful villa on a quiet spot with fabulous sea views and a great vacation house for one or two families! Villa Bella Vista is situated in a beautiful residential bay with fantastic views of the sea, two beach areas and the Santa Cristina chapel. The secluded beaches can be reached by foot (15 minutes) or by car (two minutes).
Private pool with sun loungers, terrace with exterior dining table and pergola, BBQ and free wifi. A/C in all bedrooms.

The space
A beautiful villa on a quiet spot with fabulous sea views and a great vacation house for one or two families!

Villa Bella Vista is situated in a beautiful residential bay with fantastic views of the sea, two beach areas and the Santa Cristina chapel. The secluded beaches can be reached by foot (15 minutes) or by car (two minutes).

This villa has been tastefully decorated and provides all amenities for a careless and enjoyable stay.
Shopping and restaurants in Blanes are close
neighborhood_overview:
Blanes is located in the region of Catalonia, on the Costa Brava , 60 kilometers north of Barcelona airport .

Once a small fishing village, Blanes still retains some of its original charm ; The complex has a four kilometer stretch of coastline with sandy beaches and small rocky coves , most of which are equipped with water sports and other tourist facilities.

Moving away from the seafront you will find evidence of a town steeped in history, with ancient monuments , churches and buildings still standing as reminders of past colorful Blanes. The medieval castle of Sant Joan offers spectacular views over the harbor , beach and town.
In late July it marks the international fireworks competition , an impressive sight that can be seen from the beach every year.
host_about:
We are a small family run business. Since 2001 we focus on the seasonal rental of villas and apartments that meet our high standards. Location, equipment and decoration are of high importance to us. We hand-pick all our properties to ensure they meet our quality standards and to offer you a unforgettable dream holiday!

Our experienced team speaks spanish, catalan, german, english, french and dutch and will be more than pleased to assist you in your travel arrangements. 

Hope to host you soon!

name: El Xiprer, Biert, Canet d’Adri (prov.of Girona)
description:
El Xiprer is a place to relax and enjoy its surroundings weather you bike, hike or rest with your family. An energetically autonomous house, 25 minutes away from Girona, in the heart of the Biert Valley under the Rocacorba mountain. This farmhouse is in the middle of the woods, remote area but 25 minutes from Girona, 45 minutes from la Costa Brava, 35 minutes from Banyoles and 1h25 min from Barcelona. El Xiprés is in the middle of the forest, great for a driving adventure if you have a jeep.

The space
The house, El Xiprés de Can Soler is a XIX Century Catalan Masia that used to be a stable. The Catalan vault, its 100 hundred year's old stones and the enormous wood beams define the place's architecture. The house has three rooms, two bathrooms, kitchen, living room and dining room. There is a small balcony with a private garden as well as a barbecue, a fireplace and access to the pool shared with the family. Pool; Children have to be supervised while swimming a
neighborhood_overview: We live in a remote area, we have several neighbours, we are not alone, even though it seems like it. This location is unique, Rocacorba is an hour and half hiking trip away, beautiful view of Girona, Banyoles, the Golf of Roses (the Mediterranean Sea). Canet d'Adri (5-10 minutes away by car) has a waterfall and natural pool and there are several restaurants in the area. Banyoles and the lake (“L’estany”) are 30 minutes away by car; La Garrotxa, a hiking and cultural paradise with medieval villages is 25 minutes away; La Costa Brava, its picturesque fishing villages and beautiful beaches are 35-40 minutes away; The Catalan Pyrenees are 1h 30 minutes away; The French border (north) and the beautiful city of Barcelona (south) are 1h 20 minutes away.
