name: Alojamiento Rural El Montgrí. Turismo rural.
description:
Alojamiento ideal para 2 adultos i 2 niños.
Con aire condicionado.
Ambiente rural a 5 km de la playa.
Dispone de un gran jardín con piscina, barbacoa, una sala comuna al lado de la piscina con salón comedor y baño exterior.
¡Hay muchas actividades para hacer en los alrededores! Golf, Hípica, Vela, Deportes náuticos...

The space
El jardín y la piscina son espacios con ambiente rural i de tranquilidad. Son ideales para tomar el sol o leer un libro. Se puede desayunar, comer o cenar al aire libre y por la noche tumbar-se en una tumbona para mirar las estrellas.

El alojamiento dispone de un salon cocina comedor, de dos habitaciones, y un baño.
Una habitación es de cama doble y la otra de cama individual con una de supletoria.

Guest access
Los viajeros tienen acceso a un jardin muy grande , a la piscina y barbacoa.

Other things to note
Nosotros mismos los recibiremos a la llegada y les a
neighborhood_overview:
El alojamiento se encuentra a la parte sur de Torroella de Montgrí, en una zona tranquila cerca del rio y a 10 minutos andando al centro de la vila.

Está muy cerca del Parque Natural del Montgrí y de las Islas Medas.
Situado en una zona privilegiada de la Costa Brava, cerca de la playa y las montañas de los Pirineos y cerca de la frontera con Francia.

Esta convenientemente situado al lado de un supermercado, pero suficientemente distanciado como para que haya privacidad.

name: L'Olivera, Casa a Rupià
description:
House located in Rupià, a lovely village. Our home preserves the walls of the village and is perfect to accommodate you and your loved ones.

The space
Our home is located in Rupià, a beautiful medieval village that combines the best of the past with the best of today. Enjoy it!
The house preserves the village wall and has 3 bathrooms, 3 bedrooms, interior patio, equipped kitchen, laundry room, dining room, and 3 living rooms.
It also has a large terrace. All this divided in three floors.
The house has been recently remodeled. It is within the village, in a very quiet area surrounded by nature. The bells of the village can be clearly heard.
It has a fully equipped kitchen with oven, fridge, dishwasher and microwave, and a laundry room with washing machine and dryer.
It also has 3 equipped double bedrooms. As well as the bathrooms. There is a full bathroom, and two toilets.
In the patio there is a shower to clean and refresh you

name: Apartament in la Cerdaña
description:
Ground floor apartment with great views in a quiet urbanization on Alp. Very sunny and calm. A three minutes from the town center and 10km from Puigcerdà. 3 outdoor rooms, very bright living room with private outdoor garden.

The space
Very bright and comfortable apartment. Opened spaces and great views of Valley of La Cerdanya and the Pyrenees mountains.
Pleasant stay both in summer and winter.

The apartment is fully equipped.
In the kitchen you have kitchenware, microwave, toaster, coffee maker, microwave, dishwasher, vitro ...
It has a large living room with good views and direct communication with the kitchen. It has a fireplace, flat TV, DVD, music player, two sofas and an armchair.
There are 3 bedrooms with two beds each. Two of them are twin and one double bed. They also provided quilts and bedding.
The master bedroom has a bathroom with sink and bathtub. There is also another bathroom with a shower. All towels provided.<
neighborhood_overview: Alp is a very quiet and familiar. It has parks, restaurants, equipment hire mountain (skiing, snow shoeing, etc.) and a supermarket 5 min from the apartment. It is 10 km from Puigcerdà and 7 km from the ski resort La Masella.

name: Loft en la Fageda d'en Jordà
description:
Loft moderno construido en la primera planta de la casa, zona garaje, funcional, muy luminoso y con salida a un pequeño jardín. Cuenta con 2 camas de matrimonio de 135 cm, sofá, estufa de leña, nevera, microondas, tostadora, cafetera Nespresso, vitrocerámica de dos fuegos, extractor de humos, utensilios básicos de cocina, TV LCD 32". Tiene un lavabo con ducha y wc exclusivo para los huéspedes y una zona para juegos y mesa de ping pong. Al lado del jardín hay un gallinero con 5 gallinas.

The space
Loft ideal para familias de 4 personas. Está a 100 metros de la reserva natural de la Fageda d'en Jordà, que comprende un bosque de hayas de características únicas en España.

Guest access
Jardín y garaje.

Other things to note
En las fechas del 17 de julio hasta el 29 de agosto 2021 estancia mínima 6 noches, con entradas en sabados y domingos.

Tenemos servicio 24h donde ayudamos en todo lo que nos pidan:  información de actividades, restaurantes y todo lo que puedan necesitar.

name: 4 bedroom Apartment near the beach in Costa Brava
description:
This cosy apartment is located next to La Fosca beach in Palamós, a sea town in Gerona area. It is a paradisiac place is ideal for your family vacation in Spain. You can get to this amazing apartment in 30 minutes by car from the airport of Gerona and in 1 hour from the city centre of Barcelona.
Número de licencia: HUTG-024500

The space
The apartment has a spacious living room and four bedrooms: two of them have double beds, one room has two single beds and the last one has a sofa bed, which makes it possible to accommodate up to 8 persons. The kitchen is fully equipped with all necessary amenities and it is next to a big dining room where you can have your meals before enjoying the beach time. The two complete bathrooms have bathtubs and the third one has a shower.

The apartment has a private entrance and a parking place.

Número de licencia: HUTG-024500

Guest access
The apartment is equipped with washing machine
neighborhood_overview: The marvellous views of La Fosca beach can be reached in a 3 minutes walk from the apartment, thanks to the private entrance that the apartment has.
host_about:
Soy extrovertido, alegre y amigo de mis amigos... Me encanta Barcelona, soy de aquí, he crecido, reído y llorado en esta magnífica e inacabable ciudad.
Ahora me gustaría ser tu anfitrión para enseñártela y compartir sus secretos.
Barcelona es única e incomparable, ven a conocerla... y te la enseñaré con mucho gusto!

name: Apartamento 8-12pax L'ARCADA DE FARES
description:
L’Arcada de Fares és un petit complex d’apartaments turístics amb encant de caire rural situat a Besalú i inaugurat el juny del 2009. El formen un total de divuit apartaments, integrats en una masia del segle XV al poble de Fares, a la Garrotxa.

The space
L’Arcada de Fares, un petit complex d'agroturisme amb encant, a Besalú
L’Arcada de Fares és un petit complex d’apartaments turístics amb encant de caire rural situat a Besalú i inaugurat el juny del 2009. El formen un total de divuit apartaments, integrats en una masia del segle XV al poble de Fares, a la comarca de la Garrotxa, just al centre de la província de Girona.
Gestionada a nivell familiar, L’Arcada de Fares disposa d’un apartament per a cada tipus de visitant, amb capacitat des de 2 fins a 14 persones: si viatgeu sols, amb parella, amb família, amb amics o bé si sou un grup empresarial.

Guest access

name: Apartamento 10-14pax L'ARCADA DE FARES
description:
Alójate en nuestros apartamentos y disfruta al máximo de nuestras instalaciones. Somos el espacio ideal para ser el "campo base" de tu escapada para descubrir la Garrotxa y sus alrededores.

*Queda prohibida la celebración de fiestas/eventos en el alojamiento

The space
El Graner, situado en un edificio anexo a la finca, es un apartamento con una capacidad de entre diez y catorce personas, pensado para grupos numerosos, ya sea una familia, un grupo de amigos o un grupo de empresa.

Distribuido en cuatro habitaciones, dos sofás cama dobles y un altillo con dos camas individuales, el alojamiento destaca por la amplitud y la luminosidad en todas las estancias. El Graner viene completamente equipado, con una amplia cocina, dos baños, un altillo, una amplia sala de estar, climatización, radio y televisión de plasma.

name: H2 Habitación doble / Mas Ferran
description:
Masferran is a project of its owner, Ferran, who, once the house restoration was completed decided to open it to the public and share this privileged space in l'Empordà to enjoy an intimate and relaxed stay.
The style was respected adapting it to the current comforts.
We recommend gastronomic routes, outdoor activities and cultural visits.
There is a wide selection of restaurants in the area and a very complete supermarket 3 minutes walk away.

The space
H2
Romantic and quiet 40 m² room. Special design, has integrated bathroom with shower, desk, King size bed, sofa, TV, heating, fan. Access to private terrace and solarium with garden views.
Relaxing decoration in warm tones, with restored furniture combined with modern pieces and natural materials.
100% cotton bed and bath linen.
Quality amenities and hair dryer.
It can accommodate 3 people upon request.
The rest of the rooms, such as kitchen, living room, dining room,
neighborhood_overview: Pals is at the epicenter of the Golden Triangle of Baix Empordà. It's a beautiful area, with marvelous beaches and quite central; perfect for visiting medieval villages and enjoying outdoor, cultural or gastronomic routes.
host_about:
Masferran es un proyecto de su propietario, Ferran, que compró con mucha ilusión esta casa de pueblo. Una vez finalizada la restauración decidió abrirla al público y compartir este espacio privilegiado en l’Empordà.
La restauración se hizo respetando el estilo pero adaptado a las comodidades actuales creando un espacio único para disfrutar de una estancia íntima y relajada.
Trabajamos fuera de casa pero estamos siempre disponibles para asesorar, orientar y hacer recomendaciones sobre la zona a nuestros huéspedes, aunque dejándoles espacio y privacidad para que se sientan cómodos en casa.
Ofrecemos aconsejar rutas gastronómicas, actividades al aire libre y visitas culturales. El espacio está abierto a mostrar arte local y informar de marcados y anticuarios.
Nuestras habitaciones tienen baño privado con ducha, artículos de baño y secador; cama King size, TV, adaptadores usb, altavoces bluetooth, aire acondicionado, ventilador. 
El resto de estancias, como cocina, sala de estar, comedor, jardín, son compartidas con el resto de huéspedes.
Servicio diario de habitaciones.
Ofrecemos wifi gratuita en toda la casa.

name: "Garden-view" double/twin 2.
description:
Well illuminated double bedroom overlooking the garden and fish pond.
Has windows on two sides therefore received the sun for most of the day.
This room is not "en suite". It has its own private bathroom adjacent to the bedroom.
Casa Dos Torres is on the road to the beach which is a 5 minute walk away.
A full description is available is available on the casadostorres website.

The space
Casa Dos Torres is a registered "pension" in Calella de Palafrugell.
We described ourselves as a Bed and Breakfast but this category does not exist here in Sapin therefore we have been given the registration "P" by the Generalitat de Catalunya.

Guest access
Guests are permitted to use our kitchen facilities. This year with the pandemia the kitchen facilities will not be available.
There is free WiFi.
We have a pretty garden with numerous seating areas plus a swimming pool (in season).

Other things to note
neighborhood_overview:
Calella de Palafrugell is an old fishing village. It's centre has retained the original "look" of the place but it has grown considerably over the years.
It still does retain a charm and beauty which attracts people from all over the world.
Calella de Palafrugell is a well known seaside "village in The Costa Brava much frequented by the local Catalans.
The first Saturday in July each year there is the Havanares Festival.
Throughout July and August the Cap Roig gardens hold regular concerts.
This year there may not be concerts!

name: Casa de piedra en Vilaur ,  Can Cavaller
description:
Can Cavaller se encuentra en el tranquilo pueblo de Vilaur .
Tiene un jardín con barbacoa y piscina totalmente privado . , por el otro lado da a la placita del pueblo sin coches . Tiene capacidad para 10 / 13 personas ,

The space
Planta baja :
Sala de estar y comedor cocina con salida a la placita y al jardín y porche donde se puede comer fuera .
Dos habitaciones , una doble con cama 180 y una con una cama de matrimonio
150 y tres camas y dos cuartos de baño.

1ª planta : tres habitaciones dobles dos de matrimonio y una con dos camas , un baño con bañera y una gran terraza .

Guest access
Se entra por una puerta acristalada que da a la plaza de la iglesia (sin coches) donde siempre reina la tranquilidad .

dos grandes cristaleras una da la plaza y la otra da al jardín
neighborhood_overview:
VILAUR Es un pueblecito de piedra , muy pintoresco y tranquilo .
En el pueblo solo hay el centro cívico , que es un buen restaurante y bar .
el supermercado esta en el pueblo de al lado CAMALLERA a dos kilómetros . Alli se puede encontrar de todo .
En Vilaur hay un bar , restaurante donde se come muy bien ,
host_about:
Después de vivir la juventud  en Barcelona  cambiamos nuestros trabajos e iniciamos otra vida en mitad el campo y rodeados de animales . 
De una ruina que compramos hemos conseguido un paraíso , los arboles y la Naturaleza es agradecida y nos encantara compartir este increíble entorno con aquellos que quieran conocer esta zona .

name: Apartamento vistas al mar y gran terraza
description:
Apartamento con gran terraza, muy bien situado con preciosas vistas al mar en Tossa de mar.

Licencia Turistica HUTG-017775

The space
Salón/comedor, baño, cocina completa, 2 habitaciones dobles. y gran terraza.
Lo realmente espectacular de Tossa de Mar son sus Calas, playa y Gran Muralla medieval, que hoy sigue viva en su interior, ya que sigue estando habitada por casas, restaurantes, tiendas. Paseando podrán llegar a visitar el Faro, se encuentra en el punto mas alto, aquí cada tarde/noche se puede disfrutar de música en directo mientras tomas una copa.
La comunicación al resto de pueblos en la Costa Brava es fantástica para los mas viajeros. Barcelona y Gerona están a tan solo 1 hora de camino para poder visitarlas en coche o autobuses disponibles desde Tossa. También es esa distancia hasta sus aeropuertos.

Guest access

name: H4 Habitación doble / Mas Ferran
description:
Masferran is a project of its owner, Ferran, who, once the haouse restoration was completed decided to open it to the public and share this privileged space in l'Empordà to enjoy an intimate and relaxed stay.
The style was respected adapting it to the current comforts.
We recommend gastronomic routes, outdoor activities and cultural visits.
There is a wide selection of restaurants in the area and a very complete supermarket 3 minutes walk away.

The space
H4
Intimate 30 m² room. Silent and relaxing, it is located in the garden. Singularly decorated, it has a King size bed, armchair, TV, air conditioning, heating, integrated bathroom with shower. Beautiful combination of natural materials and sense of spaciousness.
100% cotton bed and bath linen.
Quality amenities and hair dryer.
The rest of the rooms, such as kitchen, living room, dining room, garden, are shared with the rest of the guests.
Masferran has various silent space
neighborhood_overview: Pals is at the epicenter of the Golden Triangle of Baix Empordà. It's a beautiful area, with marvelous beaches and quite central; perfect for visiting medieval villages and enjoying outdoor, cultural or gastronomic routes.
host_about:
Masferran es un proyecto de su propietario, Ferran, que compró con mucha ilusión esta casa de pueblo. Una vez finalizada la restauración decidió abrirla al público y compartir este espacio privilegiado en l’Empordà.
La restauración se hizo respetando el estilo pero adaptado a las comodidades actuales creando un espacio único para disfrutar de una estancia íntima y relajada.
Trabajamos fuera de casa pero estamos siempre disponibles para asesorar, orientar y hacer recomendaciones sobre la zona a nuestros huéspedes, aunque dejándoles espacio y privacidad para que se sientan cómodos en casa.
Ofrecemos aconsejar rutas gastronómicas, actividades al aire libre y visitas culturales. El espacio está abierto a mostrar arte local y informar de marcados y anticuarios.
Nuestras habitaciones tienen baño privado con ducha, artículos de baño y secador; cama King size, TV, adaptadores usb, altavoces bluetooth, aire acondicionado, ventilador. 
El resto de estancias, como cocina, sala de estar, comedor, jardín, son compartidas con el resto de huéspedes.
Servicio diario de habitaciones.
Ofrecemos wifi gratuita en toda la casa.

Girona, Roses, Cadaques - only 40-45 min; Figueres and Empuriabrava - 20min; Begur and Palamos - 30 min; Pals and Playa de Aro - 40 -50 min; Banyoles, Olot - 40 min - 1 hour. Overall, L'Escala is perfect for exploring the Costa Brava.

K3OMES family

Семья K3HOMES

name: Enginy Apartament 3-5 personas
description:
El apartamento se encuentra en el centro de Figueres, a menos de 500 metros del famoso Museo Dalí. Este apartamento está bien equipado y dispone de TV vía satélite y conexión a internet gratuita con cable y wifi.

The space
El apartamento dispone en su interior de dos plantas que se comunican por una escalera. La planta baja esta formada por una cocina completa con nevera, microondas y lavadora y una zona de estar independente con sofás cama y un baño completo con toallas y secador de pelo. En la parte superior hay otra habitación con un baño tambien completo.

Other things to note
Cualquier información turística sobre la zona se da.

name: Beautiful mediterranean villa
description:
Do you want to wake up with a breathtaking view of the sea, while enjoying a peaceful environment on the heights of Platja d'Aro?

This 4 bedroom villa is for you!

The house has a pool, a fully furnished kitchen, a large living room, and the possibility to park 2 cars.

The space
While being very close to various beaches, restaurants/bars or shops (10mins) this mediterranean villa still allows to enjoy tranquility with a large terrasse with a stunning sea view.

The house has 4 bedrooms, with the possibility to add an additional baby bed, 2 separate bathrooms and 1 additional toilet. The kitchen is fully furnished and has all the basics (oil, pepper,...). Furthermore, the terrasse has a barbecue next to the pool, ideal for summer evenings.

Moreover, the pool is located toward the sea, which is ideal for a morning swim before breakfast.

Guest access
The villa is easily accessible by car and is located
neighborhood_overview:
Platja d'Aro is an animated town in the heart of the Costa Brava, which is known for its beaches but also for its gastronomy and its wine. The city hosts many festivals during the summer such as the free "Nits the Jazz", which hosts jazz concerts once a week during the whole summer.

There is a lot of restaurants, bars, nightclubs as well as outdoors activities, such as minigolfs,acquatic activities, horse riding and many walking or cycling routes in the area.

Moreover, the well-know Golf d'Aro is minutes away from the house, on the same hill.

A small food store is a five-minute drive away, on the hill, in the Hapimag complex.

The house is approximately 1 hour away from Barcelona, 30min from Girona. There is also numerous traditional villages in the area.

name: Rectoría de Castellar
description:
Casa de 3 dormitorios, 2 baños, parking y WIFI gratis con vistas a la montaña, situada en el espacio protegido PEIN de L'Alta Garrotxa muy cerca del Parque Nacional de la zona Volcánica.

The space
Su casa de vacaciones es una parte de la recién restaurada Rectoría de Castellar; esta antigua edificación está unida a la Iglesia Románica de Santa Maria de Castellar que data del siglo XI.
La superficie total de la casa es de: 106 m2
La dotación de su casa de vacaciones incluye:
Calefacción central - Fuego de leña -Televisión por satélite - DVD - Lavadora.
Cocina completa:
Fogones y horno de gas - Extractor - Frigorífico - Lava platos - Todos los utensilios.
Las habitaciones y los baños:
disponen de toda la ropa de cama - Sábanas - Mantas - Edredones - Toallas.

A 6 km del pueblo Sant Joan les Fonts (Girona) encontramos Castellar de la Muntanya en un valle que forma parte del espacio protegido de la Alta Garrotxa. Castella
neighborhood_overview: A 6 km del pueblo Sant Joan les Fonts (Girona) encontramos Castellar de la Muntanya en un valle que forma parte del espacio protegido de la Alta Garrotxa. Castellar está situado a una altura de 650 metros sobre el nivel del mar, desde donde podemos disfrutar de vistas al Canigo, esta montaña es la mas alta de los pirineos orientales y durante gran parte del año su cima está cubierta de nieve. Mirando hacia el oeste tenemos una vista panorámica de las montañas de la Alta Garrotxa y a lo lejos, el mar. El paisaje es una policromía en la que predomina el verde, salpicando montañas, prados, bosques, barrancos y torrentes.

name: Can Font Olives - Turisme rural
description:
Acogedora masía ampurdanesa, muy bien restaurada y equipada. Está situada a muy poca distancia de Banyoles, Girona y de las playas de la Costa Brava, por lo que permite hacer visitas culturales, rutas gastronómicas y numerosas actividades al aire libre.

Masía del siglo XVIII rodeada de jardín con piscina, bosques y campos de cultivo. La casa cuenta con cuatro habitaciones, todas con baño privado, y las estancias, que conservan los bonitos techos abovedados, están decoradas con un estilo rústico y elegante. La cocina abierta con el comedor y también la sala de estar cuentan con chimenea.

Cottage form the seventeenth century restored in 2015. The house is in a quiet area surrounded by nature.
It has 4 bedrooms with private bathrooms, kitchen, living room and large garden with pool.

Inside the house you will find: fully equipped kitchen, dining room, lounge (with TV, DVD and games) and common toilet on the ground floor.
In the first floor there a
neighborhood_overview: Can Font Olives está ubicada en el pequeño núcleo urbano de Olives, a ocho kilómetros de Vilademuls, en pleno Empordà. Su situación permite llegar rápidamente a Banyoles, en cuyo lago se puede hacer senderismo, ciclismo, remo y natación, y a Girona, donde se puede visitar su bonito centro histórico. También tiene fácil acceso a las playas de la Costa Brava, donde se pueden practicar deportes acuáticos y disfrutar de su gastronomía y de los excelentes vinos DO Empordà.

name: CENTRIC APARTMENT NEAR BEACH TOSSA
description:
Beautiful and centric apartment, very close to the beach, at a very quiet zone.
Perfectly located, just 2 minutes walking to the beach and really close to shops, supermakets, restaurants and more.

The space
The apartment has wifi included in the price. It has 3 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, dinning room, big kitchen and a terrace where you can see a little part of the sea.
Fully equipped with all the necessary amenities: dishwasher, terrace furniture, comfortable matresses and more. This will make your stay really comfortable.
Wonderful awning at the terrace, with microperforated material, will give you protection from the sun, but won’t bother the views.
AC in the entire apartment.
There is room for 8 people, with the following distribution:
-Bedroom with 1 double bed.
-Bedroom with 1 double bed.
-Bedroom with 2 single beds.
-Double sofabed in the living room.
We have cribs and high chairs. Please request it in advance
neighborhood_overview:
The apartment is very well located, in a very centric zone and at the same time very quiet.
Less than 2 minutes walking you have the beach, restaurants, supermarkets and much more.
Two minutes away you have the commercial area, where is really hard not to stop and check all the beautiful shops

Tossa is a beautiful and quiet town, with a lot of charm. Ideal to travel with your couple, family or with the kids.
It is one of the most beautiful town in all Costa Brava, where you can steel feel the little old town atmosphere and where is not allowed to build tall buildings.
Besides enjoying the beaches, there are a lot other things to do. For example: walk around the old and narrow streets from the walled town "Vila Vella", go the the lighthouse and relax at the "Bar del Far", while you enjoy the incredible views of the rugged coastline and the cliffs. Walk around the comercial area, full of little shops, incredible tours to the mountain, bike rides, ship tours
host_about:
We are Ana and Kristjàn and we’ve been offering accommodation in Tossa de Mar for over thirty years. Seven years ago, we were very happy to found Let’s Holidays.

The passion with which we’ve been working these past years has made us grow, and we now have a vast team of professionals working with us. 
With them, we will make sure to find the best option for you and to get you everything you will need during your stay :)

If there is something that we have learnt this past years is that we like to be treated the same way that we treat you. 
That’s where our philosophy comes from. We like to chat and we will try to get you anything that you need and find solutions to anything that you propose.

At the end, holidays should be exactly the way we want them, right?

We present some of our services :)

The Home Selector is the person who will help you choose the option most appropriate to your tastes. You will save time in searching and finding the best choice.

The Host is the person who will take care of you during the whole stay and try to find anything that you need with the help of the other hosts.

Let’s Holidays Home will be your second holiday home. A place where you will be able to meet with our Hosts, chat, have a glass of wine and listen to some live music.

We’ll love to meet you!

See you soon ;) 

Here you have all our options

name: Beautiful apartment in the old town
description:
Completely renovated respecting the original design of the spaces , the apartment perfectly combines the comfort and luxury of modernity with the charm of the old items .

The space
Spacious , comfortable, quiet and with a special charm, this apartment is located in a traditional building of the old town of Girona . Completely refurbished to offer all the comforts of today's architecture and design, has a modern kitchen, two bathrooms and two fully equipped rooms.

The hydraulic mosaic floors , its high ceilings , the classic woodwork doors and windows, provide all the spaces special warmth and personality.

Both the master bedroom which has its own bathroom , and the double room have natural light. The first and the living room have large windows that open onto a balcony above the Rambla .

Guest access
The apartment is fully equipped with:
heating
fridge
kitchen
microwave oven
washer
Hair dr
neighborhood_overview: On the Rambla de Girona, one of the most beautiful and popular city streets full of shops , bars and restaurants ; the apartment is located in the old town , 5 minutes walk from the Cathedral, the Jewish quarter and 10 minutes from the ancient city Wall. Also, being next to the river that separates the old part of the new part of the city , its just a 1-minute walk from the picturesque houses of Onyar river and the main shopping streets.
host_about: Our only objective is to ensure that your stay is even better than you imagined. We are Oscar from Barcelona and Maria from Girona, we married in 2013 and we have 2 wonderful children. Also, together we started Flateli, a little group of properties we love to manage to host our guests and make them feel like home. Ask anything you need and we will make our best to get it for you!

description:
Preciosa masía típica con jardín y piscina privada (3x5m). Muy tranquilo, en medio de la naturaleza, ideal para familias con niños, a solo 7 min. en coche hasta la playa. Gran terraza con mesa para 8 personas, plaza de parking privada para 2 coches.

The space
La casa está decorada con mucho estilo y completamente equipada: mesa grande en el comedor para 8 personas, internet wifi, televisión (canales españoles y extranjeros), lavadora y secadora, equipo de música, chimenea. Sábanas, toallas para el baño y toallas para la playa disponibles.

Cocina completamente equipada: lavaplatos, nevera moderna con apartado especial para vino, máquina de café Nespresso, etc.

Jardín privado muy bonito con barbacoa, mesa grande para 8 personas, parasol, riego automático, piscina pequeña (3x5m) de sal.

name: Casa Playa a Santa Maria de Llorell
description:
La casa si trova sulla spiaggia del villaggio privato di Santa Maria de Llorell. Sono affittati il piano alto ed il piano medio, quello basso resta a disposizione dei proprietari. Appartamento elegante e confortevole, splendida vista sul mare.

The space
L'alloggio è reso unico dalla posizione. La casa è costruita a ridosso della spiaggia ed il mare dista pochi metri. Al piano superiore ci sono cucina, soggiorno/salotto e sala da pranzo, bagnetto. Al secondo piano le tre camere da letto e due bagni. Su ciascun piano una piccola terrazza con vista mare.

Guest access
Gli inquilini potranno alloggiare sui due piani superiori. Quello più basso non viene affittato e rimane ad uso dei proprietari che normalmente lo usano durante le vacanze estive.

Other things to note
A disposizione degli inquilini ci sono letti per sei persone. In più c'è un divano letto ad una piazza e mezzo. Adattandosi ci possono stare otto persone.
neighborhood_overview: Santa Maria de Llorell è una "urbanisaciòn", villaggio privato a cui possono accedere solo i veicoli autorizzati, che vengono controllati all'ingresso e all'uscita. La spiaggia è accessibile unicamente dal villaggio e dal limitrofo campeggio (Cala llevadò).

name: Maison entière pour 2 personnes
description:
It's a whole house just for you.
I put at your disposal only one room. With a double bed, or two single beds, according to your preferences.

If your stay is more than 2 nights, you can then enjoy the jacuzzi free of charge.
If you want to take advantage of the jacuzzi but you only book one night, I will ask you to let me know in order to start it the day before, as well as a participation of 20 euros. Thanks for understanding.

The space
It is a very pleasant house to live in. Its garden will enchant you. You can cook and enjoy the whole house.
It's a house with 4 bedrooms, but I'm only renting one. Each has its private bathroom.
You will find all amenities within 500 m.

Other things to note
CLEANING: CLEANING NOT INCLUDED. A deposit of €75 will be requested at the entrance. Upon departure, the amount will be refunded if the cleaning is correct.

name: Casa-masia Camallera (Alt Empordà)
description:
Casa de 285 m2 con jardín de 1.000 m2. Dispone de piscina, porche, 4 habitaciones (3 suites), 4 baños y un aseo. Camallera dispone de todos los servicios (supermercado, tiendas, estación de tren, etc.) A 15 km de las playas de l'Escala y Empúries, pitch & putt, restaurantes.

The space
La casa dispone de 5 habitaciones (pero una la reservamos para guardar nuestras cosas personales) 2 son suite, 3 baños y un aseo de cortesia. Cocina-comedor equipada, 3 salas de estar ( 1 con television). Porche ideal para comer y cenar. Jardin con piscina tipo alberca.
Nuestros huéspedes tendrán tranquilidad y descanso. Cuando cae la tarde, no hay nada mejor que sentarse en una hamaca del jardín y disfrutar de la puesta de sol y prepararse para una cena bajo la pérgola. Como nos gusta mucho cocinar integramos la cocina y el comedor en la misma estancia y con salida al jardín. Saliendo de casa ya tenéis el campo donde podréis pasear, ir en bici, coger moras....

G
neighborhood_overview:
A 15 min. disponéis de fantásticas playas (Sant Martí d'empuries, l'Escala) y ruinas griegas. Si os gusta el golf tienes un pitch & putt a 15 min. y diversos campos de golf a menos de media hora. Si os queréis iniciar en los caballos también hay una hípica a 5 min, y si os atrevéis con el esquí acuático cerca del pueblo también hay en un lago interior.
La zona dispone de buenos restaurantes de precio asequible, caminos para senderísmo y bicicleta.
En Figueres se puede disfrutar del museo Dalí y en Girona todo el barrio antiguo, la Juderia, la zona del río es una gozada para descubrir y pasear.
host_about: Nos encanta la vida familiar, los amigos, el deporte, la cocina, viajar y conocer gente.

name: La Posada
description:
Ihre Urlaubstage fernab vom Massentourismus müssen kein Traum bleiben. Die Landschaft verzaubert durch tradidioneller Architektur und ständig wandelbarer Atmosphäre von Landschaft zu Licht. In unserem individuellen Ferienhaus genießen Sie alle Vorzüge des Dorfes und die Ruhe abseits der Städte. Touristische "Magnete" wie Gerona, Cadaques, Barcelona und viele andere Orte bleiben in schnell ereichbaren Nähe.
Mit Auto sind Sie in 5 Min am großen Strand und flaniermeile verschiedener Dörfer.

The space
Regenerieren Sie sich bei uns , um den Alltag danach relaxter entgegentreten zu können. Und - so wie es Ihnen gefällt - Grillen Sie draußen alle regionale Produkte. Die wunderbar große Terrase mit Ausblick auf die herrliche Natur bringt Erholung vom Alltag, Entspannung und Gelassenheit. Geneßen Sie Ihren Urlaub so richtig.
Auch für Biker ist es ein idealer Standpunkt für Touren bis hin zu den Pyrenäen.

Guest access
Das Ferienhaus st

name: CAN DOU alojamiento rural nº PG-799
description:
CAN DOU Se encuentra en un privilegiado emplazamiento en la Garrotxa, Girona, junto al núcleo urbano de Les Planes d’Hostoles. Un espacio adecuado para disfrutar de los volcanes, la Via Verda del Carrilet y multitud de cascadas y pozas de cristalina agua.
Es un conjunto de dos casas rurales independientes: La Masía, que data del s. XVIII, y el Antiguo Establo.
Piscina para uso exclusivo de las personas alojadas en la Masia.

The space
La masía está dispuesta en dos plantas. En la planta baja se encuentra el comedor-cocina, la sala de estar con chimenea, un baño, un dormitorio de matrimonio y un segundo dormitorio.
En la planta piso se encuentra otro baño y una gran sala que da acceso a dos dormitorios de matrimonio y a un tercer dormitorio.
La cocina esta totalmente equipada con nevera, placa de inducción, microondas, lavavajillas, etc… la casa también dispone durante el verano de internet via wifi.

Guest access
Gran ja
neighborhood_overview:
CAN DOU está situado en la localidad de Les Planes d’Hostoles, en la provincia de Girona. Se encuentra entre el Parque Natural de la Zona Volcánica de la Garrotxa y el Espacio de Interés Natural de Collsacabra.
La comarca de La Garrotxa cuenta con multitud de núcleos urbanos interesantes para visitar: Sant Feliu de Pallarols, Olot, Santa Pau, Besalú,…
Además nos encontramos a 1,25 hrs. (115 km.) de Barcelona. 55 min (65 km.) de la Costa Brava, 1,11 hrs. (68 km) de Francia y a 34 km. del Aeropuerto de Girona|Costa Brava.
host_about:

Recibid un fuerte abrazo garrotxi... :-)

name: Casa Tarongers
description:
This family home is on a quiet one way street in Calella, but only a less than 10-minute walk to the town & beach . Set in a private garden with pool and barbecue terrace it has four bedrooms, one double with en suite bathroom on the ground floor and ,on the first floor a double bedroom with it's own balcony

The space
The house has 4 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms, including a bathtub. The double en-suite bedroom downstairs is ideal for people that prefer navigating one a single floor.
The other 3 bedrooms are upstairs with the second bathroom, and and access to a balcony and a roof terrace with sea views.
Guest can park in the garage or out on the street, there's never any issue to park.
The pool is 4x8m, a decent size do play or do laps.
The garden is divided between a lounge area, a dinning area and a barbecue area. It has green grass, perfect for children to play outside.

The house doesn't have A/C but doesn't get hot in the summer

INFORMATIONS AUX LOCATAIRES
Bienvenus dans cette maison centenaire que nous avons rénovée avec cœur et âme .

-La piscine :
-Ne laisser jamais un enfant sans surveillance d’un adulte autour de la piscine
-merci d’utiliser la douche avant d’entrer dans la piscine.
-Un jour/semaine une person

IMPORTANTE: En respuesta al COVID-19 se han reforzado las medidas de limpieza y desinfección en este alojamiento para garantizar la seguridad de nuestros huéspedes.

Esta amplia casa con jardín para 8 personas se alquila en l’Escala, Costa Brava. Se encuentra solo a 5 minutos caminando de la playa, y tan solo a 2 km del centro histórico de l’Escala.

The house has got a capacity from 2 up to 6 people with two beautiful ensuite bedrooms with mattresses 100% of latex, a full equipped kitchen, an attic, a spacious living room with satellite television, DVD with "Home cinema" and a fireplace, a free wifi area inside the house, air-conditioning and central heating.

Outside, there is a private garden with swings and a little slide for children, a barbecue, a little wooden house with a kitchen for children, garden furniture, a pergola which is ideal
neighborhood_overview:
It's located in the village of Mata (in the heart of the Costa Brava) which is a quiet, safe neighbourhood in a privileged place since it lays between the sea and the mountains
The house is in a walking distance from the shops and restaurants.
host_about:
Hola! Som la família Xargay. 

En Pere, constructor d’ofici, és un apassionat amb la seva feina. Ha rehabilitat i restaurat la casa pairal incorporant la comoditat i confort dels habitatges actuals però cuidant tots els detalls. És el pare de la família.

La Dolors, treballadora de mena i incansable, prepara la casa per deixar-la a punt i per atendre la vostra arribada. És la mare de la família però també és el pilar de la casa.

La Raquel, química, li encanta estudiar idiomes però també li agrada donar-vos la benvinguda a la casa i explicar-vos totes les activitats que ofereix la zona.

La Sílvia, alegre, treballadora i biòloga de professió. És la germana mitjana de les tres.     

La Sandra és una gran professional en el món de la fisioteràpia i l’estètica. Li encanta transmetre el relax i el benestar. Us cuidarà al màxim perquè desconnecteu de la rutina.

Ens encanta fer-vos sentir com a casa i esperem trobar-nos ben aviat!

name: Villa Sa Riera, beautiful 6 bedroom home, own pool
description:
This amazing villa was completely refurbished to a very high standard for the 2017 season. It has six air conditioned bedrooms, three doubles, two twins and a triple and 5 beautiful bathrooms. The villa has its own swimming pool which is adjacent to a large terrace with great views of the sea and the Islas Medes.

The space
Sleeps 13 (with a maximum of 10 adults) in 3 double (all en suite) 1 triple and 2 twin bed rooms. (one en suite)

All bedrooms air conditioned

Own Pool

All linen, bath and pool towels included

TV/ DVD player

Apple TV

Cots and high chairs for babies included free

Outside lunch table under Beautiful olive tree perfect for long lunches!

Outdoor teppanyaki wood fired hotplate and barbecue

Welcome pack included with essentials (including wine!) for your arrival

Mid week clean included in price

Amazing views

fast interne
neighborhood_overview:
The villa is situated in one of the most beautiful areas of Spain – the Costa Brava. The Costa Brava is a rocky coastline, plentiful in coves, secluded beaches and little fishing villages. The beautiful beach of Sa Riera, right in the heart of this coast and recognised as being one of the jewels of the Costa Brava, is about 15 minutes walk from the villa.

Begur, a well-known medieval town is about 10 minutes walk. from Villa Begur. Begur has cobbled streets, with a large central square surrounded by pavement cafes. There is a great mixture of fine restaurants, tapas bars, and even a fantastic open air pizza restaurant. There are also plenty of late night bars which cater mostly to the style conscious Barcelonians, no English pubs or rave clubs in this town. There are also many stylish independant boutiques which, in the Summer months, are open late into the cool evenings.

This part of the Costa Brava is much more a getaway for Spaniards than it is a mecca for fore
host_about: The Blandfords have owned Villa Begur since 2003 and Villa Sa Riera since 2016. We love the area and spend much of the Summer there if we can.

name: Villa in pine woods overlooking bay, walk to beach
description:
Cosy rustic villa in pine wood - large salt water pool close to the beach and the town. Spectacular views across Sant Pol bay and up the Mediterranean towards Palamos. Enjoy the peace and tranquility of this cozy villa that sits in a fantastic location within walking distance of one of the most beautiful bays on the Costa Brava, Spain.
Perfect for cycling groups, some of the best routes in Europe, many pro teams based here. Now with 1 GB fibre wifi! All InternationalTV and sport channels

The space
Villa L'Esplai can truly boast the title for best location, location, location. Perched overlooking the bay of Sant Pol it is possible to walk to the beach - which is probably the best for restaurants, beauty and activities in the Costa Brava - King Juan Carlos II and many celebrities choose to have a house here!

Guest access
Our guests rent the whole villa which has a stunning garden and a pool which is large, heated, salt water and ha
neighborhood_overview: L'Esplai is situated in an area where you can see snow on the mountain caps of the Pyrenees almost all the year round while standing on the terrace watching the sun glisten off the ripples of the azure blue Mediterranean while sipping a cool drink.  The coastline is generally regarded as one of the most beautiful in all of Europe and there are rocky coves with sea caves and steep cliffs for sea diving and snorkeling or long sandy beaches, ideal for toddlers to play all day in the safe Mediterranean sea.
host_about:
Hi - My partner, Janice, and I moved to this amazing part of the Mediterranean coast almost 14 years ago now, and we love it so much that we still feel that we have only just moved here.  We are lucky enough to have two villas here that we are able to rent out and over the years we feel we have become pretty good at providing a complete rounded holiday experience for our guests.

Before we moved to the Costa Brava we lived and worked in the hustle and bustle of London where I created my greatest legacy which was the funding and technical platform for JustGiving which is now the world's largest and most successful charitable donations website.  

Janice worked for a prestigious legal publishing house in the City and while we both thoroughly enjoyed our time in London it is nice to find ourselves truly in Paradise.

We both regularly enjoy many of the activities that are avalable in this amazing area including: kayaking, horse-riding, boating, tennis, skiing, hiking, bicycling - the list goes on - and we are happy to arrange activities for our guests where requested.

description:
La verdad no se como definir mi casa , convertimos un granero lleno de gallinas en una casa adorable, situada a 3 minutos del centro de Castalló d'Empuries y con tanta oferta lúdico, deportiva y cultural que es imposible resumir aqui.

The space
Casa abierta com diferentes zonas de relax, muy recomendable para todo tipo de viajeros, familias, turistas o simplemente pasar unos días de ocio y relax, en una zona tranquila y silenciosa. situada a 3 minutos a pie del un centro histórico que es la envidia de la comarca.

Guest access

Nosotros y nuestros hijos estamos muy acostumbra
neighborhood_overview:
Situada en una calle muy tranquila de Castelló d'Empúries precioso pueblo medieval en la comarca de l'Alt Empordà, tierra del gran pintor Salvador Dalí y sus tres joyas el "Teatre Museu Dalí", "la Casa de Portlligat" y el "Castell a Púbol" donde poder conocer toda la obra de genial artista. Sus playas de enormes arenales a calas preciosas y escarpadas, su actividad cultural, lúdica y deportiva es constante sobre todo en verano.
Famoso su parque natural "Aiguamolls del Empordà" naturaleza pura.

name: Sc209 Pretty old mil house
description:
This very pretty old mill house has been sympathetically restored. It is situated just outside (about 1km) of the medieval village of Pals. The long sandy Pals beach is approx. 5 km.

The restoration has been thoughtfully done by mixing modern living needs and keeping the character and style of the old mill.

The space
The pretty entrance hall leads to a country style kitchen with small table and chairs, cooker, washing machine and dishwasher, microwave, coffe machine, toilette with shower room, an arch lead to the spacious sitting and dining room with doors leading the walled garden and terrace area.

T.v / Wifi.

Upstairs there is a large landing area with sofa and lovely views, 1 shower room, 2 spacious bedrooms, 1 with a double bed and the other 2 single (plus an extra bed if needed) beds.

Parking area in the garden.

Guest access
The whole property is available to our guests.

Other t

name: Schoenblick Residence
description:
The apartment offers a panoramic view across the bay and is located outside the hustle and bustle of Cadaqués. However, it is only 8 minutes to town centre and beaches as well as a 15 minutes walk to Dali's house in Port Lligat. Hiking trails towards Cap de Creus are also within easy reach. The apartment was extensively renovated and modernized in January 2020.

The space
For more than 30 years our visits to Cadaqués were, above all, about relaxation. This is why the bright apartment above the roofs of Cadaqués is furnished in Mediterranean style and invites you to relax and unwind. And if a little work should be necessary, you can retire to our desk with a splendid view of the bay.

Guest access
We want our guests to feel just as at home in our place as we do. That's why you get access to the entire living space.

Other things to note
We have upgraded several rooms in January 2020, including the kitchen and one of the
neighborhood_overview:
The Neighborhood is quiet and right at the edge of town, above the rooftops of downtown Cadaqués. You’ll be able to enjoy some nice views - but you’ll also have to be prepared to walk uphill after enjoying a day at the beach ;)

Smaller shops and a pharmacy are right around the corner. The larger supermarkets are downtown.
host_about: My name is Sebastian. I am a trained Journalist and Organisational Developer, currently working in the field of international development cooperation. I’m a truly avid traveler and cosmopolitan. In the past years I have lived in South Africa, Ethiopia, Denmark and in my home country, Germany. Over the last few years I have traveled extensively, with Airbnb serving as a great resource to find accommodations and local hosts. Also, it led me to become a Host myself. If you wish to spend some time in beautiful Cadaqués, please feel free to contact me!

name: Apartamento duplex piscina Cerdanya
description:
El apartamento es dúplex,con preciosas vistas al valle de la Cerdanya y los Pirineos.
En la parte superior tiene una buhardilla muy luminosa y de noche mientras estás estirado puedes ver las estrelles.
Tiene un jardín con piscina comunitària.

The space
La casa es dúplex. Todos los suelos son de parquet.
En el piso de abajo tenemos una terraza cubirta, dos habitaciones dobles,con dos baños completos, una tipo suite, gran salón comedor con chimenea y cocina independiente con dos ventanas. En el piso superior tenemos una habitación doble, un baño completo y una gran sala de estar con sofá cama y equipo de música.

Guest access
Zona ajardinada con piscina y acceso al garaje particular

Other things to note
Se ha cambiado la encimera que hacía saltar la calefacción durante el pasado mes de marzo. El problema está solucionado.

HUTG-052380
neighborhood_overview:
El apartamento está situado en un típico pueblo de la Cerdanya a 4 km de Puigcerdà y 5 km de Alp. Tiene restaurantes, varios parques infantiles y una zona deportiva con campo de futbol, pistas de pàdel, zona de fitness, máquinas para muscular, todo de libre uso
Hay un rio en las afueras del pueblo, posibilidad de hacer numerosas excursiones ,paseos a caballo y tres campos de golf cercanos.
host_about:
Hola, soy Teresa profesora de Bachillerato. 
Me gusta mucho viajar y prefiero ir a apartamentos en lugar de hoteles porque me parece vivir mejor el ambiente del país. 
Estoy acostumbrada a alquilar mi apartamento del Pirineo catalán y he tenido muy buenas experiències.

name: Costa Brava - estudio con jardín
description:
Estudio de dos habitaciones, salon-cocina, baño y gran jardín. Comparte parcela con nuestra casa, aunque es totalmente independiente. Dispone de acceso privado, espacio para 4 personas y situado a 10 minutos en coche de la playa. Sin lujos pero con todas las comodidades necesarias.
Rodeado de montañas , bosques y a 10 minutos en coche del mar.
Aceptamos mascotas educadas, (no se pueden quedar solas en el interior del apartamento), disponen de un amplio patio con sol y sombra a su disposición.

The space
Es un apartamento sencillo y comodo, sin grandes pretensiones, pero con lo básico para tener una estancia muy agradable. Es una construcción aislada de nuestra casa que se encuentra dentro de nuestra parcela. El apartamento es totalmente independiente, dispone de jardín propio, zona de aparcamiento y acceso directo a la calle. No tiene zonas comunes con los propietarios, por lo que la privacidad esta garantizada. Esta situado en una urbanización muy tran
neighborhood_overview:
Urbanización muy tranquila en plena naturaleza dentro del PEIN de Les Gabarres y cercana a todos los servicios. Es necesario un vehículo. El carril bici esta al lado de la Urbanización y también tenemos multitud de opciones de actividades en plena naturaleza como trekking, btt, escalada, vias ferratas, kayak, etc...
Supermercados, centro medico, policía, bus, a 4 minutos en coche.

name: Apto.  acogedor en Port de la Selva
description:
Situado en el centro de la población, cerca de diferentes servicios, de la playa y del paseo principal. Planta baja de fácil acceso. Salón-comedor amplio, con chimenea, calefacción. Casa ambientación muy personal.
Julio y Agosto mínimo 7 noches.
Durante el mes de Julio y Agosto, los huéspedes deberían de llegar el domingo y salir del apartamento el sábado siguiente al mediodía, con la finalidad de poder tener el sábado a la tarde para realizar la limpieza y recibir a los próximos huéspedes.

The space
Nuestro alojamiento dispone de licencia de Apartamento turístico de la Generalitat de Cataluña. Nuestras tarifas incluyen la tasa de alojamiento turístico vigente.
Es un piso de planta baja, de fácil acceso. Un comedor - salón espaciosos y agradable. La mesa del comedor se puede ampliar. En el apartamento disponemos de música, CD y discos, así como libros novela, psicología, libros de arte. Hay una amplia información de libros de la zona de l'Alt
neighborhood_overview: El alojamiento esta ubicada en el centro de la población. Cerca encontrareis los servicios más necesarios, banco, supermercado, tiendas de comestibles, pescadería, carnicería, vivimos en la calle donde esta ubicada la Iglesia Nuestra Señora de las Nieves.
host_about:
Me llamo Agnès, me gusta viajar, conocer nuevos lugares y gente nueva. me considero una persona abierta y social, me encanta hacer amigos y tengo facilidad para comunicarme. En mi tiempo libre me encanta leer y escuchar música, cenar con mis amigos. Pienso que viajar es una manera de vivir mas intensamente, hay tantos lugares que conocer, tanta gente para entablar conversaciones tranquilas, interesantes, 
Me gusta conocer la cultura de cada pais, sus costumbres, su arte , sus museos y monumentos, es una manera de saber de las personas que viven, de su caracter, y de su forma de hacer.
Con airbnb es la primera vez que contactamos, pero tenemos experiencia de intercanvio de casa, tambien alquilamos nuestra casa en la costa brava y que pronto queremos ponerla dentro de airbnb, así que tenemos trato con personas que tienen intereses comunes a los nuestros, viajar. me encata enseñar el lugar donde vivo, o bien recomendar lugares especiales que a veces las guias pasan por alto.
neighbourhood: El Port de la Selva, Catalunya, Spain

name: Cadaques, spacious apt. - sea view, terrace, wifi.
description:
Very well equipped big apartment, nicely decorated and located in a very quiet residential area of Cadaques. Only five minutes walk to the village center. Just 200 meter from one of the best beaches, Llane Gran. Big terrace and to additional patios. If you come by car, it is normally possible to park the car in the street right outside of the apartment. The parking is free but depends on availability and parking may be difficult in peak seasons.

The space
Our apartment is approx 120 m2 and situated in a very quite area of Cadaques, just five minutes walk to the village center and 200 meters from the best beach in Cadaques, Llane Gran.
The apartment has three good sized bedrooms, one big terrace and two additional outside spaces/patios. Living room, dining room and library as well as two bathrooms and kitchen. The apartment is well equipped and nicely decorated. Parking for car is possible in the quiet street outside the apartment depeding on availibility.
neighborhood_overview: Very quiet residential neighborhood, just a few minutes walk from the village center. Close the the sea as well as the mountains.
host_about:
Born and live in Bergen, Norway. Worked several years abroad and have travelled extensively, staying at  a lot of hotels, but nothing beats staying in a personal home when away from your own home. That´s the reason to join airbnb!

Our second home is in Cadaques, Spain. Fell in love with Cadaques the first time we visited, 18 years ago. Before we had left that time we had bought our flat and never regretted it! Since then, we have had  longer and shorter stays , but always, always, returned whenever possible ........Recently, we visites Huglo, a small island in Stord and instantly fell in love with the property in Haukanes, which we occasionally like to share with others when we don’t have the possibility to be there ourselves.

name: Puestas de sol en la Costa Brava
description:
Nuestra casa es el lugar ideal para pasar unos días de relax y diversión en el corazón de la Costa Brava: paisajes de ensueño, pueblos medievales, historia y cultura milenarias, deliciosa gastronomía mediterránea, calas y playas de agua cristalina...

The space
Nuestra casa es el lugar ideal para pasar unos días de relax y diversión en el corazón de la Costa Brava. Es abierta, espaciosa, y le da el sol todo el día.
Dispone de 4 dormitorios dobles en 2 plantas con capacidad para 10 personas (ampliable a 12 si se solicita), 2 baños completos y una amplia sala de estar.

Guest access
Se accede a la vivienda desde una gran terraza con porche. El salón da a otra amplia terraza frente al bosque en la que se puede cenar contemplando las maravillosas puestas de sol de la zona. Desde ella se desciende a un jardín / solarium en el que montamos una piscina cuando llega el buen tiempo.
El aparcamiento frente a la casa está siempre disponible, p
neighborhood_overview:
Es una zona muy tranquila de viviendas habituales y muy bien comunicada con el pueblo y los lugares turísticos de los alrededores.
A muy corta distancia está el Parc de l´Arbreda, zona de ocio infantil muy animada en verano y supermercado.
Un corto paseo de 10 minutos nos lleva al centro del pueblo: tiendas con encanto, restaurantes, dispensario médico, cine, piscina municipal... todo muy cerca y accesible.
host_about:
Vivo a caballo entre Begur y Barcelona, donde llevo un pequeño comercio de juguetes de madera y mobiliario infantil.
Me gusta estar al aire libre, el mar y las montañas, la música, los libros y los viajes, en el orden que sea.

Nos gusta viajar, hemos hecho varios intercambios de pisos. Nos gusta explorar la oferta cultural , la gastronomia autoctona, encontrar la autenticidad de los lugares que visitamos.

name: CampellesHouse II - Vall de Núria - Ripollès
description:
At CasaCampelles II you will find what you are looking for, maximum tranquility, large spaces, unbeatable views, luxury, comfort and functionality, to enjoy with children, parents and friends where you can live, love, rest, dream, cook, sport, millions of stars and a thousand sensations more.

The space
Spectacular design house of 285 m2 in a garden of 1600 m2 located in the Valley of Ribes, built in stone, wood and steel, its south orientation give you unsurpassed views.

For 12 people, it consists of a floor and upper floor, kitchen-living room in a single and spacious environment, with five rooms, two double suites with full bathroom, two doubles and a quadruple (ideal children).

Four full bathrooms with cozy and warm design, loft with desk, large flat-screen television, audio equipment.

Fantastic garden (1600 m2) private and intimate, ideal for lovers of rest, sport, tranquility, family or friends and for those who seek direct c
neighborhood_overview:
Campelles is part of the Ripollès region, in the province of Girona.
It is a very well-preserved natural area with all kinds of fauna, ideal for short excursions along the river, with the option of bathing in its refreshing waters in summer. During the fall, it is a very good place to go looking for mushrooms, or in winter to ski on the nearby slopes of Vall de Núria, La Molina, Masella or Vallter 2000.The town also offers a great variety of local gastronomic products, they highlight its sausages and cheeses, honey or biscuits from Camprodon, near Campelles, are also highly appreciated.
host_about:

name: Country House⭐Can Simonet Rocabruna⭐Camprodon
description:
Country House in Rocabruna, Camprodon, Catalan Pyrenees. Quiet and lots of light. Incredible views of the Alta Garrotxa. Nature, landscapes and fresh air. Country house with absolute quietness, outdoor spaces, ideal for different types of activities: resting, sun, games, barbecues... And much more! We offer many indoor spaces. Our purpose is to look for comfort and quality respecting the environment and the characteristics of the old "Masia Catalana"

The space
The house has a living-dining room with chimney, a kitchen and a bathroom with shower on the ground floor. The kitchen is fully equipped (utensils for cooking and eating, fridge-freezer, oven, microwave, toaster, Squeater, Italian coffeemaker). These spaces are complemented with 3 bedrooms (one bedroom with a double bed, and the other two rooms with two or three single beds) and a bathroom on the ground floor that includes a washing machine. In the living room of the ground floor there is a sofa-bed for two
neighborhood_overview: Rocabruna is a small entity in the municipality of Camprodon, located in the Alta Garrotxa, a space of Natural interest. The village of Rocabruna has two high quality restaurants, the Romanesque church of Sant Feliu de Rocabruna from the 12TH century and the ruins of Rocabruna Castle. It is also an ideal place for mountain routes, horseback riding, BTT, 4x4, trekking, trail-running or enjoy pleasant rural views and fantastic nature.
host_about: Soc l'espòs de la Concepció, propietaria dels allotjaments. Filla del veïnat de Rocabruna on els seus pares van viure la major part de les seves vides i dels qui va heretar el patrimoni familiar que avui és Rourevell. Actualment es dedica a l'ensenyament infantil a Ripoll on resideix i treballa.

name: Big Property - Private Pool - Fabulous Sea Views
description:
Charming 1200 square meters property, entirely built in traditional Begur stones, located at the end of a cul-de-sac. Only 1,5km (10-15 minutes walk) from the lovely beach of Sa Riera with stunning views on the sea and Medes Islands. Fully renovated.

The space
This charming 1200 square meters property, entirely built in traditional Begur stones, is located at the end of a cul-de-sac, and offers privacy and quietness, while being only 1,5km (10-15 minutes walk) from the lovely beach of Sa Riera. It has stunning views on the sea and Medes Islands. The property has been fully renovated in 2010/2011, and additional improvement are made by the owner every year. A main villa, on a level, features 4 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms (1 en-suite), a brand-new extra equipped kitchen, a large dining/living area with fireplace. On the opposite side of the large private swimming pool, another house offers 2 separate bedrooms with 2 en-suite bathrooms, fully renovated in 2017, with ni
neighborhood_overview:
The closest beach (Sa Riera) is formed by the small beach “Port des Pi”, the large beach “Sa Riera” and the small beach “Cala del Rey”. Only 10-15 min walk from the villa, it is one of the largest and most popular beaches of Begur, preserves its traditional character and offers a wide range of sports activities and tourist services.
The area is popular with golfers with a choice of 9 superb course within easy reach of the property. The Costa Brava has just won an award for the best emerging golf destination worldwide by IAGTO. Emporda is a championship course about 15 minutes away; in Pals which is about 10 minutes away there are two good courses both Playa de Pals and Sierres de Pals. Particularly a golfers dream in the autumn and spring months when it is not too hot!
host_about: Belgian Expatriate in New York. Vice-President Global Marketing at Pfizer Inc. (Pharmaceuticals). Executive Coach.

name: Charming house in Cadaques, Spain
description:
We offer for rent our 150 square meter holiday house in Cadaques, the most beautiful and unspoilt village in Costa Brava, at NE of Spain.
The house is in the center of the village and just 50 meters far from the nearest beach called Es Poal.

The space
The house was built by the prestigeous architect Franco Bombelli in the 70's, who designed the most beautiful houses and studios in Cadaques for its rationality and fine adaptation to the surrounding environment. Cadaques remains a favourite spot for artists and is popular with weekenders from Barcelona (2 hours by car) and visitors from farther afield. The town has been developed carefully over the years and retains its charm. Most who discover it return again and again.

The house have been fully renewed on early 2015, and it is perfect for 4, with 2 rooms with queen beds and 2 en-suite bathrooms, a loft style kitchen, 2 separate living rooms, both with fireplace, and a charming patio. We also have
neighborhood_overview: Quiet. Art galeries
host_about:
I run a business and my wife Peté is a tv journalist. We have 2 daughters.
We like sports, nice places to visit, good mediterranean food and wines, share our free time with good friends and family. We love charming houses and to keep ours that way.

name: Catalan Villa on the Med: Pool, Jacuzzi, Views
description:
Stunning holiday home in Begur, a quaint village 100 miles north of Barcelona. Incredible sea views. Pool, jacuzzi, three sunny terraces, two balconies. Beaches five minutes away. Superbly equipped villa in the coolest village on the Spanish coast. Lots of lovely restaurants, boutiques and bars in the well-preserved village.

Book now for Summer 2023. We are usually fully booked for the high season by the end of January. For summer bookings, we require stays from Saturday to Saturday.

The space
We call it Casa Buenavista because the views are stunning.

We found this house on a whirlwind trip to the Costa Brava in March 2004. We were scheduled to see about ten places that day. This was the third one we visited. We quit looking when we walked onto the terrace and saw the view.

The outlook is not just majestic; it is also a tonic to the soul. Sit on the terrace, sip some Albariño and let the troubles of the world melt away.
neighborhood_overview: We think there’s no nicer place on the Spanish coast.  The Costa Brava (meaning rugged coast) is one of the most beautiful, pollution-free areas that still exist on the Mediterranean. The rocky coves like Aigua Xelida, Sa Tuna, Sa Riera, Platja Fonda and Aiguablava are breathtakingly beautiful.
host_about: I am a retired professor of history at the University of St Andrews and a freelance journalist.  I have rented my villa in Spain to hundreds of happy families over the last 15 years.  There's nothing I enjoy more than hearing how guests enjoy our little corner of paradise.

name: Villa with Private Pool Walk to Beach.
description:
Com Casa Nostra Begur is a 4 bedroom, 4 bathroom villa. Ideally located between Begur and Sa Riera. A seven min walk to lovely Sa Riera beach (uphill on way back) and 5 mins by car to Begur. with authentic bars, restaurants and shops. All four bedrooms have ceiling fans which together with new mattresses and quality bed linen should ensure a good nights rest. An excellent house for a big family group who want a little privacy too. DISCOUNTS FOR UP TO FOUR PEOPLE IN MAY, JUNE OR SEPTEMBER.

The space
The hillside garden at Com Casa Nostra Begur has bougainvillea, oleanders and cacti, fig and lemon tree offers and offers an attractive outlook from the terraces which run the entire width of the property on two levels. Due to the slope of the garden, however, it is not a play area. There is a covered dining area with a large table to seat 8-10 people comfortably and gas barbecue. The private pool (approx. 8m x 4m) with eight sun loungers is in the sun for all o
neighborhood_overview: This is an area of large individual detached houses on the side of a pine-clad valley.  Begur  is the gem of our part of the Costa Brava, attracting visitors from Spain and all its near neighbours. We've been coming here for over 20 years and love the ambience both in high season and the months of June and September.  We use the property as a second home so it is kept up to date. Our local beach, Sa Riera, is unspoilt and traffic free and best of all is walkable from the villa unless you have mobility issues.

It is possible to accommodate a third person in another room for 15e more per night.

The space
Just 2 minutes from a beautiful cove, 5 minutes walk from the town center, and 7 of the main beach. Located in a quiet area but in a moment you can find bars, restaurants and taverns.
The house has three floors. The first one is where the common areas are (kitchen, study and a small bathroom). On the second floor you can faind the bedrooms and a larger bathroom and finally on the third floor there is a room / study with sofa and bookstores.

Guest access
Cuisine, salle de bains et salle à manger. Kitchen, bathroom and dining room. There is a cozy study room with two large tables and wheelchairs. The kitchen is large with a table and four chairs, induction hob, fridge, freezer and all the things that you need for cooking.

Fenals is the quieter neighborhood in Lloret de Mar, away from noisy nightclubs and crowded main beach.

Fenals beach is very big and is a great pleasure to walk along the seafront.

There is also a main square (with games for kids, skating rink and green areas), supermarkets, shops and restaurants.
host_about: Soy una persona tranquila y hospitalaria a la que le encanta viajar y por lo tanto conocer gente nueva. Me encantan los animales y vivo con mi perra Lola, una labradora muy cariñosa.

description:
with 120 m2 plus the terrace, is located on the first floor of the building. It can accommodate 8 people in three bedrooms.

The space
La Casa dels Avis, with 120 m2 plus the terrace, is located on the first floor of the building. It can accommodate 8 people in three bedrooms.
The original stone and the rustic finishing give it a special charm. It’s a very bright house.
At the entrance we find a modern and wide kitchen, open to the dining/living room of about 30m2. On the left of the living room, we find a double bedroom with king size bed of 180 cm, and with a warm stone wall. Next to this bedroom, there is a big bathroom with shower.
On the right of the dining room, there is another double bedroom, with king size bed of 160 cm, and with bathroom inside.
Next, there is a wide quadruple bedroom, with bunk beds.
Situated in Ullá, region of Girona in Baix Emporda.Girona is 34 km from the accommodation, the best beaches of L'Escala, Empories

host_about: Con Concha, mi pareja, nos gusta acoger a nuestros huéspedes y hacerles la estancia lo más agradable posible. Igual que a vosotros, también nos gusta viajar, los deportes al aire libre, el mar, la buena cocina, y conocer gente de diferentes países y culturas. Nos preocupan los temas sociales y políticos. Nuestra experiencia como anfitriones es muy buena. Nos interesan los viajes de naturaleza y culturales, pero también los viajes a lugares tranquilos donde poder descansar relajadamente disfrutando de una buena lectura, de paseos o de una buena comida.

name: Casa Punta Milà. Private garden and  communal pool
description:
Our house is a two floor semidetached house in a quiet, charming village, L'Escala, in the middle of Costa Brava.(www.lescala-empuries.com) Modern style and very comfortable with free internet wifi access. It is child friendly. Back garden with porch, private garden and direct access to the community garden and pool. Recent build front yard with few amenities.

The space
Our house is a two floor semidetached house in a quiet, charming village, L'Escala, in the middle of Costa Brava.(www.lescala-empuries.com) Modern style and very comfortable with free internet wifi access. It is child friendly. Front and back garden. Comunity garden area with big pool for relax. The house has got 3 double bedrooms (one of them in the ground floor), 2 bathrooms, a sitting room, a dining room and a full equipped kitchen.
Terrace with porche with lovely views to the garden. Very quiet area. You can park the car in front of the house
We provide bed linen and towels
neighborhood_overview:
Quiet neighbourhood between Riells Beach and Montgó Beach .
Restaurants, shops and supermarkets within a 1 km.
host_about:
Hello,
We are Jordi and Carol, married with two daughters.
Our property is a recent and modern semidetached villa for 6 people equipped with every comfort.  It is located between Riells and Montgó, so you can easily reach walking, shops, restaurants and of course the beach. (10 minutes walking).
The house has a private garden and has access to a large communal garden with beautiful pool. Ideal for families with children.
L'Escala is a charming village and  great located in the middle of Costa Brava. You can enjoy our pleasant and sandy beaches such as Montgó Beach, located in Montgó bay, 5 minutes driving from home.
Ideal for people who love all kind of water sports. Near home you can find spots for windsurfing and kitesurfing (El Riuet and Sant Pere Pescador), diving and kayak (Montgó),  deep sea fishing...  Lots of cycling paths for discover the surroundings as well.
The area offers cultural activities such Greek ruins in Empúries, Dali museum (25 km far), a visit to the medieval town of Girona is a must. Barcelona is 120 km from here.
On the other side if you love nature, there are protected natural areas near L'Escala, such as "Parc natural dels Aiguamolls de l'Empordà" (ideal for bird watchers, "Parc Natural del Cap de Creus" and "Parc Natural del Montgrí".

We like traveling around the world and discover wonderful places, but when we are here we enjoy the peaceful and relax that the property offers.
Guests should treat the property and the belongings with respect. 
Guests should respect the rules of the neighbourhood.

Bed linen included
towels included
Bathroom towels included
Wi-fi included

If our place fits with you, we will be pleased to be your hosts and do all the best so you enjoy your stay in Costa Brava.

name: Cal Bisbe, Charming Rural Holiday House
description:
Cal Bisbe house, is situated over two floors connected by an external staircase. It has a patio and outdoor swimming pool, decking and a patio. It has 4 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms and 2 kitchens equipped with dishwashers. It has a barbecue and wood-burning fireplace, and we provide coal and firewood for your use. The house has heating, air conditioning and free Wi-Fi. Especially suited for the elderly or people with reduced mobility, the entire ground floor is on the same level and there are no steps.

The house faces the south, protected from the northern wind, with sun all day long, as well in winter as in summer.
Outside there is a yard where you can park your car, a swimming-pool with lawn around, and a resting zone protected by a wooden pergola that allows to enjoy better the time you spend outside.
On the ground floor, you find the yard, with wooden table and chairs, to have your meals outdoor, a vestibule, the kitchen, a bathroom and a large living room with firep
neighborhood_overview: Cal Bisbe house, it's a very beautiful rural whole house for rent. Well equipped and comfortable, it is an ideal place to spend time relaxing or on holiday with family or friends. The house is situated in the small village of Capmany (Girona), which is part of the Alt Empordà region and makes up the northerly part of the Costa Brava. It is very well connected and close to the beaches or mountains, it is also close to the city of Figueres and the shopping areas on the Spanish/French border.

description:
Fully fitted. Next to the Botanical Garden of Blanes, spectacular views. Private garden of 1000 meters to enjoy sunbathing on the lawn or swim in your private pool (3m x 10m, depth of 0.2m to 2m.) Of salty and overflowing water, dine outdoors in the barbecue area.
Fifteen minutes walking to the beach of Blanes and five minutes to "Cala Bona-Sant Francesc". Three minutes from the "Convent" of Blanes, Free WIFI. 60 km from Barcelona and 40 from Girona.

The space
From 8 to 10 guests can choose between four bedrooms with the following distribution: Bedroom 1 with a double bed and private bathroom, access to private terrace and sea views. Bedroom 2 provided with two single beds with private bathroom and access to shared terrace and sea views, Bedroom 3 with two single beds with access to the shared terrace and sea views. Bedroom 4 with two sets of bunk beds (four single beds), There is also a full bathroom in the hallway and a toilet in the game room located on t
neighborhood_overview: The town of Blanes is ten minutes  walking. The house is right next to the entrance to the botanical garden "Mar i Murtra" and five kilometers from the botanical garden "Pinya de Rosa". Blanes is in  Catalonia. Located 60 km from Barcelona on the Girona coast. It is the first town on the "Costa Brava", which is known as the "Gateway to the Costa Brava".  Blanes is also a popular tourist town, where coves and beaches surrounded by mountains makes this a very touristy place. One of the best beaches is "Cala Bona" sirtuada just ten minutes walking from our house.

neighborhood_overview:
LA ZONA . LA GARROTXA
La Garrotxa disfruta de dos tipos de paisaje totalmente distintos, peculiares y de una gran belleza.
Por una parte la Zona Volcánica, 40 volcanes y coladas de lava que crean un paisaje absolutamente único y por otra parte el Espacio de Interés Nacional de la Alta Garrotxa, que abarca el Valle del Rio Fluvià hacia el Norte, donde el paisaje cambia radicalmente volviéndose abrupto y escarpado, y donde podemos observar espacios naturales de una especial belleza.
Haz clic aquí para modificar.

Bonito mercado local los lunes por la mañana.
Calles peatonales llenas de vida local con sus cafés y tiendas y restaurantes
Edificios modernistas
Multicines
Museos
Fiestas tradicionales.

Volcanes (10-20 mins.)
Parque Natural de la Zona Volcánica de la Garrotxa
Hay más de 40 volcanes inactivos en la zona y diversas coladas de lava, formando un paisaj

name: AF-2 Beautiful house with swimming pool in Calella
description:
Beautiful house with swimming pool in Calella de Palafrugell

The space
Beautiful semi-dettached house near the centre of Calella de Palafrugell.

The house has 3 floors and it's located in a nice residence with swimming pool in Calella de Palafrugell.

Entrance to the house by the private garden.

On the ground floor there's a big living-dinning room, tastefully decorated with an exit to the terrace, a spacious fully quipped kitchen and a toilet.

On the first floor, there's a bathroom and 2 double bedrooms, one with 2 single beds and terrace, and the other one with a single bed (sofa-bed).

On the last floor, there's also a bathroom and 2 double bedrooms, one with a double bed and a terrace with beautiful views, and the other one with 2 single beds.

The house is 750 meters to the beach and 500 meters to all the services and the center of the town.

Capacity for 7 people.

To access
neighborhood_overview: Originally a fishing village, Calella has become a small town where urban growth has been strictly controlled so that the original charm of the town has not been affected. The beach is very picturesque with several coves. Instead of high-rise apartment blocks, general emphasis is placed on small, well-planned spaces with gardens and trees. Calella has the characteristics of "the perfect place" for many people, large enough to have excellent facilities, including good restaurants, bars and shops, but small enough to avoid organized travel.
host_about: We are the agency Immo Cala Marquesa, local agent in Calella de Palafrugell and Begur, and your contact for all questions or problems you might have during your stay in Calella.

description:

The space
El entorno es ideal para disfrutar con intensidad del deporte al aire libre. La platja del Grau (la más conocida en Pals) se ubica a 800m siguiendo el perímetro del campo de golf; en ella se practican deportes como el windsurf, surf, remo en la Escuela Náutica de Pals.
Les Basses d’en coll ofrecen rutas para realizar carrera a pie, senderismo y cicloturismo.
En escasos Kms se ubican 4 campos de Golf: Platja de Pals, Serras de Pals, Empordà y Gualta.

neighborhood_overview:
The flat is located in the town of l'Escala en la Costa Brava, and more precisely in Cala Montgo.
Cala Montgo is a cove protected from the wind with very thin sand. This place is known for its tranquility and the beautiful animals that you can see, as it is located next to the Montgri natural park. You can have a walk and enjoy the beautiful landscape. You can check the surroundings on the aerial pictures of the website.
Shops are only 200m away from the flat (open from 1 may to 30 september), and restaurant are next to the sea in front of the flat.
